title: Perfect location hotel
text: The hotel was amazing from start to finish we only stayed here 1 night but wish we stayed longer. The view from our room was incredible as the hotel had a view of time square. The staff were so friendly. The hotel offered free bike hire of $20pp (we used them around Central Park). The hotel also offered $10 allowance per day for the bar area. The hotel had free WiFi and a games area in the lobby with its own shop. M social also had a rooftop bar where you can sit with a drink and look at the view. We would recommend this hotel to anyone! We had room 2103!

title: Great stay in NY
text: We loved the hotel, the location was great, the hotel was clean, our room was spacious and the view was great, complimentary wifi worked really well, food was great, at breakfast you had a really nice assortment to choose from and staff really helpful and friendly. Oh yes, and after walking miles and miles each day, the bed was perfectly soft, slept really well.

title: Good rental above all
text:
Spent 5 days with family with two teenage girls in adjoining rooms.
Very good location, great atmosphere, services a little limited
Very good view of Time Square!
Didn't try breakfast or restaurant.
Too bad to have had an elevator breakdown

title: AMAZING!
text: Simply an AMAZING experience! Strategically located in Times Square, the Hotel offers fantastic rooms with an amazing view, a beautiful breakfast room with a bar that you may enjoy for an evening aperitivo as well! People there are friendly and professional and there you do feel like home! Definitely our choice for next trips to NY!

title: JUST WANT TO BE BACK SOON
text: First time in NY, and was awesome. Hotel was very near from a lot of points of interest. Personal workers were superfriendly, what made our days really comfortable. One thing we  always love to find when we travel is the hospidality and honesty from people who lives / work there, and we find it. Acomodation was 10/10. They upgradet our room and we had the "tipical photo" from TIMES SQUARE just in our window. Many thanks to everyone who made it. Hope to be back soon.

title: Exceptional location and view
text:
We had an excellent week-long stay. Very clean room spacious enough for 3 and very quiet despite being on the street! Great view from the room. Very pleasant bedding especially after walking more than 20km per day
. Very friendly bar staff, pleasant to relax there in the evening before going to dinner
The restaurant is also very good!!
In short, a top stay...

title: $100 a night deposit still not returned
text:
Got there to discover I needed to pay $100 A NIGHT Security deposit that would be returned on my check out. Firstly it was 2 to 3 days, then that changed to 4 to 5 days, then 7 to 10 working days. Still not returned 2 weeks later. They blame the banks and me being in the UK but I stayed at a different hotel after this one and paid $100 in total, not per night deposit and that's been returned already after I checked out 4 days after Msocial. 
Deposit aside, this hotel is an absolute rip off from start to finish. Bar prices a joke, and I mean joke. Rum and coke coming in at over $34 dollars when you add taxes and gratuity on, nobody should stay here, I wrote a review through booking.com too and the manager actually phoned me to change my honest review. If they don't like negative reviews, they shouldn't rip people off. My reviews are all honest and truthful.

title: Very nice Hotel located close to TIME SQUARE
text:
Two bed rooms are better to book as 4 bed rooms, even there is a very small different in the price.
The hotel is wonderful for a trip to NY centered close to TIME SQUARE with a unique view on the hot spot from a wonderfull LOFT-BAR-DInning area in the 7th floor of the building with a nice terrace beside.

title: One of the better hotels
text:
Arrived to a chaotic check in but the Q moved fast enough..check in staff seemed stressed and were not overly friendly. 
Room was fantastic and big for NY , two double beds and  a nice bathroom with bath .. fridge and a safe and a view of Times Square which the teenagers loved .. perfect area and very close to all the broadway shows .. large supermarket and McDonald’s under hotel .. a shake shack  is a 1 minute walk away.. close to Times Square while not being to close and a short walk to Central Park .. Ellen’s diner is right across the road.. 

Hotel bar is small as is restaurant , it was never overly busy and hotel has a large lobby with plenty of seating.. it has video games , shuttle board and table soccer which the teens loved .. rooftop seating area is definitely a highlight.. 

Hotel has a little convenience store but it is very expensive so we used supermarket under hotel. 

Lifts can be busy and slow but we found that was the case in most locations in NY 

$400 security fee on card which is returned and tax’s were $160 for a 4 night stay .. 

Would have no issue staying in the  M social on our next visit to NY

title: Could be worse
text:
Pros: view was fantastic, location great, room clean, concierge/doormen guys polite and helpful.  
Cons: pot smell in hallway, arrived on a rainy Saturday, soaking wet, and was not allowed an hour early check-in, bar is actually in the corner of the lobby and was closed, only one elevator working and was very slow.

title: Good hotel choice for NYC
text: Great location especially if you are visiting NYC for the first time. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. One team member that stood out to me and my family was Manny, he is very good at his job friendly, helpful and remembers guests and their frequent orders.

title: Very good!
text: Good situated at Times Square and Metro stations, friendly staff, nice view, we had a window with view to Times Square. Breakfadt was included, maybe I missed Honey and Jam. We definitely will come back.

title: Great Hotel
text: The location and everything the hotel offers is excellent for your time in NYC.  Make sure you grab a drinks and some food and enjoy the roof top.  Great Views of Times Square.  The staff are all wonderful as well.

title: Great location and nice vibes
text: This was our second stay at M Social Hotel Times Square. The staff is friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet is nice with a good variety. I had bought Broadway show tickets for MJ before we arrived. I was happy to discover that the theater was right next door to the hotel! Good variety of restaurants in the area.

title: Far too expensive, far too slow for lifts and generally not pleasant
text: Far top expensive , $100 PER NIGHT holding fee which still hasn't been released yet. Lifts for too slow for the amount of people using them, only 1 lift in and 1 out which at morning times is ridiculous getting out.

title: Great hotel with a view
text:
We were a party of 6.
My parents and my family.
My parents room was great in size, but the room we had for 4 persons was a little tiny. Same size as the 2 person room, hence more crowded for 4 persons.
Fitness was OK and a fine adition to our stay.
The location is fantastic.

title: Good experience
text: one of the receptionists at check in was quite rude, while the receptionist at check out was very jovial. it would be a good idea to point out very clearly at the time of booking that the hotel will retain 100 euros per night as a deposit during check-in

title: Mother/ Daughter trip
text: Traveled to NYC for a concert she visit to a museum. Booked a Social City View King and upon arrival we were placed in an ASA room which was not requested or needed. We were told we could change rooms and pay $35 more per night to move to a double on an upper floor. While this room had a beautiful view of Times Square, I don’t feel the extra cost should have been added since we did not get our original room as was booked. Staff in the restaurant were great. Breakfast buffet was not worth the $30 per person cost. Location was great but not sure we’d stay again as the added room charges put a damper on our experience.

title: Trendy hotel, fantastic housekeeper
text: Trendy, fun hotel. Stylish place with a vibrant lobby, games, bar, terrace with views of Times Square. it is the second time I've stayed there, and I have to stay the star of the stay was my Evelina who was taking care of cleaning my room. She delivered a personalised service, always cheerful and asking if I needed anything, and following up again throughout my whole stay. It is something you don't mind much of nowadays and a pleasant surprise. NY is magical, but it can be somewhat souless at times, it being so huge. Evelina gave that visit a human touch.

title: NY M Social Times Square
text:
Nice stay at M Social.
Great view on Time Square for 32nd floor.
Nice care of the staff during out stay. Breakfast included in the room rate and no extra charge (everything was clearly announced beforehand).
Would recommend ! 
Many thanks to Alvin and all the staff !

title: Perfect location, excellent service, most comfortable hotel bed I’ve ever slept in.
text: Perfect location, excellent service. Most comfortable hotel bed I’ve ever slept in. Would normally but out of my price range, but winter deal made it affordable. Highly recommend!  Great view of Times Square.

title: Disappointing not to be told before arrival not all facilities would be available
text: We were frustrated and disappointed to find out on arrival that there would be no access to the bar or restaurant on St Patrick’s day due to a private function. We were simply handed a piece of paper on arrival telling us we had no access to the bar and lounge area.

title: Wonderful stay
text: We would recommend this hotel to everyone. The staff is very nice and friendly. The room was great with enough space and cleaned everyday. Location was amazing. 5 minute walk to Times Square and metro station. We would choose this hotel again, when we come back.

title: Top location, beautiful rooms
text: Room cleaning was not good. Bathroom was dirty, no toilet brush available. Breakfast staff rather unfriendly, too little choice, sausage was cut thick. Atmosphere in the lobby was great and the Music, incredible!

title: Good experience
text:
We had a pleasant evening
We had several aperitifs to share, guacamole nachos mini burger and cheesecake it was very good we will not hesitate to come back during our stay
Very well served by Yvens
We reorder

title: Clean, Safe, and Stylish
text: We found the hotel to be in a great location and the staff was very attentive. There was a lot going on in the lobby but rooms were very quiet and comfortable, especially after the chaos and fun of Tmes Square.

title: Great location and atmosphere
text: The location was perfect! Close to the Broadway shows but also close to Central Park. Multiple subway stations near by also. The rooms are decent size and the lounge area has lots of fun things, a great view, and tons of space to lounge. I've stayed here three times already and will continue to stay here whenever we're in NYC.

title: Great atmosphere, great view!
text: Couples trip, hotel staff was so kind and helpful! Ian was super generous and gave great advice! Angel didn’t hesitate to help us grab a cab within seconds! Great view, great area! Would stay again! The only downfall I give was the elevators sucked! And There was a private event that closed down the bar/restaurant area to all guest staying at the hotel. So we weren’t able to use that our last night there. And it was PACKEDDDDD! But overall it was a 9/10.

title: mmmmm, social
text: I booked a one night stay at the M social with my girlfriend and it was lovely. The shower was very nice, the view was even nicer. The location is ideal and the price was much more manageable compared to other hotels in the area.

title: Highly recommended
text:
Excellent location, quick and friendly check-in.
The restaurant good food, good view and excellent service from Alam Choudhury!!!
Clean rooms, ice in the hallways.
Positive in every point of view.
Highly recommended for those visiting NY

title: Nice stay
text:
This hotel was a Novotel until the pandemic and has been taken over by the Millenniumhotels group. A small makeover has taken place (different color board behind the bed, different color chair in the room). And the colors of the lobby have been changed. Everything not in the hotel's favor. It looks cheap. The hotel now lacks a bit of the charm of a European hotel.
Nothing else has changed in the hotel. The place is fine for someone who likes to stay near Times Square. The rooms are spacious by New York standards. The room amenities are still not great for a hotel in this price range. There is a small refrigerator and a safe. A kettle is available upon request.
Hotel is near several subway lines. The price/quality is average. But that applies to many New York hotels.

title: MSocial is the best!!
text: Fantastic location!! Easy walk to Central Park and a fabulous roof top bar with views of Times Square. Amazing service and staff!! Favorite place to stay when I visit NYC with friends and family!! Came here for the NYC Half Marathon on this visit. Can't wait to come stay here the next time I come to New York!!

title: MSocial is Always Excellent
text: Perfect location!  Fantastic service!  I’ve stayed here several times with family and friends.  Here for the NYC Half Marathon this time.  Fabulous bar and bartenders.  They make a great Cosmopolitan. Nice rooms with beautiful Times Square views but located outside of the congestion.  Will continue to stay here again and again.

title: Good location. Nice view from the restaurant.
text: Room is spacious. We had a king size bed but it was much smaller than a regular king size. Lobby has a modern design but furniture and facilities in the room are older and limited. Good location. Near subway stations and there is a corner store down the hotel.

title: good value
text: I thought the atmosphere and location were excellent. I'm used to old bathrooms and small rooms in New York. However, these exceeded my expectations. I would definitely stay here again. Staff was nice and very helpful.

title: Excellent stay
text: The location is great! The decoration is fantastic and the cleanliness impeccable! Bravo for the welcome; thank you for the nice attention to our arrival for my partner's birthday; would not change a thing

title: Hotel stupendo
text: Posizione super centrale e strategica con vista su Times square, colazione buonissima, letto super comodo cuscini stratosferici! Pulito, Consigliatissimo! Buona anche la cena al ristorante dell’hotel!

title: Perfect location, impeccable room and excellent staff
text:
Nothing to say about this hotel, located in the heart of everything, extraordinary view, very very clean room, very professional and friendly staff.
Allow 1 hour to arrive and depart from the airport
I recommend !!!

title: Best in NYC !
text:
Pros ; Easy access , fantastic location, welcoming hang out spots in lobby , beautiful rooftop , great clean modern rooms , friendly fast efficient staff , 

Cons ; no microwave or coffee set up on room , 
With the availability of plant based meats and dairy this company should absolutely provide a plant based breakfasts and menu. I would be happy to consult  with chef or food and bev manager about that menu. I am a plant based nutritionist and chef. I offer this complimentary.  Thank you

title: Séjour au M Social Hôtel
text: Excellent emplacement à 5 minutes de Time Square et 10 minutes de Central Park à pied. Un staff à l’écoute et qui parle français. Les chambres sont propres et le linge changé tous les jours. Ménage fait quotidiennement aussi. Bref, super expérience. Nous recommandons chaudement.

title: Bruyant et inconfortable
text: Cet hotel est parfaitement situé, tout près de Times Square, et la vue était incroyable. Par contre, la chambre que nous avions était très bruyante avec l’ascenseur juste à côté. Le lit et la literie n’était pas confortables. La propreté était limite. Sans compter les petits détails comme: une télévision placée à un endroit impossible à voir du lit, 1 seule chaise pour s’asseoir quand on est 2, une porte de douche qui ferme mal, etc. Mais ce que j’ai encore moins apprécié, c’est l’employée au check in qui, bien qu’elle m’ait dit que tout était payé et qu’elle avait juste besoin de confirmer avec ma carte de crédit, a retiré 600$ sans m’avertir. Après vérification, j’ai su que c’est un dépôt de sécurité… mais j’attends toujours mon remboursement. Quand je me suis plainte de tout ça à l’hôtel, rien n’a été fait pour améliorer mon séjour. Une bouteille de vin et 2 verres ont été envoyés à ma chambre, comme une compensation j’imagine… alors que je voyageais avec ma fille de 16 ans qui bien sûr ne boit pas d’alcool. Bref, ils ne connaissent pas le service à la clientèle. Vous méritez mieux pour votre argent.

title: Excellent location
text:
Excellent location and great view of Times Square.
Very good bed
Breakfast OK but almost identical every day… little variety.
Ideal place to discover New York, close to subways and Central Park

title: Awesome hotel.
text: This was a family trip. We came to sightsee and to go to Broadway shows. This is a great location for everything we wanted to do. We loved the resturant in this hotel. The staff was amazing. Will definitely being staying here again when we come back.

title: Todo perfecto
text: Recibimiento bueno , ayudas con el idioma, todo preparada , la habitacion tal y como fue seleccionada.Las vista muy buenas. Las instalacions del hotel y la terraza espectacualres. gracias por todo ha sido una buena experiencia.

title: The most memorable anniversary!
text: I stayed at M Social last month and had the best time. Room on 25 floor was super clean and smelled good. The view of the city was breathtaking. I was missing some of my toiletries but they were brought up to the room in a timely manner. Vita was amazing and made our anniversary stay a memorable experience by adding a couple of touches to our stay. We were pleased by the reception desk people friendliness and always smiling and greeting us. My husband and I can’t wait to stay again when we are in NYC!

title: Excellent
text: We really like the location. It’s walking distance to most of the theaters. It’s close to a subway station, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. We have returned to that location many times over the years and have never been disappointed

title: Nice stay, perfectly located
text:
Family trip we had a double room with an amazing view on Time Square.
Room is big enought for 4 as we spent most of the time outside. The hotel has a huge lobby with everything needed to stay in the evening/night (video games, babyfoot, etc..). People coming to enjoy the bar and the terrasse view make it animated at night whithout being noisy.

Breakfast area is not big but we never wait more than 5 minutes to be seated (most of the day we didn't wait)

Hotel is in theatre district, close to metro and walking distance to many sites (5th avenue, Central park, Time Square, etc..)

overal we highly recomand the hotel

title: Great hotel
text: Great hotel. Next to Times Square, metro and bus lines. Staff always ready to help, large room, great bathroom. Check in a little late, but they let you store your bags at the hotel and return on time. Several cafes and restaurants very close by.

title: De lo mejor de NY
text: El hotel está en una ubicación inmejorable, tiene un lobby que está animado tanto de día como de noche, con jugos gratis para los niños y adultos y unas vistas hacia time square espectaculares. Definitivamente es un hotel 100% recomendable

title: Perfect location for Back to the Future
text: The location was perfect for Times Square and going to see Back to The Future. The staff was super helpful and friendly.  The hotel is very clean. You can get to Rockefeller center very quickly from this hotel. It was an enjoyable stay. Although we didn't have the breakfast,  it did look amazing.

title: NYCFun
text: Hotel is well maintained. My room very clean and the bed was comfortable. My room had a view of Times Square. For the price you can’t beat the location to Times Square and Broadway Shows. Walking distance to Central Park.

title: Amazing super management
text: Alex the supervisor on 2/28 was phenomenal. We had an issue with our room and the entire team made accommodations to move us. Couldn’t be more grateful for the staff definitely a 10 out of 10 experience. Our new room is bigger and better with a great view. We are so glad we made the decision to stay here.

title: Good Time good place
text:
Very good place in the city  ambiance very cool and quiet for family.
Good breakfast 
For First expérience family it’s very top 
The personnel is so kind 
Good place good Time good expérience for the big Apple I recommanded this location in France.thank’s

title: Albergo in posizione centrale
text: Molto bello l’albergo e in posizione centrale… la camera king social premier al 32º piano era bellissima. La struttura è formata da 33 piani, la hall dell’albergo si trova all’11’ Piano e ha a disposizione una bella terrazza che si affaccia a time Square

title: Great Location, Great hotel
text: Super location, room was clean and had a great view. The Staff was very friendly and attentive! We felt welcomed and safe. Restaurant and bar was good with great views of Times Square. Will definitely stay there again.

title: Good words for Evangelina in housekeeping
text:
This is a wonderful hotel with great services and staff.  The location could not be better.  The hotel is well designed and well run.

Our housekeeper, Evangelina, was lovely, helpful and efficient.  She made our very comfortable.
Thanks to Evangelina!

title: Good location and confort to visit NYC
text: The room was quiet and had a great view over broadway and time square. The lobby was friendly and helpful. Many activities possible near the bar of the lobby. Wifi was good everywhere in the hotel. I recommend this place

title: Definitely worth staying here!
text: I had a great time staying here, breakfast was lovely and fresh. Hotel management were very accommodating and friendly. Huge thank you to our cleaner, Evelina, she was so sweet and chatty and she cleaned and tidied our room beautifully and asked if there was anything else we needed. Despite being right by Times Square there was no noise whatsoever, which was something we were looking for. Highly recommend this hotel!

title: Ok
text:
Hotel was ok.  Watch out for the $100 dollar per night deposit and for them overcharging the destination fee compared to what you were quoted if not booking direct.
Cleanliness acceptable but grime build up around, needs some more TLC.
View from Times Square room was great.
Lift times not too bad.
Location for Times Square very good.

Question is always, would I stay again.  Probably not.

title: short vacation
text: Was very pleased with everything I included breakfast and that was great to have before I started my big day. The location was great. Everyone was friendly and helpful from the staff. That was my experience rooms were clean. We got there super early however, they did offer an option, but we chose not to, and just left our luggage rommed around before it was check in time

title: Superb Hotel
text: Everything in this hotel is first class.Myself and my husband stayed here for our Anniversary We would reccomend this hotel absolutely. 5 stars,definitely All the staff at ghe Hotel were brilliant and couldn't do enough for us they made are experience at this hotel even better.

title: Great with your eyes closed
text:
The location of the hotel is great, several metro lines nearby. The hotel is also surrounded by several food outlets, opposite there is a great pastry shop, at the bottom of the hotel a take away which offers hot dogs (not tested). I recommend Olive Garden 5min for a change from burgers. There is a bar in the hotel with a great view of Times Square. At the bar there are video games and table football with free access, perfect for keeping the children occupied for a drink. The hotel also has a small market, useful if, like us, you haven't taken the right plug adapters. There are also water fountains on the upper floors. The rooms are very good and the hotel is quiet.
The staff is very warm, smiling, and very helpful. Several of them speak French. A special nod to Flora, who is very kind. Thanks again for your help. We would go back with our eyes closed

title: Fantastic Hotel
text:
We got home this morning after staying at the M Social for 7 nights.We cannot fault this hotel one bit.
The room was big,with a beautiful king size bed.
And the view was something else.
It's a lovely clean Hotel and the staff are all amazing,they couldn't do enough for us,from the waiting staff,Housekeeping, Reception and management team.
We stayed here for our 40th Wedding Anniversary and they made it very special for us.
We had breakfast every morning and the food and service was first class.We are already looking at a return visit.Try the M Social Hotel,you will.not be disappointed. 🙂

title: Very good!
text: We stayed in the room with a view of Times Square and our experience was wonderful! The location is excellent, but not only that, I thought the hotel was great in terms of cleanliness of the rooms, sound insulation (you can't hear any noise from outside or from other rooms), decoration, amenities, security. We only contacted staff at check in/check out and in both situations the service was very friendly and resolute. It is really necessary to take two elevators to get to the rooms, but I never had to wait too long for access. Without a doubt I would return!

title: Family vacation in New York
text:
Hotel and the location was fantastic
, rooms were nice and modern but the beds were on the small side to what we are used to in the UK,
Selection of food was good too for breakfast and plenty of options.

title: I recommend!
text:
Very well located hotel, friendly restaurant staff especially Yvens who spoke French to us.
Restaurant with a breathtaking view of Time Square.
Quiet room despite a very central location.
To do as a couple, with friends or family!

title: Our stay at Msocial
text: We enjoyed our stay at the msocial very much. The service was excellent, our rooms were always clean and the overall experience was great. We also loved the familiar atmosphere at your hotel. Thank you so much. We would love to visit NYC again.

title: Fantastic
text: We had a great stay, staff was good and helpful. The only problem is that at peak hours the lift was so full that we couldnt go in, and needed to wait for the next one or even another. The environment was very very nice.

title: Great food and drinks
text: Can't recommend enough, we went for a pre show drink and bite to eat. It has an amazing view of time square in a very comfy setting, i would recomend trying to go as it gets dark so you can see both sides of times square. Our server Yvens was brilliant, attentive and extremely welcoming.

title: Our experience was superb and will come back when in the city.
text: Yvens waited on us at the restaurant and gave us excellent service.  Very helpful with the menu and made sure that we were happy with our food. Cleaned the table at appropriate time.  Also made sure we had what we needed for tea and any extra things.

title: spacious room in the middle of Manhattan
text: Spacious and quiet room (18th floor), great value for money, slightly weak internet (probably due to the room being in a corner of the hotel building), centrally located and ideal for exploring Manhattan. Conclusion: we would choose this hotel again for our next trip to New York.

title: Weekend in Time square
text: Excellent hotel. Nice rooms. Great view. Brilliant location, Amazing roof top bar & view. Fair price.  Minor issue with the billing at check out but this got sorted. Really cool hotel in a great location.

title: A safe bet in New York
text:
Beautiful hotel very well located in Manhattan, close to Times Square, Broadway and the various subways.
The rooms with a view of Times Square are great, we are not disturbed by the noise at night.
Comfortable bedding, varied breakfast and very friendly staff.
This is my second stay at this hotel and I will certainly return with pleasure.

title: Family friendly hotel, great for teens
text:
My son wanted to stay around Times Square, and if you wanted a place where you can still get a good night sleep, hot rainshower and a room with space. This place is it. It’s also hard to find rooms with 2 double beds without paying an arm and a leg.

Few niggling things, but all sorted with friendly, patient and understanding staff.

Request a coffee machine if you need one in your room. My first one did not work, and they replaced it.

Old bar of Soap was removed and I need to request nee one, as only other alternative was body wash fixer to wall in shower. 

The TV did not work for 2 days in a row, something about loading the TV apps(?)

They provided a bottle of wine and macaroons for a birthday celebration, which was a nice touch. Wine not so great though (sorry!)

Whilst family friendly, I was not a fan of the foyer to hang out, but NYC is at your doorstop, so head out and have fun.

title: Family trip
text: Great location,  clean rooms , bed was comfy and staff were very nice and helpful. The roof top bar is class, great view of Times Square and great to chill and watch the world go by. Subway also close by which made getting around the city much quicker

title: Top Location
text: Tolle Atmosphäre - nettes Team! Gelungener Aufenthalt im Herzen des Time ! Meine Tochter bekam zu ihrem 16. Geburtstag sogar eine kleine Aufmerksamkeit aufs Zimmer! Nette Überraschung! Kommen gerne wieder.

title: Great server. Fantastic view!!
text: Yvenś was an extraordinary server. He is so kind  and social. We loved talking to him and he was such a pleasure to be around! We had such  a good conservations with Yvens. He suggested the best places to take a photograph of our drinks. He knows the best instagram shots!

title: Amazing
text: Yvens is the most lovely server! His kindness and outgoing nature really made my visit super special. My friend and I had a wonderful time enjoying a cocktail, watching the sun set and the lights of Times Square. As a visitor to New York, I really enjoyed the hospitality that Yvens provides and the stories he shares. His warm smile and welcoming nature are much appreciated! Also: the drinks are strong and well balanced!!

title: Very Good
text: Very nice Hotel in Manhattan. It is located near the Times Square. You can also reach very easy the subway. A lot of restaurants, shops and attractions are around the hotel. The breakfast is very good!

title: Comfortable & quiet in Times Square
text: This is a good hotel in a central location. It was clean and comfortable and staff were all friendly. The rooms are modern and the bed very comfortable. Check in staff offered us a microwave or kettle if we needed. Room had an iron but no ironing board. There were no tea or coffee machine in room. Some of the usual items you might expect in the bathroom weren’t provided- shower cap

title: Stunning
text:
Superb Hotel, with a magnificent reception and view of Time Square. We were perfectly welcomed by Yvens and the whole team. The rooms are nice with a view of Time Square if you wish, but be careful to take a night mask, because Times Square is renowned as the city that never goes out.
Superb stay.

title: Large WE with my son
text:
Very good hotel  Conveniently located Perfect reception and concierge staff
I recommend this hotel
I've been coming to this hotel for a long time, when it was called the Novotel.
Very nice terrasse with view on Times Square

title: 5 Day stay in NYC
text: Hotel overall was very good and value for money in a great location. On the plus side, we enjoyed the quick check in and fantastic lobby area with an amazing roof top bar looking over Times Square. On the negative the size of the beds are small and tipping situation in America is pretty aggressive.

title: Perfect
text:
Place with a magnificent view of Time Square, very welcoming and pleasant staff especially Yvens who served us very kind and helpful and also speaks French
Very very good meal and a change from other New York meals
Perfect same level very affordable price

title: Great hotel! Great location!
text:
i booked this hotel because if it's proximity to the broadway theater that i was going to see.  the hotel does not have their own parking lot, but the parking garage that they recommend is not far away at all and the price for parking was fair at $55.  the check in/out line was long when we arrived to the hotel lobby, but staff was very nice and friendly and helpful with my questions.  we were early to check in but for $75 we paid to be let into our room early.  i felt it was worth it. 

elevators move fast and our floor was quiet and clean.  we had a great view of times square, a fridge, and the bed was comfortable.  it would have been nice to have a bathtub.  the room was modern and basically soundproof, and rather spacious for new york hotel rooms.

we enjoyed a drink at the hotel bar.  the lobby and bar area are huge and modern.  you cannot beat the location if you want to be in times square and steps from broadway, rockefeller center, and walking distance to the empire state building.

i totally recommend staying here and i would definitely return any time i was going to come back to nyc. i'm sure you can find cheaper places, but i was really impressed with the staff, the cleanliness, and the location. everything was just easy and relaxing.

title: Great Location & Staff
text:
Great hotel and the location can’t be beat. Time square can be comfortably seen from the rooftop. The staff was very helpful and welcoming. The room was clean and the bed was comfy. Evelina from the cleaning staff provided an exceptional service. She was very kind, welcoming and pleasant to talk to. She made our stay even better. It is worth noting that the front desk held our luggage after we checked out, which allowed us to go for a final stroll in the city before leaving. 

Highly recommend it.

title: Happy stay
text:
Had a good stay but my jet lag was waking me up around 4:00 am.
Needed tea or coffee at that time and a water boiler and a coffee machine would be a good idea if there were in the room.Hope my next visit you ll do something about it.

title: Simply the best hotel in Times Square
text: The hotel has a great location on Times Square. It is very clean, modern and inviting. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The location of the hotel is great. In the hotel you don't notice any of the hustle and bustle outside.

title: excellent!!!
text: The employees are extremely friendly and helpful! Very sweet! Beautiful and tidy room and the location was excellent, right next to Times Square! It was a dream! I highly recommend it!!! Thank you M Social! Next trip to New York I will stay here!! Loyalty!

title: My NYC Go-To
text: From my arrival to my departure the night staff especially were so generous and kind! I needed to extend my stay and they were more than willing to help me with my accommodations and my continued convenience during my stay. I don’t think I can ever stay at any other hotel after this experience. Also the doormen are all so very kind!

title: Stay at M Social
text: The staff at the front desk was very friendly and welcoming, the room was clean with an amazing view. We used to restaurant for a few drinks in the evening, and breakfast in the morning. The staff was on-top of everything and very friendly as well. Will definitely be back!

title: Good location, friendly staff, depressing bathrooms
text: This hotel is in a good location, has friendly and helpful staff, and dark and dreary bathrooms. We appreciated the location which was close to Times Square and the subway. It was also nice to have a shuffle board and comfy sofas in the lobby area. What wasn't nice is the paper thin toilet paper and tissues and a dark brown bathroom with worn out fixtures.

title: Love location and venue
text: The Hotel and the staff where very modern and profesional. And the location close to Times Square and Central Park. The view of our room was the best at day time and night and the room service are fast an d our coffee real hot like we like it.

title: Αναξιόπιστοι
text: Μy stay in this hotel was from 18 to 27 May 2023. it was very pleasant, it is quite beautiful, in a nice location and with a very nice rooftop. The rooms could be cleaner. The reason I won't go again even though I would love to, is because they still haven't returned to me as of May and after many emails between us the money guarantee of $550 out of the total of $700 I paid them. While they accept their debt, the money has not been returned to my account yet. They are obviously taking advantage of the fact that I am not  US citizen and cannot claim them from Greece where I live.

title: Enjoyed our stay
text:
Good location. Good sized room. Nice on the inside. Decent sized room. All employees that we encountered were very friendly and approachable. I would definitely stay again given the opportunity.

Common place areas unbearably warm...granted it is the middle of winter, but way too warm!

title: M Social Hotel NYC TM
text:
It was a pleasant stay at M Social NYC TM.
We were worried that it will be noisy since it is close TM, but it is not.
The beds and pillows were extremly confortable! And we had one of the most kind and sweet house keeping lady ones can meet ever!

title: Lovely stay
text:
The hotel was perfectly located for our family. We traveled with our 4-year-old son and our 12-week-old baby. Many things were within walking distance. The metro is around the corner and that was easy to do with a baby. The people in the hotel are helpful and super friendly. We were given a kettle to heat up water for our baby's feeding and the staff even wanted to bring a microwave.

We enjoyed New York, partly thanks to our stay in this hotel.

title: BEst place to a first discovering of the NYC
text:
It's the a very good place to stay in your first travel in NYC!
Near the subway for easy deplacement and a central position for visiting the most of the NYC attractions
The room have a big view because of the high floor level what enjoy our stay!
A lit bit expensive if we know NYC

title: Excellent worker GABRIEL
text:
The location of the hotel is wonderful, the rooms are very comfortable and with impressive views of Times SQUARE but without a doubt the best thing about the hotel is GABRIEL CESPEDES, we had a problem with our luggage and he did not stop until we solved it, he helped us at all times, an excellent worker but above all excellent person.
Thanks for everything !

title: Great location
text:
New York is a cheap city to stay in - but this place represents excellent value for money. The best thing about this hotel is the location - right into the heart of Times Square and walking distance from the shows and many major attractions.

Hotel was clean and had a nice bathroom.

Would stay again.

title: Great hotel and great location
text: This hotel was very nice. The staff were overall friendly and accommodating. I think we were upgraded to a high floor room. the 31st floor had great views! We scoured the internet for weeks for a hotel to stay at, and I am happy we landed on this one. You are a 5 minute walk to times square, and about 10 minutes from rockefeller!

title: Great stay
text: "Enjoyed my solo stay! The hotel's warm ambiance and attentive staff created a comfortable atmosphere. Convenient location, cozy room, and great amenities. Perfect for solo women travelers seeking a relaxed and welcoming environment.

title: Excellent service!!
text: Shout out to Darlene at front desk reception!  She was so helpful in finding and printing out my play tickets from the business computer.  Darlene was so knowledgeable, kind and friendly!  We felt so welcome here, and really enjoyed our stay!!

title: Excellent Séjour !
text: Nous avons tout aimé : l'emplacement top, la propreté et modernité des lieux, le personnel aimable, disponible et pro, la bagagerie, pratique et sans frais, l'ambiance et le personnel du bar lounge et sa terrasse géniale avec vue imprenable sur Times Square ! Je recommande

title: Great hotel in a great location
text: My husband and I just returned from a 2 night stay at M Social. It was a wonderful stay. The hotel is in a great location and the front dest staff is "the Best". We have been staying here for several years.  Alvin is always so kind, he goes above and beyond in making our stay comfortable. Jale and the other staff that we encountered were also pleasant and happy to help with any questions. The rooms are nice and housekeeping is attentive as well. We easily walked to Central Park, shows, and restaurants.

title: Our First NYC Trip
text: Our family made our first trip to NYC this month and used the M as our home base. We could not have been happier with that decision! The staff was super friendly and extremely helpful in helping us get the full city experience. The room was spacious enough that we weren't on top of each other the whole time and super clean! When we were too tired to navigate the city, we enjoyed ourselves at the bar and restaurant which was perfect. We will not be staying anywhere else for our future NYC trips!

title: Great stay
text: The hotel is in a great location in the heart of Times Square so its easy to walk to many attractions in the city. Also, the facility was nice, clean and welcoming and the staff was very helpful. I would stay here again.

title: Volvería
text: Aunque tiene aspectos a mejorar volvería sin dudarlo por ubicación, vistas, desayuno y zonas comunes (hall con sofas y juegos y bar). Ubicado en el centro, cercano a supermercado, teatros, restaurantes, estaciones de metro, centros comerciales, etc

title: Great Stay in Times Square
text: We had an excellent stay. The location was super close to Times Square and the subway stations so it was super easy to get around. The staff was friendly and we loved the atmosphere. Our room was cleaned regularly and so was the lobby. We would recommend!

title: Great hotel!
text: This hotel is lovely! We had a large group of 20 rooms and everyone had a great experience! It was very safe and clean and a great location for what we were needing. Would recommend, especially for bigger groups!

title: Good Room, breakfast price extortinately crazy
text: the price of the breakfast for what is was is a complete trap.  The buffet on offer was disappointing for the price...you tend to get breakfasts included in many other places, not with this place...where I was definitely fleeced.

title: Heart of Hospitality
text: During my recent stay at M Social in Times Square, I was thoroughly impressed by the exceptional service and spotlessly clean accommodations. From the moment I checked in, the staff went above and beyond to ensure my comfort, offering personalized attention that made my stay truly memorable. The room was not only comfortable but also well maintained, providing a peaceful oasis amidst the bustling energy of Times Square. You can tell the staff enjoy working there and were so accommodating to other guests needs that I observed as well.  I stayed for the first time with my family this past November and stayed again for work this January. The room sizes are nice in comparison to the normal nearby hotels I have stayed at in the past. This hotel truly stands out for its commitment to excellence in hospitality and cleanliness, making it a top recommendation for anyone seeking a premium stay in the heart of New York City for a reasonable price!

title: Definitely recommend this great place
text: Hotel and room are beautiful , beds comfortable and pillows great. Location is great and all the staff are happy to help. Very secure, clean and great atmosphere! Bar has great drinks and food is excellent. Our room is above Broadway and 52nd and so QUIET, I love it !

title: M Social Times Square  ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
text:
Excellent expérience 🇺🇸
Super hotel, toujours très propre et les employés sont toujours très cordiaux et sont toujours disponibles pour nous accueillir de bras ouverts 🤗 
Hyper bien localisé, pas loin du Times Square et toujours des métro dispo. 
On a fait une jolie connaissance de la femme de ménage de notre étage, Mme Miladys, une personne hyper gentille et adorable (33ème)
On recommande à 100% ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Fun, convenient, and exceeded expectation
text: Not only is this a great location, it was vibrant, clean and friendly. Check in was smooth. Fun atmosphere. They exceeded expectations by delivering complimentary amenities to my room on a long business trip, with a hand-written note! Highly recommend.

title: Modern, funky and well appointed hotel with a brilliant location!
text: Stunning location - worth getting the rooms with a view of Time Square. We enjoyed two interconnecting rooms for our group of 4. We enjoyed hanging in the lobby, having a cocktail & the games - table top shuffle board & foosball. Breakfast was worth it and so many food options right on the doorstep.  Would stay here again and highly recommend.

title: Great view of Times Square from 25th floor Room. Nice hotel but not Exceptional!
text: The  M social hotel was perfectly located to see all the sites in New York City. The room itself was very small, but the view from the room of Times Square was fantastic. I had to ask for a coffee maker on the second day, as it wasn’t in the room when we got there. I was a bit surprised about that. All in all it was a fine hotel, but not exceptional. The elevators took a long time. I went to the bar and asked for Spanish coffee and the guy at the bar told me they don’t have any Spanish coffees only cappuccinos. I figured that a bartender would know what a Spanish coffee was. We went to see Michael Jackson the musical at the Neil Simon theater, which is located practically next-door to the  hotel, which was very convenient. There’s a lot of restaurants close and the bakery across the street is excellent. The Stardust diner is just around the corner and it was a lot of fun.

I had a very good time. The staff was amazing and attentive and made my stay so special. The view from our room was breathtaking. Cleanliness is so important to me and I felt comfortable in the room. Will definitely be back!

title: Stay of M Social
text: Big issue about checking in and double charge but rest of experience was good. Attitude and knowledge from front desk was extremely lacking. Room was comfy and clean and hotel location is excellent for all attractions.

title: Nice rooms great location
text: Trip with my daughter to see Broadway musicals. The hotel is perfectly located and nice rooms. We were in 33rd floor and there was a construction beside so we had some noise early in the morning. But nothing that we could not stand! The place was perfect!

title: Another NYC Lackluster Hotel
text: Difficult hotel to get in / out of... no way for friends or family to visit... property is so electronically locked down, ONLY the person staying in the room can only get to said floor that room is on.  If your party is in different rooms on several floors, then good luck as you cannot easily travel from room to room... total pain!  Desk clerks are good at barking at you (if you like that).  Don't ask them any easy questions unless you like looking at a "deer in the headlights".  Lastly, your stay earns you no credits as this property is not associated with any major brand... the Millennium group has a extremely limited brand base.

title: Great location
text: Great location walking distance to time square, Central Park and subway station. Friendly staff. Comfortable room with good house keeping. Good value for money. Great views of time square. Would book again.

title: Great Experience!
text: We had a great experience at the hotel. The rooms were kept tidy and clean and we had housekeeping services daily, the staff were extremely friendly and accomodating to our every need and the facilities and amenities provided were great! Our stay at M-Social alleviated the experience we had in the city!

title: Corporate Group Block - all were happy!
text: We booked a group block for a few of our executive team members, and everyone had nothing but great things to say about the hotel. The hotel staff were friendly, rooms were clean, and it was a great place for the team to meet up at night for cocktails. Rosa, their Account Director and Lorenzo their Sales & Service Manager worked wonders as our request for rooms came a day before arrival. They were quick, responsive and helpful.

title: Wonderful stay
text: This is our second time staying at the M Social in Times Square.  And the reason is because we enjoy staying here.  Great location, excellent view of Times Square from our room and the service and facilities are excellent.

title: Great location, nice, new facility
text:
Very nice rooms. Comfy beds. Hotel is clean and new. Good sound insulation. $100 for early check-in when the room is ready is a negative. They will store your luggage.  
Lobby is not on ground floor - you take elevator to 10th floor lobby.

title: Wonderful hotel and great location
text: Darlene at the front desk as so helpful - excellent customer service. Due to Alaskas 737 max issues our flight home was cancelled. The hotel let us stay an extra night without changing rooms.  Housekeepers were very friendly and our Rooms were very clean. Will definitely stay here again.

title: AMAZING!
text: I had a great time here! Perfect location and incredible view from the bar. All the staff were lovely but Evelina was so amazing and attentive with room service and was lovely too! Definitely recommend and thank you again to the wonderful Evelina!

title: Great location, areas for improvement
text: Great location! The rooms were very nice, however lighting inside the room is an issue. Bathroom is very dim with lights on. Bathrooms should be brightly lit. The lighting in the room near the mirrors is all dim, making nearly impossible to put makeup on. It took us a day to realize the headboard was the main source of lighting for the room. This could have been explained somewhere. Also, there should be coffee maker and drinking glasses.  The elevator wait  can be an issue at time. The   ground level staff could have been more welcoming, by verbally greeting guests. These are areas that can easily be improved, that being said I would return to msocial again.

title: Great stay with friendly staff
text:
We had a great stay here - the rooms were clean and spacious with great views. The staff were really lovely and welcoming to us. There is a bar and lounge area that we enjoyed relaxing in and room service was a bonus!
There wasn’t any water provided in the room which was annoying however there is a shop just on the bottom floor of the hotel to get some from easily

title: Great hotel, in a perfect place
text: We stayed over the New Year break and had a great time. Staff were friendly and helpful. The bar was great and the views brilliant. My only advice would be to try and get a room on a higher floor, above 15 ideally. Close to Time Square and great location to get out and about.

title: Great view and location but terrible experience with the cleanliness
text: We checked in on January 2nd. Our room wasn't ready till 4pm which was totally understandable due to the New Years Eve crowd. We upgraded to the Times Square view and had a great view on the 28th floor. We were excited about the room and the view until I went to use the restroom. When I lifted the lid of the toilet there was dried vomit all over the toilet seat! It was disgusting! Obviously they hadn't even tried to clean the toilet or else they would've seen it. We were running late for our reservations at Top of The Rock so I had to clean it up myself so we could use it and get going. When we returned to the hotel I went to the front desk to tell them about the issue. They sent housekeeping up to our room and she did a thorough cleaning in the bathroom. The receptionist said I should've told them about it when we checked in at 4pm. This wasn't possible because there was a long line to check in plus we didn't want housekeeping in our room with all of our stuff while we weren't there. In the end they reimbursed me $35 for a cleaning fee.

title: Good location but maintenance needed
text: The location is quite good but the rest gives room for improvement. Room rates are quite expensive. Conditions of the rooms is not good. They are old and need maintenance. The atmosphere at the lobby is like being on a bazar.

title: Disgusting
text: Mens used underwear was shoved under bathroom sink on the hairdryer, used candy wrappers right next to it. Lipstick kiss mark on window, very dusty overall. No water in room. Didn't feel comfortable at all due to the maintenance of the room.

title: Très bien
text:
Très bon accueil, très bien placé avec vue magnifique sur Time Square, très bien isolé (chambre étage 29) petit déjeuner bien garni 
Hôtel moderne, animé (bar frequenté) personnel à l’écoute et réactif . Chambre avec vue et propre …lits un peu petits .

title: Short but good
text: A family travel to New York is always a good idea but is important to sleep a rest well .. m social make this possible. I will repeat for sure in the future because the location and the people who works there at just perfect

title: Convenient, clean
text: Traveled with group of friends. Rooms comfortable, convenient location. Check-in chaotic, requiring long period standing. Personnel polite but process was very slow.  More help needed at prime check-in time (4-5 pm)

title: Bien
text: El hotel está muy bien ubicado. La habitación era grande y cómoda. Tenía unas vistas espectaculares. Me encantó. Lo único que el personal que guardaba las maletas pidió propina cuando nos íbamos porque dice que no estaba incluido el servicio en el hotel. Me molestó porque solo nos la pidió a nosotros, a los demás clientes que vi, no.

title: Emplacement idéal
text: Très bon hôtel idéalement situé. Chambre à 4 fonctionnelle, petit déjeuner complet. Personnel très agréable. Décoration de l hôtel superbe . Bémol le prix a 900 dollars la soirée du nouvel an mais c est New York et Time square …

title: Amazing!
text: Amazing location accessible by foot to many places. Great toilet water pressure super showerhead and handle very comfortable beds. Daily room cleaning without requests. Very clean lobby and vibe. The destination fee covers $10 credit per room per day, which was good to get coffees in the morning. Our family really loves this hotel and the view from the eighth floor is really really amazing.

title: New Year
text: It was a very good location and the food was exzellent but sometimes the music was too loud. The bathroom wasn't in very good condition. The bed was very good and the view was really cool. Also the Roomservice was very well organized and very tasty.

title: Fin de año
text: Pasamos unos días para despedir el 2023.La ubicación inmejorable,el desayuno muy justito, se podría mejorar creo yo, por lo que se paga. Así todo el hotel me gustó mucho, sobre todo la atención del personal.

title: Great location and very clean rooms
text: I found the hotel to be in a great location, close to Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Plaza (to see the Christmas tree) Times Square, the Theater District and multiple subway lines. The rooms were very clean and the staff was helpful. The only problem I had was I couldn't get my room cool enough for me. I like my room freezing, So the ability to make the room cooler would have been nice.

title: Great location
text: The hotel is located close to subway and within walking distance to the theater district attraction and Times Square. The hotel terrace has great view of Time Square and the ball drop for New Year’s Eve. The staff were friendly and helpful.

title: M Social
text: Hotel in New York bar room is awesome. No ice machines within 6 floors that worked. Room was a good size, shower was great. Gift shop great. Close to everything that we needed. Very nice bar room and good drinks.

title: BAD HORRRIBLE DARK LIGHTING IN ROOM but Great location
text: Beautiful and clean hotel with modern look. However, beware the room is so dark  you can not put make-up on. It is majorly inconvenient bc you lose things and can't see bc they are trying to save money by only giving you a tiny flash light connected to headboard. The best part is the  Beautiful view- totally worth the upgrade to view of times square.

title: Perfekte Lage !
text:
Lage: Das Hotel liegt sehr nah am Times Square. Viele Sehenswürdigkeiten ( Rockefeller Center, Empire State B, Central Park, Little Italy...) sind zu Fuß gut zu erreichen. 

Hotel: Das Hotel ist durch seine Lage wirklich sehr empfehlenswert. Die Zimmer sind sauber ordentlich und auch geräumig. Die Betten super gemütlich. Wir waren im 31 Stockwerk und hatten einen sehr schönen Ausblick über New York. Das Hotel verfügt über ein Restaurant und eine Bar mit Ausblick auf den Times Square. In der Lobby ist das Hotel sehr modern und kreativ eingerichtet. 

Verpflegung: Cocktails schmecken sehr gut. Preislich liegen sie bei ca. 22 Dollar. Das Essen haben wir nicht getestet. 

Personal: Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend.

title: Great stay great location
text:
We had a great stay! For first timers in NYC we felt it was great location walking distance or short subway ride to everything! 
Only minor issue was WiFi would be very slow in the room sometimes but overall everything else was great!

title: SCAMMERS.
text: I booked a room for 12/29/23. By the time I made it at 5pm I discovered that I had lost my wallet with my Driver's License and credit cards. The front desk manager asked for a photo ID and all that I had was my hospital issued ID and the card with which I had booked the hotel. My wife and I pleased with the manager for a recourse. My wife had her Driver's License and we asked if it could be booked under her name. The manager refused to entertain our request and said that the amount could not be refunded. So we lost $343. We were shocked at his cavalier attitude as he waved us away. I am Asian and feel we were discriminated because of the color of my skin. I am filing a complaint to that effect that we be refunded the amount. It was horrible experience for us.

title: Super hôtel ! Qualité et emplacement ++
text:
Vraiment une superbe découverte ! Idéalement situé pour découvrir New York, on sait dit qu’on ne pourrait pas mieux être situé ! 
Personnel au top et le + et que certaines personnes parlent français.
Je recommande 1000 fois

title: Quick Family Trip
text: Perfect Location.   Great Housekeeping.   Clean Room.  A little pricey for the accommodations,  but you are right smack in the middle of everything.  You can leave your luggage with the Bell man after checkout to continue exploring without bags.  You won't need a car.

title: Room service não funciona.
text:
A localização do hotel é excelente. O lobby não fica no térreo, precisa subir pelo elevador. O serviço de quarto não funciona; efetuei pedido de pizza e búfalo wings, porém após três horas não entregam e o contato ainda diz que vai chegar.
Atendimento sofrível tanto da recepção quanto do restaurante, não te dão retorno. 
Hotel comum, com retenção no cartão de $100 extras por dia de hospedagem,  carpete e banheiros escuros nos quartos, sem atrativo e sem cuidados com o hóspede, só vale pela localização, nada a mais.

title: Perfect for New York trip with family
text: my recent stay at M Social Hotel was a refreshingly modern oasis. From the moment I stepped into the gleaming lobby, adorned with sleek lines and minimalist artwork, I knew this was no ordinary hotel. The staff, as polished as the surroundings, greeted me with genuine warmth and attentiveness, readily answering my questions and setting the tone for a seamless experience. The staff, ever-accommodating, went the extra mile with helpful recommendations and thoughtful gestures, making the entire experience a joy for everyone, from the youngest explorer to the seasoned traveler.

title: Best place to stay in NYC
text: We visited NY during Xmas period. The MSocial was our safe place to escape from the traffic, the noise, too many people on the road. As soon as we were back at the hotel we were feeling the coziness, the kids were happy, we enjoyed some cocktails on the wonderful roof top. All staff were really nice, from the receptionist to the bar tenders and the cleaners, everyone very nice. the room was modern, cleaning service efficient, bathrooms nicely furnished and equipped with everything necessary. I would definitely book again a room in this hotel, possibly choosing a less busy period in NYC

title: Great location, great staff and nice rooms - perfect location
text:
Hotel is in a fantastic location
Times Square double double was a good size for nyc
Staff friendly
1 minute walk to subway
Air con could have been colder but I understand this is a conservation thing with all hotels
Brilliant for our first visit - beds really comfy
Fridge was a bonus - a coffee machine would have also been great

title: Great location and service
text:
Will definitely be back. This was a great location. Even though I loathe the "times square" hotels, this one is more theater district and setoff enough that you don't hear the terrible noise. The view from the lobby bar was actually nice and allowed me to appreciate Times Square in a way I haven't before. 

The lobby is very hip and happening. It felt like THE place to be, like every night. The service was very good, the rooms and views were nice. It was really just a great stay. Will def be back again when I see a show.

title: Do not recommend at all
text: The staff were friendly and the hotel is a nice hotel, but the price is overpriced for what you get. A coffee machine in the rooms doesn’t even come as standard and there is two lifts which take you down to the street level which at times can be over crowded due to people queuing. HOWEVER I checked out of this hotel on the 15th December after a couple of days stay as my original hotel had cancelled. It has now now been 9 days and the hotel have debited two payments from my account which total to £6k right before Xmas. I have raised a complaint with the hotel and still have had no resolution or communication or any refund. This has ruined any Xmas and New Years plans. Poor poor service I will never again be booking with this chain of hotels.

title: Christmas in New York
text: Enjoyed our recent stay at MSocial.  The staff were friendly and attentive.  Our housekeeper Valentina was pleasant, friendly and gave us excellent service!  We would recommend this hotel and would definitely stay there again.

title: Great location, safe and clean
text:
Really great option for visiting NYC, perfect location, freshly renovated, everything is clean and nice.

Amazing reception and housekeepong staff.

The breakfast might not be worth it and people at bar are a bit rude and pushy for tip (they add 15% tip by themself on bill for breakfast).

title: Great Location, Well decorated hotel, nice staff
text:
The location of the hotel is amazing, you get off the hotel and you are actually at the northern entrance of Time Square. There are many subway stations right next to the hotel that allow you to easily reach anywhere in the city.
The lobby of the hotel is nicely decorated with seating areas for meetings with colleagues or family, there is a nice bar and there is a $10 bar credit every day that you get at check-in. 
The lobby is surrounded by a balcony, which overlooks Times Square, and it is certainly a lovely experience to sit there and have a drink, in the months when it is not cold.
The room is nicely decorated, the size is reasonable (26 meters), the bed is very comfortable and large and I had a room with a view of Times Square on the 12th floor (room 1205) which gave me the feeling, all the time, that I was part of the mess in the Times Square and I love it.
The reception staff is nice and welcoming. There is a nice and spacious gym that includes equipment, running equipment, and free weights, which allows for a reasonable workout.
The internet is fast and high quality and of course, included in the room price.
The breakfast is rich enough and includes everything you need.
A coffee machine does not come as standard in the room.
Yes, they provide a coffee machine for those who request it - but many do not even know that it is possible to request one.
So whoever reads my response here please know that you can ask for a coffee machine and you will get it with great service from a very nice staff member.

Things to improve: 
They should add bathrobes in the bathroom,
 A magnifying mirror for shaving is a must! , because the lighting is not good enough in the bathroom when you are shaving, 
A coffee machine should come as standard in the room.
To walk downtown, you must pass through Times Square, which for some people the experience might be very claustrophobic, following the unbelievably crowdedness when you try to pass through

The price was very high but reflects the holiday season in New York.
I will return to this hotel if the prices are reasonable.

title: Better front lobby security and doorman
text: No one helped us with our luggage as we got out of Uber and we had to do it all ourselves. Not first class experience . One night we were getting into the elevator after dinner and 10 people in their 20’s pushed in and were drunk and loud . Did not belong to the hotel but never were stopped . Felt uncomfortable

title: Horrible room
text: We stayed at the M Social as part of a tour group. Location was great. Room was terrible. Our room was very small, not at all like the photos on the hotel's site. Lighting was horrendous and bathroom was small. Layout of room made no sense. TV was in a terrible location to watch. Worst part was the room was horribly hot. Got to 80 degrees which made me sick. They had turned off the air conditioning for the winter and said there was nothing we could do other than open the windows. Shower floor was very slick. Staff was very attentive and responded quickly to requests such as bringing a coffee maker to the room. Would never select this property again. For the price we paid, it was awful. We'd want a guarantee that we'd have a better room in the future before staying here.

title: It’s centrally located but just ok
text:
The hotel is decent overall. Check-in is at 4pm and all our rooms were not ready at 445pm. I was so tired that I didn’t have the energy to talk with a manager especially since it was a family trip for the day. 
Staff started knocking on the door at 8 AM to clean the room which was very irritating. 
We booked three rooms and we didn’t use a lot of their services but overall my other family members found it was just an OK. 
Nothing really stood out there. It is centrally located and was why we picked the hotel.

title: NYC at Christmas
text: Great hotel and very centrally located. Clean and well kept. NClose to many theaters and food all around you.The only  problem was a broken ice machine on our floor and no coffee in room.  Also, the lobby was very noisy in the evenings with loud music and parties. N

title: Perfect location to explore Midtown, but average hotel
text:
We liked our stay in the M Social very much. All big sights are in walking distance and the subway 1 is super close for everything further away. The hotel itself is average. The rooms are spacious, but worn. The cleaning stuff does a great job. But that does not help a laid through bed, a worn carpet, a douche that needs decalcifying and a stained daybed.

Although the room being spacious there is little room to store you clothes when staying for more than a couple of days. So we lived with an open suitcase on the daybed for a week. 
There is also no supply of drinking water available free of charge. So you either pay at the bar or go to Walgreens next door to purchase water. With that high location fee, a bottle of water a day should be included.

Breakfast is at 30USD + Tax + Tip. It looked nice, but you can get a lot cheaper options around the hotel. 

The lobby/bar are is super loud, like a bar/night club. If you like this, you will love it. But after a long day sightseeing that was too much for us.

The terrace has a terrific view. But little use for it in winter.

The hotel is perfectly located for first time visit to NYC and do a lot sightseeing walking, but only if you do not intend to spend too much time indoors in the hotel.

title: Noisy and rude
text: This hotel has an excellent location. That’s about it. Rude staff, nosy hotel (3 nights spent with no sleep as there was a family next door that left their children to their own device and the corridor was transformed into a play ground), tiny beds ( perfect for midgets) dubious towels and bed sheets) and concierge with so little knowledge about the surroundings. They won’t catch us back.

title: Love love love!!! Would definitely come back and recommend! You are in the heart of everything
text: This was such a good experience for me and my husband. It was his first time to NY, and what other place to visit besides Times Square! The hotel, staff, food, location, cleanliness was beyond amazing!

title: Never again
text: Staff was rude, we asked for a crib , I had called ahead to make sure. The manager was so rude and would not give us one. We would have brought a pack and play. we stayed last year and again this year. Will never again

title: Location, location, location
text:
What an amazing find this hotel was. Not cheap but we had the most amazing views over Times Square, spacious room, very clean. Staff were dressed in a casual style uniform which we liked, very friendly, professional & helpful. 
The bar is lovely, a little more expensive than the bars as expected from a hotel. Great location, would definitely stay there again

title: Great location
text: Hotel was in a great location, rooms were very small for 3 people, 2 adults and child. Very poor lighting in room so difficult to determine cleanliness of room. Room was serviced , we were offered tea and coffee facilities but we were afraid to get them in case it would have incurred an additional charge we weren’t aware of!

title: Trip of a lifetime
text:
This hotel is the perfect location for sight seeing and tourism in New York! Within a 10 minute walk to Central Park and 5 to Times Square most attractions are within walking distance! We stayed here on our honeymoon and the staff upgraded our room for free with a direct view of Times Square which added so much to our once in a lifetime trip! Staff were helpful for any needs we may have had, pillows and bed were very comfy which again is super helpful when needing a good nights sleep after the hustle and bustle of the city, shower was powerful and hot, had a fridge in the room free to use. 
Had to pay a fee on leaving the hotel (which I had read about in advance) just something to be wary of so you don’t get surprises, from what I read a lot of hotels in the central area also do the same. Would absolutely recommend staying here if you want a great located hotel where you step out into broadway/Times Square!

title: Wonderful Hotel & perfect location
text: The location couldn’t have been any better and the hotel itself was wonderful. We were able to walk to many of the places we wanted to see. Staff were great, especially housekeeping!! I would highly recommend staying here!

title: Excellent Hotel
text: The location and amenities were the BEST!! we highly recommend this hotel especiallu if you want tl be close to everything. Timesquare is just 5mins. away and there are a lot of restaurants and groceries store near this place, It’s also clean and Enjoyable to stay here

title: Location, location, location
text: What a fantastic hotel, the location was perfect as was our view over Times Square. Staff were great, bar is nice, the place is clean, modern and without a doubt the best hotel we’ve stayed in New York over the years we’ve been visiting. Highly recommended

title: Good view but arrogant check in
text: We are once a year in NY and for the first time we chosen this hotel. The location next Times Square was good but we had an very awful arrogant check in. Sorry for that. We had friendly and also not very helpful staff.

title: Exceptional Stay !  Loved it
text: Great hotel with fantastically clean rooms and environment all around. Pleasant and very helpful staff who go above and beyond to make your stay enjoyable. Highly recommend, great rooms and location right where you would want to be to explore NYC

title: Girls’ Trip
text: My friends and I had a great stay here. We loved the location and found that most of the staff were extremely friendly and helpful. We appreciated the bag drop option, since we arrived prior to our checkin time.

title: Great hotel
text: I would recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to New York City. It’s in the middle of everything, so extremely easy to great anywhere we needed to go, the hotel was very clean and tidy and the staff were amazing

title: Fun location to celebrate anniversary!
text:
My partner & I arrived very early to the hotel, so the bottom floor staff offered to hold our bags for us while we ventured the city. When we were ready to relax our feet, we retrieved our bags again (with the ticket they gave us to confirm our things), and we took an elevator that went up to the main lobby. There was a small fee to pay to enter our hotel room before check-in time, so that's important to note in case you're traveling on a tight budget.

We were given a room on the 24th floor, with a nice wide bed that was comfortable to sleep in. Our room appeared to be the most distant from the others, and the walls were so thick I barely heard anyone the entire time I was staying there. I theorized that this had something to do with what my partner told the hotel beforehand. He specified to them that we were coming here to celebrate our anniversary, so just in case this was intentional, then I did notice and appreciated the effort put into giving us as much privacy as possible.

The room came with the essentials, including a TV, mini-fridge & safe. There was no microwave, but it didn't bother me since we mostly went outside to eat. There is also a bar in the lobby area to grab some food until the late evening.

We ordered here a couple of times, mostly for room service, and everything was fresh and super yummy. I particularly loved the crispy potatoes that came with my spinach omelet for breakfast.

This hotel is conveniently placed just a couple of blocks away from Times Square. So, you can live out a night of glitz & glam, then return to your hotel where it's much less condensed.

You can find many things to do in the city, but if you're still questioning what to explore first, the lobby carries a bunch of pamphlets for attractions you can visit. Personally, we stopped by Bryant Park for the Christmas season and drank the incredible Italian hot chocolate from Max Brenner, as well as tried bao & truffle fries while we watched people ice skating. We also saw the broadway musical, Hadestown, and we stopped by the Museum of Modern Art (MOMA).

I recommend this hotel for anybody, including people whose first language isn't English. I came across many Spanish speaking visitors, and I saw a French-speaking employee helping out a customer. This can be a comfortable stay for people of all backgrounds, and it is also family friendly. While there is a bar right by check-in, they ensure you are 21+ to drink (I know for a fact, because they needed to see my ID. I took it as a compliment).

I would say the biggest issues that could come from staying here would be that it is a popular destination, especially with their NYE packages, so be prepared for huge crowds storming the lobby for the holidays. However, that is a small concern versus the many praises I give to this establishment. I would definitely come again!

title: Desastroza
text:
Es la 7ma vez que visito Nueva york y es el peor hotel en que me he hospedado! La atención malisima! La única persona con calidad humana es la recepcionista Vanesa!  
El hotel es un desastre de comienzo a fin ! 0 recomendable!
No te tratan como ser humano te tratan como delincuente!

title: Large room, great location
text: The room was large for NYC and the location was great for Times Square, Radio City and Rockefeller. The bed and pillows were comfortable. The faucet in the bathroom was rusty and the sink was shallow making water splash everywhere and the bar hand soap was terrible. Could use little renovations to those and small areas like the wall paper around the elevator button was filthy.

title: Great views, rude staff.
text: Room and views were amazing, sadly however the staff were very rude and judgemental which is not expected from a high end hotel. Would not recommend this hotel based on staff attitude as this affected my experience greatly.

title: Wonderful
text: This is a wonderful hotel with awesome staff Mr. Al at reservations and Mr. Yvan in dining room were awesome. Clean rooms friendly staff members food was delicious. I am very picky and I usually find something wrong when I stay in hotels. However this hotel checked off all my boxes and I have no complaints the location is remarkably clean the view was amazing just an awesome overall experience thank you msocial staff

title: A Family Weekend Get-together
text:
MSocial Hotel Times Square NY provided my family an amazing Xmas weekend experience. The friendly competent staff, especially 
Maariyah El-Shabazz (Catering Sales Manager) and 
Lorenzo Mangum (Complex Sales Manager) created a wonderful family experience.
The food, accommodations and friendly, helpful staff met our every need,
We'll be back!!!!!

title: Snazzy, lively, upscale hotel in Times Square
text: Stayed 3 nights for a conference at the nearby Hilton midtown. M Social was a great location in TImes Square, a clean and friendly oasis, nice to escape the busy street life. I did not eat at the restaurant or visit the bar, but there was live music and the vibe was nice.

title: Great place to stay especially if you are seeing shows.
text: The hotel staff are awesome and they have a great lobby bar with live music and great view.  Rooms are nice, nice restaurant and one of the more affordable hotels close to Times Square.  Definitely a great value compared to other hotels in close proximity.  Will definitely stay again next time in NYC!

title: Posizione top a caro prezzo
text: Posizione perfetta ma a caro prezzo. Struttura moderna con camere essenziali ma non piccolissime considerate le precedenti esperienze a NY.  Pulizia delle camere migliorabile così come il rapporto qualità prezzo che francamente pur considerando la posizione resto un po’ troppo alto. Magari se prenotato con qualche offerta può diventare piu interessante. Nell insieme consigliato

title: Great stay
text: The hotel was clean, had a great view of Times Square, and the food was delicious! The elevators are on the ground level, but the lobby is on the 5th floor, so there awsa wait at the elevators. Security was good!

title: Great Stay
