text: Location was great. Staff was super friendly. Loved that you can store your luggage with them after check out to be able to explore the city without toting around all your luggage! Would definitely stay again.

title: EXPERIENCIA DESAFORTUNADA!
text:
Experimentamos inconvenientes notables durante nuestra estadia en el hotel. A pesar de haber solicitado pagar en efectivo, nos informaron que solo era posible hacerlo en el check-out..nos sorprendió que nos solicitaran una tarjeta de crédito como garantía para cubrir la TOTALIDAD de la estadía, algo que no habíamos experimentado en otros hoteles en Nueva York ni en otras partes del mundo.

El personal demostró una actitud desfavorable y poco dispuesta a ayudarnos, especialmente considerando que éramos dos mujeres solas en Nueva York. En lugar de buscar soluciones, nos encontramos con un bloqueo en el acceso a nuestra habitación al día siguiente, con nuestras pertenencias dentro, diciendonos de muy mala manera que no ibamos a poder subir hasta que paguemos toda la estadia… se mostraron totalmente inflexibles a comprender nuestra situación, ya que en Argentina no es común contar con tarjetas ilimitadas o con grandes montos disponibles. A pesar de nuestras múltiples ofertas y solicitudes, no se nos permitió excepcionalmente pagar en efectivo.

En resumen, nuestra experiencia fue negativa, sobretodo por la falta de atención y calidez humana por parte del personal. Queremos destacar a la unica recepcionista Vanesa Tejada, quien hizo esfuerzos por ayudarnos, pero que los managers les negaban.

Malisima experiencia, no se los recomiendo para nada!

title: Highly recommend
text: I stayed here with my 15 year old daughter and we loved our stay! We both loved playing games and hanging out on the comfy couches in the lobby. It has such a fun atmosphere and the view is amazing. Room was super quiet and a good size for NYC. Great location, felt very safe, we walked to Central Park and Rockefeller Center. Cute bakery across the street.

title: Excellent experience
text: The MSocial was fantastic.   Excellent staff, very efficient.   Wonderful location.   Room was very clean with comfortable bed.   Bathroom was more spacious than in most NYC hotels which is a great plus.   Would highly recommend.

title: Great value , location and quiet!
text: NYC is expensive and when you just need a clean, spacious, quiet room to crash, it is hard to pay a super high price. M Social Times Square has a perfect location that meets all of these needs. Bed was comfortable, high floor meant we heard nothing, shower was super hot. We had a great experience. I highly recommend.

title: Wonderful Hotel in NYC
text: Hands down, this is the best place to stay for access to theatres, restaurants and Times Square. My sister and I had the most enjoyable stay. The restaurant is good for a quick dinner, and the lobby area is very inviting with sofas and chairs all around.

title: December in Times Square
text: We stayed here based on positive reviews and based on the cost per night. Most places were extremely expensive during December. This was proximate to Times Square and Rockefeller center so it was perfect for this time of year. Our room was extremely small and our TV didn’t work. It wasn’t a deal breaker because we were hardly in the room. Overall it is a decent hotel and our stay was pleasant. Staff was nice!

title: Excellent everything
text: The hotel is beautiful, the rooms are warm, spacious, the beds are super comfortable, the room and bathroom are clean, the cleanliness is extraordinary, the bar is great and the terrace is incredible, the attention of all the staff is extraordinary and the location is excellent.

title: Great location!
text: Lovely hotel located on the upper end of Times Square. We had a partial view of Times Square and were to MJ, Back to the Future, Ellen’s stardust diner etc. while being out of the main hustle and bustle of Times Square.

title: It can't get better
text: I have experienced this Hotel for the first time and I have to say, that I can't wait to come again. Pricewas a little bit high, but if you have in mind, that it is the christmas period, then is aaeptable. To stay, The lifts seem a little bit unsafe and old. We have stucked twice in our 5 days stay. Great view and and the location is top. very friendly service, especially the Irish guy. :-)

title: Great stay at the M Social, we will be back!
text:
Great stay at the M Social for 4 nights in September. 

Checked in early at no extra cost, great staff and super friendly. The room was spotless upon check in and even everyday after a long day of signseeing, we would come back and the place was clutter free and clean again. We had a ball drop view room overlooking Times Square which was stunning.

The location of the hotel is in the heart of the city and we loved where it was situated. The outside terrace on the main floor was also overlooking Times Square and a great vibe with my partner, enjoying cocktails of an evening.

The bar in the hotel was great, we were able to leave a tab for the duration of our stay and the bar staff were always welcoming ane happy to see us again whenever we were there. We enjoyed one meal at the hotel one night, which was lovely, food was great.

One thing we were wary about while staying at this hotel was the noise (even brought earplugs) and to our surprise, of a night getting into bed, you couldn't hear a thing and we didn't even have to pull out ear plugs once.

The only downside to the location of the room was the smell, if the windows were open in the room at any point during our stay, the smell of the food stands on the street (burning smell/smoke) and the hotel kitchen would make its way into our room and would linger for a few hours.

Great location in terms of the subway and walking distance to all of the top attractions. 

It can be quite expensive to stay here however, I would 100% recommend it and would even return to the hotel again if we come back to New York.

title: Anniversary trip
text: The stay at the hotel was great. We had a lovely surprise in our room, a nice bottle of wine and water with a sweet note congratulating us on 10 years. This attention to detail as well as all the general details will keep us coming back.

title: Nice
text: We stayed 4 nights. It was a good location. The hotel and room was clean. The Housekeeping staff was excellent. The one negative was the shower. The water all came out on the side and the placement of the shower was toward the right side. Very awkward.

title: Holiday!
text: Enjoyed our stay. Good location. Rooms comfortable and clean with all the bits you need & some great free extras (safe, fridge). Thought the bar was a bit like a student halls but we didn’t need to use that so no bother to us. Generally a good hotel with friendly staff.

title: good for nyc
text: It's a crowded spot and a crowded hotel, what can you say -- par for the course for Times Square, I guess. We're very familiar with NYC and would not have stayed in the area if it weren't for a late-night engagement we needed to be at in that part of town. Overall the hotel was a pleasant surprise: the room was on the small side, but again what can you expect from NYC, and in spite of the amount of people staying in the hotel, the elevators were only a little bit crowded, and we didn't have any noise problems. The destination fee is a bit of a pain, but it was communicated very, very clearly. The lounge/bar section was again, par for NYC: service was sufficiently good, wait for a drink was kinda long, but it all was acceptable and I certainly don't regret choosing the hotel!

title: Buen hotel para visitar NY
text:
La ubicación es espectacular y el hotel tiene increíbles vistas. Muy recomendable para visitar NY.
Quizas para mejorar es más variedad en el desayuno, ya que cuando llevas muchos días te gustaría comer otras cosas.

title: NYC
text: Great hotel. Amazing location, close to everything. Staff was amazing and always willing to help. Helped us each morning figure out how to get where we needed to go! Bar was nice, and had a great view!

title: M Social Room Air Conditioning
text:
Beware of M Social's un-air conditioned rooms. As told to me by their own front desk and engineering departments, on October 15 (this year) M Social turned off the building's A/C chillers - an annual routine. So no rooms in the hotel have air conditioning until the chillers are brought back online once the outside temperature in NYC gets above 70°. Rooms get warm even in December, even when the current outdoor temperature is 51°.

The front desk and engineering will advise you to just open your room windows. Hopefully, your windows won't be right above Times Square! Right above Times Square in December. Right above honking horns playing "Overture in F Natural". 😕

title: Simply fabulous!
text: OMG absolutely loved this hotel. Can’t fault it, clean throughout, staff lovely great food and drinks, great roof top views over Times Square. Hotel seemed busy but once in room never heard a sound. Had a partial Times Square view which was lovely, some street noise that you expect but nothing that disturbs you, Just simply loved everything!  great vibe and great for solo to family travellers. Clean and tidy throughout. Rooms were usual size for New York, we were never in them for a great length of time, the foyer was great to hangout in, during the evening and plenty of space there. Will definitely be staying here again.

title: Awesome Hotel
text: Great hotel in a superior location near Time Square. Pet friendly accomodations which allowed us to bring our entire family on this special trip. Enjoyed our 2-day stay at this hotel and all our needs were attended to while there. Thank you!

title: Visit ny
text: Very good location nice hotel very clean the bar and the lobby very special with good lounge music. The room was clean quiet nice and the beds very comfortable. Close to Times Square and beautiful view from the room we had

title: A great, spacious hotel at a perfect location!
text: A great lounge area between reception and bar, fun bar, comfortable and quiet room and best location in mid-Manhattan - this is the hotel to stay at!  Bar terrace looks out to Times Square!  I will definitely be staying here again.

title: Great Stay!
text:
Great Location, just a few blocks away from craziness of Times Square.
Friendly staff, and clean room.
Check-in was smooth and utilized express check-out.
Reserved taxi cab for departure to airport and it was ready and waiting in the morning.

title: Small Beds  poor service
text:
Beds extremely small, not suitable for our family.

No alternative or resolution to our complaint.

I wouldn't return to  the hotel and extremely unhappy that our holiday has started with this poor experience 

.

title: Great hotel 🏨 n NYC, clean and convenient!
text: This is a terrific hotel in the heart of midtown, walkable to theatres, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, Herald Square. Very clean, well equipped rooms with frig, and a quiet night’s sleep. Highly recommend!

title: Utterly Disappointed
text: Having booked this hotel in January 2023 for a family trip to New York, we were greeted by the reception staff at 19:30 in the evening only to be told that our hotel reservation had been cancelled by the hotel and our room sold on and that they didn’t have anything else available for us as they were fully booked. We were travelling with our 9yo and had effectively been made homeless in NYC. I had received a text message that morning saying how excited they were to welcome us to the hotel and therefore had suspected nothing was wrong. Having spent the day travelling to New York without any internet connection, was told that they had emailed me to tell me that my credit card had been declined that morning and needed me to contact them. Why they didn’t try to contact me via phone or text message I don’t know as I would have been able to respond to that. I was expecting to pay at the hotel on arrival as per my confirmation email, not to be billed earlier in the day and then have our room sold on without properly trying to contact us to resolve the issue. The manager of the hotel did nothing to help us find alternative accommodation as he was too busy dealing with his other customers and it wasn’t his problem. Utterly disappointed with this place and having emailed a complaint to both the hotel and the group, I have been ignored on both fronts. Do not stay here!

title: Brilliant would go again great atmosphere
text:
We went here for evening meal on the 26/11/2023
We was greated by yvens he took us to are table and told us all about the menu the food and cocktails were amazing and so was the cheesecake the decor and views was awesome would 100% go back lovely place if you want a lovely meal away for all the hustle and bustle the restaurant is called beast and butterflies

title: Return trip to M Social
text:
The hotel was in great condition once again.  The staff was very friendly especially the Bartender at night and Michelle in housekeeping who cleaned my room. Loved the location and my room view of Time Square. The front desk agent that checked me in did Amazing. She was training.
Thank you.

title: So much love for M Social Hotel
text:
I haven’t been to NYC for about 10 years, and I’m so happy that I chose M Social Hotel. The rooms are modern, and really comfortable. The location is really central with excellent access to Broadway, Central Park and the surrounding areas. 
I’d like to also congratulate the amazing bar staff, Victor, Christian and Diego. Their care, friendliness and attention to detail really made our visit even more special. Thank you all for an amazing Thanksgiving holiday. We’ll be back, I promise. Xxx

title: Clean, comfortable, conveinent in heart of NYC
text: Clean and comfortable hotel, completely quiet rooms and sufficiently spacious. Fun lobby and outdoor terrace. Very centrally located. We were able to easily walk to Broadway shows, Times Square, Rockefeller Center, shopping, etc. I would highly recommend.

title: Vivere in pieno la city
text:
Perfetto in pieno centro, pulito e sicuro. Colazione abbondante e varia, vista strepitosa, camere confortevoli. Posizione eccellente a due passi da tutto. Ascensori veloci e mai affollati. Lo consiglio vivamente 
Grazie

title: Perfect location
text: I couldn’t have asked for a better hotel. You are right in time square, walkable to so many great places - Central Park, Rockefeller Center, Broadway, Hells Kitchen Bryant Park, etc. The rooms are very quiet, we never heard our neighbors and the hotel was fully booked. All of the staff was friendly, hotel was very clean. All around a great experience, we will be back for sure.

title: Fine Hotel
text: Stayed in a couple of hotels in Washington and New York but this was by far the best for my budget. Location is good and the hotel staff were positive and friendly. Bedroom was comfortable and bathroom clean.

title: Not a family or really people friendly staff, unless you meet “their” class standards.
text:
I took my daughter into the city for her 10th birthday. I had called ahead numerous times to set up a special surprise for our arrival, and even just the day before was told all was set. We get to the hotel and upon check in I learn the person I have been in contact with was off or out for the day but was assured all was set up. We got to our room and there was absolutely nothing there. 5 minutes after we got to our room the day manager Devon and the head of security came to our room and asked to come in and check the in room safe as apparently the guest who checked out the night before had left stuff in the safe. There was over $2,000 worth of stuff in there and we gladly let them do what they needed, as they were leaving I asked if the surprise was still on and he said yes. Now we are on the way out to a broadway show and I stopped at the desk and talked to a tall woman with greyish blond hair who said she spoke with her manager and said that’s not something that they were going to do. I was beyond disappointed. I had been told on multiple occasions that this was going to happen, I offered to pay for any of it if needed and was assured that it was fine, and then I simply got a dismissal from this woman like we were not worth her time. My daughter even said she was like a Disney villain looking down her nose at us.
I do not recommend this hotel to any families or anyone who wants to be treat like you matter even a little bit.

title: Location, Location , Location
text: I highly recommend the MSocial hotel! The location is on Times Square but not in the thick of Times Square. This hotel is centrally located and within walking distance to many local attractions. There are several subway stations close by. The hotel itself has spacious rooms ( we had a 2 queen room) that are clean and overlook Times Square. There’s an amazing restaurant and bar and a huge wrap around patio that overlooks Times Square. Check in and Check out was a breeze and they will store your luggage until you are ready to leave. Great hotel and friendly staff.

title: I have I good time in the hotel thanks
text: Nice hotel,room  clean, organice everting on point and excellent staff , right in down town, nice view ,good for have fun in the city,  I have great time tanks to all the staff I will come back soon !!!!🙌🏻👍🏽

title: The perfect experience
text:
Excellent for a vacation, the staff is very friendly, the place is very nice. I definitely recommend it and I will come back because we had an excellent time. 
If you are looking for a place to stay this Christmas, this is the perfect place for you.

title: Recomendado 100%
text: Me gustó la estadía , todos muy amables , el lugar limpio y muy accesible! Espero regresar pronto .  Me sentía cómoda durante mi estadía y mi amistades  así me hicieron saber.  Recomiendo a mis amigos y familiares visitar el lugar

title: Amazing hotel to stay!
text: I love the location. The view was amazing. The housekeeping personnel were so kind and helpful. Very clean property. 100% recommended.  I stayed with my family and we had a good time. My kids loved the games at the lobby area and we loved the bar.

title: Friendly staff and excellent location
text: The room was not well cleaned and having a shower curtain is not practical. However, the location is great, the view too and the restaurant venue is amazing. I was travelling solo and felt very welcomed. In other hotels, we get a small gift on bday and that would have been the cherry on the cake.

title: Great location but rooms were rather noisy
text: Hotel’s very close to Times Square & many restaurants & theaters. The rooms were rather noisy. Amenities in hotel not that great & room cleaning was  rather careless.  They would ignore do not disturb sign, & cleaned the room.  But yet the cleaners did not notice tissues were on the last 2 sheets  & also not bothering to wind back up the hair dryer cord.

title: Just Average
text:
Disappointing to say the least. The location is so close to Times Square that it’s perfect. 
My disappointment starts with getting from the street to the lobby. There are 2 smallish elevators to get to the lobby. At any given time there could be a number of people trying to get up or down which means waiting a few minutes just to get in the elevator. 
Next is the size of the rooms. I understand it’s New York but wow. 2 adults and 2 kids with 3 ½ suitcases made the room tiny. The tv lost reception far too often and was unwatchable. Checking out and expecting to get my $400 holding deposit back but they slap me with a destination fee. It was 5am and too tired to even think WTF is a destination fee. Next time they should incorporate that fee into the room rate.
I think I’ll choose more wisely next time

title: Spotless and friendly
text: Beautiful hotel in the heart of Manhatten, central to everything. Fantastic location and friendly staff. The doormen and the cleaning staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Room was left spotless daily.

title: Hotel in the heart of Manhattan at an affordable price
text: This was our first stay in New York, and this hotel turned out to be a fantastic choice. The rooms were very quiet despite the hotel being located in the center of Manhattan. We were also surprised by the price, which compared to other hotels, wasn't exorbitant.

title: Right on Broadway
text: Location was amazing and made everything convenient. We were able to walk to Central Park and it was very close to multiple subway stops. If you want to take any tours it’s right on time square which is typically the first pick up point.

title: It was perfect
text: I'm a  native New Yorker but haven't stayed in NYC in a very long time. I had no idea where to go. I checked out the larger hotels but they were so expensive. Someone recommended Citizen M and I figured I'd give it a try. Wow. It's a great little boutique hotel - very european style. The rooms are small but functional. The bed was very comfortable. The customer service was the best ever. The breakfast was great. The location was perfect. I would stay again and again. And see a Broadway show while you're there of course.

title: Clean and great location
text: Clean, great location, great city view of Times Square. Nice amenities. Modern with nice restaurant for breakfast (buffet) and dinner. Stayed two nights. Room size is BIG for NYC. Have stayed in some hotels with very little rooms.

title: Great location ... awesome rooftop patio
text: This hotel has a great location and a very Euro vibe.  The rooms were very clean and the staff was helpful.  Breakfast was not included and was overpriced.  Morning coffee was $5... Check in and check out was efficient. The very best part was the roof top patio, we loved having cocktails day and night.... a great view of Time Square!

title: Always a good choice!
text:
Fantastic location. We love citizen M for their quirky rooms and decor, and we've always had a positive experience with the staff. This is the 4th time we've stayed at a Citizen M hotel and the experience has always been good! 
Our room was actually larger than expected and I loved the large window, nothing like sitting there in the morning watching the sun rise over those classic NYC buildings. 
So close to Broadway and literally next to Times Square! Subway is right next to the entrance too.

title: Novembre a NY
text: L'albergo è situato in una posizione strategica, facilmente raggiungibile dall'aeroporto JFK tramite la linea E, attorniato da linee metropolitane (1.2.3. ABC) che permettono di raggiungere le principali attrazioni della City. Si trova subito a ridosso di Times Square, di cui si ha una splendida visuale dalle camere con vista su essa (io stavo al 30 piano). Nota dolente....le camere! sono un pò vissute e quindi presentano i segni del tempo, e delle riparazioni "subite". Io sono stato costretto a cambiare camera (2904) perchè alla prima doccia si è staccata la tenda e la mattonella che teneva uno dei supporti. Il personale ha subito provveduto al cambio camera, ma in quest'altra non funzionava bene il doccino...pazienza. Nel complesso, in base ad altri alberghi e camere in cui ho soggiornato, il costo sostenuto vale solo la vista su Times Square. Nel complesso l'albergo offre tutti i servizi necessari al soggiorno, due postazioni PC con stampante, un mini shop dove acquistare le "dimenticanze", una console giochi per i ragazzi ( a detto di mio figlio non aggiornatissima!), la lobby è molto accogliente ed il roof esterno ha una visuale strepitosa. Non ho utilizzato nè il bar ne il servizio colazione (quindi non so darvi indicazioni). Subito fuori dall'ingresso trovate un supermarket dove rifornirvi di tutto (il frigobar viene dato vuoto), e "Angelina", dove fare una buona colazione "dolce". Per tutto il resto.....andate e provate.

title: Ottimo soggiorno a Times Square
text:
Ottima struttura a due passi da Times Square, sulla 52ma strada. Insonorizzazione perfetta, camera grande e spaziosa. Buone caffetterie ai piedi dell'albergo (ma possibilità di acquistarla in struttura).
Consigliato!

title: Just Perfect
text: Perfect view - Time Square view, perfect Breakfast, Perfect location, Perfect bar, Friendly staff, easy access if you are traveling with the car. Its a perfect place to experience the City that never sleeps!

title: October week vacation
text:
We stayed at M Social for one week. The hotel was modern and clean. Beautiful setting overlooking Times Square. A perfect location for first timers to NYC to base themselves to see the sights.

Room was good, maybe could have done with a little more clothes storage, lived out of our bag for a week, but was able to hang some clothes. Room is minimalistic in style. A coffee machine would have been good, but there are plenty of places locally to grab one so not a deal breaker. Fridge was useful.

Our house keeper Evangelina on floor 25 was a delight and welcomed us with a smile every day. She is a credit to the hotel!

We used the bar a few times, good service and selection of drinks. A little pricey overall, but the $10 discount included in the destination fee helped with this.

We had a brilliant time in New York and recommend the M Social as a reasonable priced hotel with very good location to see the sights.

title: Wonderfull scenic view at the rooftop !
text: Hotel in the midtown of manhattan, very charming and appealing. Rooms are very comfortable, very quiet, very spacious and clean. Living, bar and rooftop are very pleasant to take a drink and to diner. Thank you !

title: Everything was perfect but...
text: I really have nothing to complain about except that we had a room that could be connected to another room by opening the door. The door itself was not really sound proof so you could hear the neighbours talking. I would take that over a lower level floor anytime but sound dampening these doors would be adviseable. Not sure how many rooms are that way so maybe it usually isn't an issue. Other than that: I can recommend that hotel.

title: Top location with sensational bar terrace with a view.
text: We enjoyed the lounge and bar/restaurant area very much as well as the breakfast service. The location with a huge outdoor area where you can look over the lively Broadway adjacent to Times Square is mind-blowing.

title: Idéalement situé à Manhattan
text: La localisation est idéale, proche de tout et calme avec une chambre en hauteur avec vue sur l'Hudson. Le personnel qui fait le ménage est au top. Le rooftop est très sympa. L'espace au niveau du lobby avec les grands canapés a un look moderne et jeune

title: Great location, shame about the wait for breakfast!!
text: Overall an excellent hotel in a fantastic location for sightseeing.  We had a room on 31st floor overlooking Times Square so really couldn’t complain about the view!  The room are small though but no a problem if you are out all day.  My only criticism of the hotel is the long line (queue) for breakfast.  We had to wait up to 30 minutes to get seated on all 4 days of our visit.  I was told that the dining area size was reduced after covid.  Maybe it is time to increase it again.  There is plenty of space adjustment to the eating area.  Staff were all very helpful and courteous.  Would have been 5 out of 5 if the dining experience hadn’t been so disappointing.

title: Great stay in a perfect hotel
text: We had a perfect stay in this Hotel! Perfect room with Times Square view, always clean and cozy mood! Employees are very friendly and helpful! We will come back for sure! M Social, thanks for having us ♥️

title: Vacation in NYC at M Social Times Square
text: My stay at M Social Times Square was wonderful.  The hotel and room were very clean.  The staff friendly and very responsive.  I could barely hear a sound in my room on the 23rd floor and the blackout curtains were great!  Having a mini fridge in the room was a bonus. Room is very spacious, especially for NY standards. Walking distance to theaters, restaurants and subways.

title: Very nice boutique hotel in great location
text:
Beautifully restored hotel in the most amazing location. Walk out the door & you can walk everywhere. Metro also on doorstep
Breakfast was good, lots of options, I would give it a 7/10
Rooms were clean & comfortable & pretty big for Paris standards.
Bar service was very slow, they could definitely get better. Would stay here again

title: Great hotel, family friendly, great location,
text: M Social is great for families. It has a games console in the lobby to play video games, along with other games and entertainment. There is also a great Bar. I went with a 10 month old and a 7 year old and there was lots to do. You can ask for a baby crib. We also were provided with a kettle and microwave once asked. The location is great- Times Square is on your doorstep and all of the theatres.

title: Amazing experience in time square
text:
I love the hotel and the zone everything it’s so close the service staff all the time with a smile the views are amazing I’m come back soon because New York have many many places to go it’s a good option from your future trips I loved 
Thanks

title: Splendida posizione
text: Hotel centralissimo, modernissimo e molto confortevole. Personale molto gentile. Unico neo la colazione… celiaci state alla larga.. per chi , come me, ha questo problema, non ha molta scelta, come in tutta la città, dopo tutto 🤷🏻‍♀️

title: Well Located With Spectacular Views
text: We enjoyed a few days at MSocial Tomes Square. The hotel is really well located and has a great bar terrace overlooking Broadway and Times Square. The staff are attentive and the atmosphere is friendly and relaxed.

title: Right in New Times square
text: Great location, terrace with awesome view of New Times Square in restaurant level, decent breakfast, polite staff. Clean room, although a bit small for a family of four. Lots of restaurants around, walking distance to Central Park.

title: The Place to stay in Times Square
text: Amazing experience! From the details and treatment in the reception to the amenities, view, location and rooftop. Beautiful and clean place, close to theaters, parks, stores and steps of the heart of Times Square, what you can watch from the rooftop.

title: Location
text: Great location for theater goers - easy walk from hotel to theaters - 5 to 6 blocks up from Times Square - hotel has great lobby for sitting, waiting, having a drink, great views, outdoor patio - rooms have mini fridge - love this hotel!

title: Excellent stay
text: We had a wonderful 3 night stay at the m social Times Square. The hotel is ideally located right at Times Square. The hotel itself is very modern and kept beautifully clean. Our room overlooked Times Square and was a fine big room. We would highly recommend the hotel for your stay.

title: A real mixed bag
text:
I will start with the biggest problem.  We have booked two times square view rooms  and at the booking we selected and requested interconnecting rooms, in writing.  Then, I called them and explained why we needed interconnecting rooms (disabled guests).  Then, three weeks before our stay, I was in the area and I walked in in person and asked them again to ensure the rooms were going to be interconnected, I had even offered to pay extra to guaratee that they were.  They said they cannot guaranteed but see no reson why they wouldn't be able to accommodate.  Guess what, when we checked in, the rooms weren't even on the same floor, let alone interconnected.  And here's my problem, just exactly WHAT could I have done to get interconnected rooms? I booked the correct rooms, I wrote, I called, I turned up in person, I offered money - why in the world could they not try to accommodate?  How difficult is it to look at a reservation, and block the two rooms so that nobody books over them?  And when I queried this, the answer was a bog standard "computer says no", instead of proactively trying to find a solution.  

After a lot of back and forth (and me being in near tears), they managed to find a solution where they would move one of us after 1 night, so the majority of our stay would be in interconnected rooms, that did end up happening, but by this time our vacation was off to a very bad start.   And what absolutely baffled me, was the absolute contempt with which they treated their customers.  For instance, one of the staff told us that when we were moving rooms, we could leave our bag in the old room and they will transfer them (which was nice) - then , another staff member scoffed us at that, as if indicating that we had been too lazy to move them ourselves (!).  And when they did move us in the end, they acted like they were doing us the biggest favour - when in fact we booked, requested and GOT PROMISED the correct rooms and it was their mistake that we had to move.  I seriously never felt like an appreciated guest here.  I promise I wasn't being a karen, but now in hindsight I kind of wish I had asked for the manager to give this feedback in person. 

And it didn't get much better.  One evening went down to the bar, we needed two seats but an area was roped off, so I asked a waiter to find us somewhere to be - the answer was "we are full" and he walked away.  I didnt want to give up, I walked over to the bar, asked a woman if the seat next to her was taken, she said no, I took the seat, asked another elsewhere, same thing, puled the two seats next to eachother, and voila, we sorted our problem within 57 seconds - this is what the staff member should have done, find a solution for the customer, make them feel welcome.  Same "I don't care" attitude as with the rooms.  

Breakfast was in the restaurant which is lovely with the views but the food itself is so so, it's your bog standard breakfast stuff with very little variety.   Most mornings everything was fine but one of the last mornings we ran into the same "I dont care about you" attitude by the hostess who refused to find a solution for us where we turned up 4 people - another colleague of hers (maybe the manager) had to step in and sort things out, which he kindly did.   

At the check out, the guy was perfectly lovely but not a single word about "how was your stay" or "was everything all right", stuff that hotels normally ask you at checkout.  Nothing. Checking out?  Here's the bill - bye. Staff need to lose the arrogant attitude.

I will finish on the positives.  The rooms were  clean, adequately sized and the bed was clean and comfortable, we slept well here.  The views were great.  There was one guy at the restaurant who was always lovely, polite and smiley (wore glasses - I think he was a manager).  The location is perfect and the general atmosphere/clietele/vibe was nice.  Nice touch on the games in the lounge, entertaining for the kids.  Speaking of kids, my son got a toy new york taxi at check in, that was also a nice touch.  

Overall, a mixed bag.

title: Location Location Location
text: This hotel is located in Time Square. It is walking distance to many great restaurants. The views are amazing. Surprisingly the shower was one of my favorite features. Rain shower gave a spa vibe. The city view room was wonderful but noisy with traffic from Time Square until about 2am. That would not stop us from staying there again.

title: NYC stay family trip oct 2023
text: Great place and location to stay. In the heart of midtown near Times Square. Also great view on Times Square from restaurant/bar/terras. Friendly and professional staff, near metro, broadway theatres etc.

title: Perfect location
text: Nice big room, walking distance to all the theatres, restaurants and subway. Very quiet too. Loved the roof terrace and the very social lobby and helpful people at the reception. We did not have breakfast in the hotel, too expensive.

title: Thank you to the M Social Staf!
text: I am a huge fan of this M Social property and feel so lucky to work with the Sales and Events teams consistently through my job. I stayed at this hotel for the first time recently and had an exceptional experience. The lobby is well equipped and I appreciated the convenience store by the front desk. There are plenty of places to go in NYC for snacks and water but it made my day to not have to venture past the lobby. You can't beat the view of Times Square and the room was clean and comfortable.

title: Tolles Hotel in toller Lage
text: Ein wunderschönes Hotel mitten am Times Square. Perfekt, wenn man schwere Shoppingtaschen zwischendurch wegbringen möchte oder kurz eine Pause braucht. Die Mitarbeiter waren alle freundlich. Beim Frühstück hätten wir uns mehr Auswahl gewünscht.

title: Average hotel with exceptional views and excellent terrace
text:
Stayed at M Social New Your Times Square during October 2023. Hotel was right on Times Square and had an amazing view from our room (we requested a 'Times Square' view when booking). Even if you don't have this view from your room there is a great terrace that looks onto Times Square but be aware that this can get busy.
Hotel was good - rooms roughly equivalent to a nice Premier Inn in the UK. We weren't after luxury so this was fine and anyway, hotels in this location are really expensive so bear than in mind so you're not expecting too much. Room was a good size - no bath, just a shower but not a problem for us. Had to request coffee maker in room but this was provided very quickly. 
Breakfast (paid for as part of the room) was good but some things ran out - if you arrived after 8am then forget about getting any of the yummy doughnuts! Not really what you would expect from a hotel - never replaced even after requesting. 
Hotel bar was very expensive - $18 for a whisky and coke, $8 for a beer but there was a coupon for $10 off your bar bill per night (one per couple). Didn't order food as we were out most evenings but it was expensive and saw lots of guests bringing in their own food from outside.
Reception staff were very helpful; bar staff varied from helpful to downright rude which again was disappointing for what you were paying for the hotel. 
Overall the hotel was in an excellent position for Times Square, the metro and central park whilst the hotel itself was average - nothing bad (apart from the odd member of staff) just be aware that in New York its expensive so you need to be paying a lot more if you want luxury. It's a busy hotel but a nice ambiance in the lobby in the evening with live music on weekends.

title: verry good hotel
text:
verry good hotel nice staing dear in oktober 2023 .  good crew en the food was verry good
the hotel is on times square  what means thad  it always verry bissy is on the street 
the breakfirst whas verry good and the bar good to
the pricess where also good

title: Great location, great bar terrace, clean & tidy
text: The hotel offers great opportunity to visit Broadway shows within walking distance. Great views of times square from some rooms and from the terrace. No tea & coffee facilities in the room is disappointing.

title: Outstanding
text: Loved the property and will stay again kind off beaten path but in the middle of it all, staff was a great success in coordinating on how we plan some of our days. If we asked staff for something they delivered.

title: Rooftop con vista incluso
text:
Hotel completamente consigliato. Oltre la posizione, sulla Broadway, guarda in faccia Time Square; rooftop wow, quindi reception con vista. Camere nuove, bagni puliti. Dispenser con i detergenti per la doccia, shampoo e anche il balsamo. Hotel non ingessato, fluido, newyorkese. Bello. Anche la colazione è varia. 
Prenoterò nuovamente qui quando tornerò in città.

title: Great stay in Times Square
text: Fantastic location, everything you need is close by, bakeries, coffee, transport, theatres and food. Bed was super comortable. Quiet room. No kettle,  so forget about making tea or cofee for yourself. But there is a little fridge. Staff were helpful and always available. There is a little shop near reception for any necessities you need. Highly recommeded.

title: good location
text:
the location is good but it’s overpriced. you should expect to be billed for a resort fee after, even if you prepay.

the beds are awful… like you will be very sore from sleeping in them. the lighting in the room is also terrible. it was difficult to do makeup. 

overall i’m not sure that i would stay here again.

title: New York - week trip
text: a great venue with sound proof rooms for a quiet night sleep and the most comfortable beds!! Ideally located for Times square, Central Parc and Broadway. Subway station also very local to get to lower Manhattan. Suggestion: Coffee machine and bottled water would have been nice as part of the stay and at no extra cost!

title: Perfect location
text: Great hotel. Second time staying here and this stay was even better than the first now that the elevators are fixed. Highly recommend this hotel if your hanging in time square or seeing a broadway show.

title: Fantastic Location
text: We stayed for 4 nights. Perfect location, right near Times Square and walking distance to many tourist spots. Rooms were very small and basic but clean. Quiet given location. Staff could have been friendlier.

title: Buena ubicación
text:
Buena ubicación. 
Desayuno malo 
Personal no amable en front desk 
Realizamos la reserva con desayuno incluido en en el momento de check in , no lo aceptaron . 
Tomamos el desayuno un par de días en el hotel que fue bastante regular .

title: Excellent hotel in a fantastic location
text: This was my first trip to New York and I wanted a hotel that was central to a lot of the must see places. I can’t recommend MSocial enough, the location is fantastic, right in the heart of Times Square. The rooms are soundproofed so at night I had no problem sleeping and noise was never an issue. The staff were all friendly and helpful. My room was always kept immaculate by the housekeeping staff. I ordered room service on one night and the food was delicious and filling! I recommend the lobster mac & cheese. All in all a fantastic experience and I would definitely book again!

title: Not worth it
text: There are too many people for this hotel to handle. You will be stuck everywhere you go—check in, waiting for an elevator, etc—these lines can create you waiting for over an hour to check in, 20 minutes before you’re able to get on an elevator that isn’t filled to capacity. The room is okay, but the bed is probably the most uncomfortable bed I’ve slept on. You can feel every spring and every indentation. You’re basically paying for location and overall aesthetic, wouldn’t stay here again.

title: Hotel a Times Square
text: Posizione centralissima. Pulito e silenzioso. Di fronte all'hotel c'è una ottima pasticceria italiana, Angelina, dove si può fare colazione sia con dolci che con salati. Personale gentile. Consiglio di prenotare, spendendo qualcosa in più, una stanza ai piani alti con una bellissima vista su Times Square ed i grattacieli di Manhattan!

title: Good venue for a central location
text: Great venue for exploring the times square area. As a family of four, the rooms were very tight. But the communal space was a good compensation. Enjoyed seeing time square from the rooftop area. would recommend.

title: Ideal location on Broadway next to Time Square.
text:
Great accomodations. Safe. Clean. Perfect location off Broadway near Time Square. Short walk to everything. Very convenient location between Time Square and Central Park.
I highly recommend this hotel! Clean streets with lots of restaurants all around.

title: Excellent location and hotel!
text: I booked this hotel because we had tickets to Carnegie Hall. M Social was conveniently located at a competitive price to other hotels. The food and drinks at the restaurant were also wonderful and everyone was very helpful and friendly. If we are back in the area, we will definitely be back!

title: Trip NYC
text:
Excellent location, fair cost/benefit, friendly and attentive staff. Clean rooms and facilities. Breakfast food and beverages is good, negative poins is long lines waiting for a table.
Have been in this hotel many times and will return

title: Good, but a few issues
text:
I'm sure it was an accident, but I returned to my room to find my door wide open. I suspect it was a simple mistake by the housekeeping team. Luckily nothing taken.

Also the WiFi was not strong enough to be effective in my room (1822). I had to go down to the lobby to connect properly.

Shame to have these two issues because in general it is a decent hotel for the price.

title: Inolvidable estancia en M Social Times Square
text: La estancia en el hotel ha sido una gran experiencia. La habitación con vistas a Times Square será inolvidable. Hemos disfrutado de una gran estancia, las camas muy cómodas y el desayuno variado y abundante.

title: Sweet views for Free
text: Annual Mother and daughters trip! We walked, we laughed, we walked, we laughed. Oh and had drinks on the roof top. A sweet view for sure. Room accommodated the 3 of us. It’s NYC so space was a luxury. The room was serviced daily which was nice. Staff was friendly. Took advantage of the daily charge for beverages at the bar and daily coffee. The Hudson view was nice. It’s in the far distance but still nice.

title: Vibrant atmosphere
text: Great location, in the heart of Times Square. Rooms are small but it is NY City, friendly staff and vibrant atmosphere. Everything you need is close by and walking distance to Hells Kitchen eateries. A short stroll from Central Park. A great place to stay in NYC

title: Great location for Times Square
text: Room was very clean and good size. Hotel was in a great spot and close to the action of Times Square and surroundings. Only negative was that one day there was an issue with the hot water and I was made to have a cold shower. Ring down to see what was happening and was simply told they were working on it. At this price point I think that something more should have been done about to compensate for the inconvenience.

title: Perfect place for a city trip
text: We were very satisfied having chosen MSocial Times Square Hotel. We had  booked an upgrade on our room and were accommodated on the 31st floor. The hotel is located perfectly for a city trip. From there one could reach easily all places that should  be seen being in NYC for the first time. We would chose this hotel again, if we went to NYC for a second time.

title: Excellent hotel in the heart of city
text:
Fantastic hotel 
Close to everything 
Price great 
Very welcoming staff- due to our plane 7 hrs delayed we arrived M Social @ midnight. No worries hotel crew very welcoming 
Big rooms with great views over city and river 
Loved our stay

title: Dirty windows and a bit outdated rooms
text:
Basic hotel with nice outdoor bar overlooking Time Square. 

I emailed ahead and asked for high floor with a view. I got first floor with windows so dirty you could not see anything 🙄

We asked for late check out. 50 usd PER HOUR.  Crazy.

Location is good for TS

title: Non male però caro con sorpresa finale
text: Il prezzo è altissimo per quello che offre l’hotel praticamente non ti da nulla non c’è la cabina doccia bensì la vasca con la tenda mancava l’asse da stiro e lo spazzolino del water, la pulizia non è un gran che per quanto riguarda la posizione è molto buona, la colazione è a pagamento e costa ben 30$ a persona. E dulcis in fondo l’ultimo giorno di permanenza mi hanno rubato in camera 2 felpe una nuova e una usata un t-shirt nuova un golfino da donna un power bank uno zaino e 2 monete da 1$

title: Msocial
text: Our room on 30th floor had a couple of sockets not working and the bed was a bit creaky but the view more than made up for it. Full view of Times Square and all the hustle and bustle from the comfort of your room. Personal bugbear is 35 a night resort fees when you’re already paying more tha £500 a night for a basic room but it wouldn’t stop me returning, loved New York but my feet didn’t (30k steps a day)

title: Great views and location
text: You pay for a great location and fabulous views. The lobby, terrace and bar are impressive. The rooms, however, are fairly basic. They are on the small side with tiny bathrooms. No frills included. Lacking in usual room essentials - no toiletries ie shower cap, moisturiser, cotton pads etc. No decent sized glasses for water.  We had a Premium Times Square room which had a  perfect view. Staff attitude was mixed from friendly to grumpy. On the whole a great location but expensive for what you get.

title: Not for old folks
text: If you are over 35 years old, this might not be the hotel for you.  The rooms are quite small, the sink is in the entry, the bed is covered on three side by walls, and the bathroom is tiny.  The room operated via I-pad commands.  The mattress was soft.  On the positive side, it is in a good location with a short trolley ride to old town.  The staff was fantastically friendly and helpful.  The mattress was soft.  To avoid the concert sounds, get a room on the street side.

title: one night Hotel stay
text: Not as clean as I would have thought and definitely not worth the price. Wish I would have thought more about how much time I was spending in the room and maybe booked somewhere cheaper and just visited a hotel like this for their bar and views. The room smelled faintly of smoke and there was nothing personable or nice in the room like some other hotels do for the same price.The sound of time square and lights was not and issue when falling asleep. Lastly, the staff was very friendly.

title: A hotel with a perfect location and an awesome rooftop view!
text: We were given a room on the 27th floor and while it was in the middle of NYC, we were able to sleep comfortably without much noise. The location was perfect within walking distance to Time Square and multiple subway locations within a short walk. The hotel has a restaurant and bar with amazing rooftop views.

title: M Social Hotel Times Square New York, a great experience.
text: We loved the ambience of the hotel, the friendliness of the staff. We also appreciated the proximity to Times Square. Having games available to play in the entrance area was a plus for my teen age grandsons. The previous stay, my other grandsons loved the gym. You will definitely be my "go to" hotel for future visits to NYC.

title: Nice location but extremely loud music
text: Very nice location. Interior is rather contemporary, but well done. Unfortunately the music at the restaurant and at the rood top is extremely loud. Very hard to have a conversation without shouting at each other.

title: Ok hotel
text: If you are looking for hospitality you will not get it here.  Mediocre high priced breakfast $30 per person.  $5 for coffee and no water.  Plan on buying all your drinking water.  Decor in room is nice.  Bartenders are friendly.  View from the roof top is very nice

title: The name changed, not the hotel
text: Been there a few times when it was still the Novotel Times Square. Nothing really changed (didn't tried breakfast). But still the same quality of service, nice hotel, clean, quiet even if in the middle of Times Square, perfect location.

title: Excellent service!!
text: Excellent service. Daily housekeeping, they even will change your bedsheet upon request. Location just 3 mins walk and you will arrive at Times Square. My room view is direct times square. There is supermarket  just next ti the hotel. Nothing to complaint

title: Great hotel in a great spot
text: Booked here for a five night stay based on a friend’s recommendation. It can’t be faulted. Room was spacious (1208) and bed very comfy. Breakfast is worth paying for as no real difference in cost if you ate elsewhere. Buffet style meant better value for money. Slight issue with tv in room all fixed very quickly. Very convenient location.

title: Gostamos muito ! Valeu a pena !
text:
Gostamos de tudo no hotel . Do quarto , do banheiro , do lounge , do bar , do rooftop 
E localização ao lado da times square .
Fácil de fazer todos os passeios ficando neste hotel.  Tem metrô perto , táxis , Uber é muita coisa você faz a pé mesmo . Recomendo ! E não deixem de ver o rooftop do próprio hotel e o bar a noite que fica muito bonito . Parabéns especial ao Alvin da recepção . Muito Simpático , prestativo e  eficaz

title: Cold hotel
text: Good location with nice terras and view on time square. but very impersonal. Chaotic lobby. Rooms and especially the bathrooms are not at 4 Star level. No coffee /tea or even a bottle water in the room. I paid over $500 a night……

title: Fantastic
text: Great location and value. Rooms were a surprisingly large size for NYC. Comfortably fit our family of 4 with luggage and plenty of room to move around and relax. Location is so convenient to all of midtown, easy walk to Central Park and several subway station within 1-2 blocks.

title: Great hotel--great location!
text: If you're in town for theater or shopping, this is a great place to stay! Walking distance to most Broadway shows, Times Square, 5th Ave. for shopping. A subway stop close by for when you need to move around the city. The hotel has a fun vibe and the staff couldn't be nicer. We will definitely stay here again!

title: Right in the heart of NY NY
text: Location is the best. We walked to see a show, get food, shop, etc.... YET, we did not feel like we were bumping into the crowds when we stepped out of the door. We really liked that there was music (live or DJ). We also liked that the convenient store was open unitl 3am. Don't rush around because the elevators can take a long time and there are two sets to make it to the street.

title: Refund for $640 taking more than a month to be received
text:
They charged me a $640 AUD deposit when I checked in, assuring me it would be refunded within a week. Yet more than a month later I have not received the refund for it and have continuously contacted them. They have outright denied it and keep telling me that the refund was submitted, even though my bank has told me that they have received nothing.

Looking online it seems this is a common issue with MSocial, you’d think there would be a system in place to ensure this occurring issue doesn’t happen. 

I’ve stayed at a lot of hotels, this is the first time this issue has happened to me and no thanks to the MSocial team, continues to be an issue I have to deal with. 

Would not recommend.

title: City visit
text: I recommend the hotel. Location is excellent. Subway stops are very close, just a few minutes walk. Staff kind and helpful. Breakfast is plentiful. The city is lavish from the roof terrace. Musical program on fridays.

title: This Place Is the best place in Times Sq
text: Incredible spot with a great outdoor terrace overlooking times square, been here about 6 times and I love it. I will be staying here with my film crew again because the price is right and the service is awesome. Thanks again for a great experience as always.

title: Super séjour
text: Super hôtel avec de belles chambres propres et très confortables . Demander une chambre dans les étages hauts , elles seront plus calme . Le personnel de la réception est adorable et presque à chaque moment de la journée , l’un d’entre eux parle le français . Ils essaient de vous aider un maximum et sont super professionnel . L’emplacement est top pour se déplacer dans la ville avec plusieurs lignes de métro très proches . Nous reviendrons avec plaisir . Le roof top est très agréable aussi pour se reposer à l’extérieur au soleil .

title: We’ve had good stay with Times square nearby.
text: Nice hotel, frieny staff, very beautiful room which was very clean. Every day housekeeping. Nice bar. Walking distance from Times square.  Neareby metrostations. Easy check in amd check out. We recommend this hotel.

title: Great Vacation With Mom
text:
M Social is a very nice place to stay in New York City. It is centrally located, a 1 min walk to Broadway and a 5 min walk to the heart of time square. Our room had 2 comfortable double beds, a small fridge and a great view of Times Square. There is a street lobby and receiving lobby on a different floor which is nice for safety purposes. They will hold your luggage in the street lobby. The street lobby and the front desk employees are very nice, especially Alvin at the front desk and Angel at the street lobby. Housekeeping is exceptional, both friendly and competent. We tipped then daily and she was so grateful. Please tip them. 

The only drawback is the lobby which has a restaurant and “roof top” bar is loud every evening, like they put a live band in the lobby loud. There is no quiet  space that is not your room. Also the lobby furniture needs to be replaced. It looks nice a first but when you sit down you can tell the cushions are thread bare. 
All in all this is a nice hotel with great employees in a great location; what’s not to like. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Clean, modern and with great views = a bit soulless
text:
We stayed at M Social for four nights and chose it for the location and rooftop bar. We had a city view King room on the 30th floor and room was spacious and tidy, absolutely lovely. The view was great, we had a partial view of Times Square as well which was very special. The bed and bedding were great. Bathroom could do with updating, was a bit old fashioned and the combination of bath/shower is outdated, would have preferred a walk-in shower. 

We felt a bit harassed by the maid on our floor. I'm sure she was just eager to get her job done, but to ask us every time we left the room how long we would be gone for and did we need a turn down despite of us having the "privacy" sign up, felt a bit over the top. Also, the ice maker on our floor did not work. 

M Social is a large hotel in a very popular location and we could definitely feel it in the level of service. Everyone was perfectly friendly but service felt superficial and impersonal. The "rooftop" bar is not exactly rooftop but on the 4th floor but with beautiful views over Times Square. It does get busy so be prepared for a fight over the best tables on the terrace (not sure if they do reservations outside) but the views are worth it. 

The elevators were a joke. Especially in the morning, it could easily take you 15 mins to get down to the lobby as only two of the four elevators were working and trying to get in from 30th floor, the elevator was always already full. Also one of the (two) elevators to street level was almost always out of service. With that volume of customers, this was a huge inconvenience.  

Saying all this, the location of the hotel is brilliant. All Broadway theatres and shops are walking distance and still the room felt peaceful and "out of the way". The bar is great and the feel of the hotel is very modern, clean and tidy. I would definitely stay again, if they sort out the elevators.

title: 4 friends visiting NYC
text:
Hotel was very well placed right on Times Square with great access to the City. Hotel has a great rooftop bar with fantastic views. Our rooms were very comfortable. We were a party of 4 ladies and were really disappointed to be on separate floors. Other hotels take account of 4 people booking together and put you next to each other, but on check in the receptionist was a bit rude about the fact we were 9 floors apart. The access to the floors from the elevators was painfully slow and it was difficult to get to each other’s rooms. 4 lifts, but only one ever seemed to be working and it was always full. 
Our room on floor 29 was serviced by a lovely friendly lady.
Overall would stay again but would request rooms together, which may work.Comfortable room, nice comfy bed and great pillows.

title: Fantastic stay with staff going the extra mile!
text:
A wonderful hotel with that wow factor as you walk out the elevator. It was my 30th birthday during our stay and the team provided a welcome bottle of champagne as we arrived in the room.
The view of Times square at the bar is worth the price alone. No real criticism aside from quite slow bar service even during quiet hours. One member of staff in particular was more interested in the American football than serving a number of waiting customers. The bar manager did sort this out but when you're paying premium prices, you would expect a premium service.

Everything else was exceptional and I would 100% recommend staying at this hotel and will book again in the future!

title: Nice place
text:
Top hotel
Top people very nice and service minded in any situation, too rare not to mention
The view at rooftop is cool and the bar is a nice place too
Clean quite and confortable beds are confortable too

Enjoyed it a lot and we Ill come back ASAP !

title: A real 4 stars
text:
Great location on time square.
Expensive rooms 
Valets and concierge very competent
Quiet place. Shuttle available and cheap.
Very clean. Big room . Smal batroom.
Haïr dryer, Iron. Safety box free. Maîtresse to cgange

title: COLORFUL - FUN - MODERN
text:
Had a great stay, staff had the best energy, always meet with a smile and good service.
Location 9 out of 10, restaurants, Times Square. The hotel was modern, colorful, fun and clean.
Happy Customer : )

title: Request of cancellation for my deposit
text:
I already e-mailed about this issue, but couldn't get any return.
I checked out on 28th Aug. Unfortunately I couldn't get my deposit back.
Even I got the bill of my stay was annoying.
who is contact point of this?  I expect this woks asap.

title: Location location location
text:
Perfect location easy access to all the sights , very friendly helpful staff , lovely modern hotel , outstanding room service 
Nothing negative about the hotel , beautiful Terrace bar all In all a truly wonderful trip

title: Great place to stay in NYC
text: This is my third time staying at this hotel and I will definitely stay again in the future! Great customer service with very comfortable rooms and beds!!  Good location in the city as well! Next door to the hotel is one of the best steak houses in town. Very pleased with M Social

title: Toplocatie
text:
Mooi hotel op een toplocatie om New York voor de eerste keer te verkennen 
Ontzettend vriendelijk personeel 
Heel net, behalve het terras soms
Minpuntje: comfortabele maar kleine bedden en geen koffie op de kamer

title: Awesome
text: If you are traveling to New York and want to be in the thick of the city… I highly recommend staying at this hotel. From check in to check including breakfast service and bar service in the evenings everything was great.

title: Excellent
text:
Muy buen hotel en todo sentido!!!!!ubicacion privilegiada excelente desayuno
Atención rápida en check inn las habitaciones impecables limpias buenas vistas al Hudson 
Precio acorde a los servicios !!!!

title: 5 giorni in New York
text:
Hotel in ottima posizione, ben servito da Metro. L’hotel è vicinissimo a time Square ma nello stesso tempo non risente della confusione che Time Square ha in qualsiasi orario del giorno è della notte. L’hotel è dotato di un bellissimo Rooftop che guarda su Time Square, la pulizia è ottima ed i letti comodissimi.
Consigliato

title: Your place in theater district
text: Perfect location for theater show lovers but all main attraction in the area are in walkable distance, including Central Park. Very lively terrace bar and restaurant. Times Square can be seen and pictured from many hotel rooms, but if you are keen on that view check with their staff, always friendly and good mooded.

title: Brilliant Hotel!
text: Amazing location just at the edge of Times Square! The hotel is lovely and extremely clean! The staff are friendly and helpful. The staff are friendly and helpful. We had a city view room which gave us a partial view of Times Square. The view from the balcony of the bar is amazing! Would recommend this hotel and when returning to NYC would definitely return!

title: Family tri
text: Room is small but it's Clean. My family spent 4 days, we like breakfast, many choices and  good delicious. Hotel has good location, in the center, so easy come to famous place in NY, good service. But a small problem, we booked 3 days first and finally we decided to book more 1 days but we have to check out and wait 5 hours for checking again, unconvinience. Thank u.

title: very good
text:
very good hotel at to spot in New York . Great bar terrace , but should work longer not up to 11 or 12pm.
room clean is great as size of the room and good sleeping .
i would like breakfast to be better ( more choices ).
Ante

title: Times Square Hotel
text:
A quite expensive hotel located 10 minutes from Times Square. Rooms are lovely and big but don’t expect a coffee machine!
Overall a good trip and the trip was a bucket list item. Saw a good show - Blue Man Group - worth going to

title: Excellent Hotel
text: we would like to thank Mrs Darlene at front desk for her service, she was extremely kind and explained to us everything about the hotel and all the necessary information for our stay. your service certainly makes the difference. please pass this compliment on to her

title: Sometimes when we returned in the afternoon or evening, the air conditioning was on and at a low temperature. could be c
text: very good location. Room with good isolation  since you could not hear noise from the hallway, other rooms or from outside. Adequate cleanliness and order. Sometimes when we returned in the afternoon or evening, the air conditioning was on and at a low temperature. could be considered an unnecessary energy expenditure.

title: Porte de la salle de bain et fenêtres sales
text:
Porte de la salle de bain et fenêtres sales
Propreté de la chambre très correcte 
Changement de serviettes tous les jours et de literie tous les deux jours
Hôtel excellemment bien placé pour découvrir NY

title: Mscocial… amazing
text: I must compliment the M social hotel for everything that they do to make their guests feel welcomed and comfortable. You are greeted with a friendly smile from the moment you walk in, through reception, and house cleaning. All guests are aware that your comfort is their utmost concern.  We stayed in New York with friends at the M social and we’re impressed with all the details at the hotel staff puts into making you feel like family. This is definitely is a place we will return to stay when we visit New York. I highly recommend this hotel not only for the hot running water, good water, pressure, comfortable beds, cleanliness, great location, but most importantly, the staff. They are second to none.

title: excellent location
text:
friendly  staff, family environment at the hotel lobby, clean  rooms.
I couldn't get a transportation from bus station, but available for airports.
I prefer to reconsider the prices to be affordable for more customers

title: Very good hotel in Times Square
text:
Top hotel in Times Square. Very good position and top service.
A real enjoying atmosphere in the lobby and bar. There are some entertainment for kids and families so as good bar. Clean enough and rooms with everything you need.

title: NYC family holiday
text: Room was ok for 4 of us, beds seemed quite small, but ok as we were out from early morning until late at night.  Good view overlooking the Hudson river and relatively quiet compared to Times Square.  Overall a good base to explore Manhattan.

title: Great location and vibe in the hotel.
text: Amazing location and great vibe in this hotel. So close to everything, yet far enough away for a little quiet if needed. We very much enjoyed our stay in our Times Square room with fantastic views. Bathrooms could do with a refresh of colour.

title: Good location
text:
Hotel enjoys nice location close to Times Square which you can see nicely from terrace. Breakfast was excellent with wide variety of sortiment. Rooms were clean.

Sometimes elevator queues were too long needing time to wait.

Bar had very, very slow service. It is better to take tour beer outside hotel.

title: Great location, poor service
text:
The location is terrific. Just north of Times Square and a few blocks from Hells Kitchen and Central Park. I really wanted this to be my go to hotel in NYC. However, the customer experience was very bad. The housekeeping staff took our only two glasses for water and never replaced them. I called the housekeeping line several times and no one answered. There was no working ice machine on any floor. So you had to go down to the bar and basically beg for ice. 

I went to the bar in the afternoon to get a drink. There were two bartenders and four customers. I sat for at least five minutes. No one working came to take my order. They were more interested in their own personal conversation than with serving customers. I left in frustration.

title: Awesome hotel
text: The hotel was centrally located staff were amazing. They went out of their way to help and make our stay comfortable. From the doorman to the front desk they were all amazing. I would recommend this hotel

title: Nice but
text:
To sum up, the rooms and the bathroom were mall and, beds were comfortable good, nevertheless there was no coffee machine. 
Also, desk employee was not really friendly when we arrived.
Finally, this is well located.

title: Séjour parfait en famille !!!
text: Nous sommes une famille de 4 et on a tout adoré de cet hôtel. l’emplacement est idéal, à 2 min de marche d’un stationnement où nous avons pu laissé la voiture toute la durée de notre séjour. Emplacement central pour toutes les activités que nous avions prévues, la plupart accessibles à distance de marche. Le personnel à l’accueil a même pu nous parler dans notre langue qui est le français. Tous les membres du personnel avec lesquels nous avons fait affaire ont été courtois. Lit un peu petits mais très confortables. nous étions au 28e étage vue sur time square et c’était parfait. on a tout aimé de notre séjour, allons y revenir c’est certain !

title: Perfect place for Broadway entertainment and rest at the same time !
text: What a lovely place to stay to enjoy Broadway.  The rooms are a good size, extremely clean.  The lobby is a lot of fun.  And if you are on a high enough floor you may not hear the many sounds of Manhattan. Will make this my go to for Broadway shows and NYC uptown visits.

title: Great hotel
text: Excellent hotel to discover New York. This hotel is very close to Time Square. Metro within 2 minutes, so very easy to travel to everywhere you want to go in New York. Friendly people en clean rooms. We loved our stay!

title: lovely place, great location and excellent staff.
text: My only gripe is the late checking in time (4pm) and early checkout (11am) are tricky for long distance travellers. But the location is fab for midtown and the rooftop bar is perfect to people watch with a beer after a long day

title: The M Social places an emphasis on "Social"
text: The M Social is a fantastic “watering hole” just off the lobby in the hotel by the same name with both tables and banquets or bar indoors and outdoor tables on an expansive balcony.  The bartenders as well as the wait staff were very attentive and made sure that your every need was met.  While the cocktails were expensive by “out-of-town” standards, they contained a heavy pour of top shelf alcohol brands.  So, it was like ordering a double which left you quite satisfied.  We had arranged to meet friends there and were left to converse without interruption.  But, if you needed a refill, our waitress was “Johnny-on-the-Spot.”  If so inclined, there were games available to play such as foosball, air bowling, and pool.  We spent about two hours on site getting updated on our friends lives and activities.  I am sure that the bar is even more inviting and lively at night.  What a nice place to relax after a busy day of sight-seeing and shopping.

title: Excellent stay in an excellent location
text: This was our second time we have stayed at the M Social and like the first stay we really couldn’t fault it. Our stay from the check in to check out was excellent. The only one improvement is that all rooms should at standard have a kettle. Special mentions to Lorraine at front desk and Anna our room cleaner (we were in room 3019). This is certainly our go to place to stay in Manhattan as the location is in the heart of everything.

title: Great stay for First Time NYC visit
text: We enjoyed our stay at mSocial. Very nice lobby staff was very helpful and friendly.  The ice machine on our floor did not work the entire 5 day stay but they brought ice to our room every time we called.  Housekeeping was provided daily and very good.  They held our luggage for late checkout while we wandered the city before our 5pm flight.  Other then. The ice machine the only other negative is the noise from the street.  Nothing the hotel can really help being on time Square, and it did not keep us awake, but did offer wake us around 8 in the morning to honking.  The location overall is fantastic. Walking distance to shows, Time square, shopping, Central Park, quick subway access, and Angelina’s bakery across the street is great. We would definitely stay again.

title: Great location
text: View of Times square was amazing.  Quick walk to Times Square or Central Park and is right on the Theater district.  The rooftop restaurant had awesome views and breakfast was great!  The rooms were quiet and clean.

title: Siblings weekend
text: This hotel met all of our needs while in New York. It is very clean, staff extremely helpful and friendly, and has a great location. Rooftop deck also nice place to relax in the evening. Recommend to anyone traveling to New York!!

title: Fantastico
text: Mi sono trovata benissimo sotto ogni aspetto, la camera è molto grande, il letto molto comodo e la vista è bellissima. Tornerò sicuramente se dovessi tornare a new york. unico neo è la lettura delle carte di credito, non funzionano subito ma bisogna fare diversi tentativi.

title: Recomiendo el lugar, me gusto la vista, la ubicación y todo en general, cambiar un poco la atención del personal, fuera
text: Me gusto mucho la ubicación, está cerca de time square puedes acceder caminando a varios lugares, tiene una vista espectacular desde el bar y desde las habitaciones, de preferencia recomiendo vista al rio

title: Family trip.
text:
Great service. Excellent hotel. Friendly staff. Great location. Concierge helpful. Reception helpful. 
Clean. Modern. I would recommend for family or business visits. No complaints.  I will stay again next time in nyc.

title: Super emplacement
text:
Endroit absolument magique avec le roof top qui donne sur time square. L ambiance est très agréable et le personnel agréable.
2 bémols les lits un peu petit pour 2, pas de King size, et me déjeuner pas très fournie et plutôt basique. Dommage. Mais à part cela l endroit est top.

title: Hôtel décevant pour un 4 étoiles
text: L emplacement de l hôtel est bien situé,la vue de la chambre sur Time square est magnifique,la literie est confortable par contre les points négatifs : La climatisation trop forte surtout dans les parties communes,le prix au bar trop élevé :pour exemple 10€ un café expresso ,un verre de spritz :fond de vin blanc avec énormément de glaçons et d eau pétillante 18 euros le verre (exagéré pour de l eau pétillante aromatisée au vin blanc …la personne  de l accueil pour le Check in très antipathique , aucun effort de compréhension ,il levait ses yeux au ciel souffle .c est irrespectueux et indigne pour un hôtel 4 étoiles

title: Excellent
text: Excellent. Parfait pour nos enfants de 6 ans et 9 ans! Très bien situé à côté de toutes les commodités! Merci pour le réceptionniste francophone qui nous a très bien expliqué la taxe de séjour et les meilleurs plans. Aucun point négatif! Seul petit point noir,  d avoir eu une chambre au dessus des moteurs des Clim. Mais c est toi et ta chance et on rentrait que le soir à l hôtel. Par ailleurs, la fatigue de nos longues  journées et le bruit de la rue couvraient les bruits des souffleuses. Cependant Je le recommande à 100%.

title: Great location, small room
text: Great location literally down the street from Alvin A theater.  Overall small room for pricing.Be  sure to read policies very closely. Surprised by  absolutely no cancellation policy snd extra $100/ day “incidentals “ charge/hold. Liked having fridge in room but no microwave. Lots of families/kids. Elevator wait from lobby to street crowded with a wait. Appreciated daily housekeeping which dying hotel feature. Probably wouldn’t stay here on my next visit.

title: Great vacation
text: Highly recommended this hotel. Great location. Walking distance to so many Shoppes and restaurants. Staff were kind and polite. Hotel was clean. Very nice lobby and outdoor balcony. Kids loved the lobby since it has games and football table to play with. I would recommend and stay there again.

title: Great place to stay, perfect location!!
text: Hotel is on the corner of 52nd and Broadway. There is a Walgreens and McDonald's in the lower level. View to Times Square was awesome from room but more so from the rooftop lounge. Staff was the best!!

title: Lage und Aufenthalt
text: Sehr modernes Hotel mit einer schönen Bar und einer tollen Aussicht direkt auf dem Time square. Die Lage des Hotels ist einfach perfekt. Kommen wir mal zum Zimmer, also man muss schon sagen, die sind schon etwas in die Jahre gekommen. Auch die Sauberkeit könnte besser sein. Das Sofa am Fenster muss dringend gereinigt werden, es ist komplett voll mit Flecken wir mussten selbst eine decke als Abdeckung benutze. Die Möbel weisen leichte Abnutzungen auf. Auch im Badezimmer müssten die Fugen überarbeitet werden, teilweise schon schwarz. Ansonsten war das Zimmer gut, mit einer tollen Aussicht direkt auf dem Time Square. Wir kommen wieder.

title: Bon séjour
text:
2 eme séjour dans cet hôtel, idéalement placé. 
Le petit déjeuner est très qualitatif comparé à d’autres hôtels aux Etats-Unis.
La vue est imprenable sur Times Square.
Attention à cotte note de fin de séjour,  surprise de 200$ alors que nous n’avions rien consommé de la semaine… certains s’amusent à donner d’autres numéros de chambres.. le système des signatures n’est pas adapté.

title: Nice Place
text: Zentrales, top Hotel inmitten des Geschehen und doch ruhig. Sehr gutes Abwechslungsreiches Frühstück. Flughafen Transfer. Viele Lifte zu den Zimmern. Mega tolle Terrasse mit Sicht zum Times Square! Laut und bunt!

title: Great stay right in the centre of Times Square
text: Brilliant location and a hotel with a real buzz to it. We had a 2 Times Square rooms and both were great - the only downside was that they were not joining but that was not that big a deal. Easy check in and check out process and would consider using again for our next visit

title: Beware Mymillenium app quotes in local currency then reverts to USD$ once booking completed.
text:
My review is based purely on my experience using the mymillenium app for booking and subsequent lack of customer service from the M Social Hotel and Mymillenium. We have not stayed at this hotel. 

Beware using the mymillenium app - location services must have recognised that I was booking from Australia and so price on the app was quoted at AUD$661.49. Once I completed the booking, the next screen showed the price as USD$661.49 - which converts to approx $1,016.00! The app continues to quote in AUD. I provided screen sorts via an email to the M Social Hotel Times Square to enquire as to whether the AUD price would be honored.
