The response I received severely lacked any customer service and I was told the AUD price would not be honored - no further explanation or advice. In response to a follow up email, the hotel suggested I call and speak with a manager. I phoned reservations and they explained they couldn’t help but suggested I call the hotel front desk. I did this and requested to speak to a manager however this was ignored and I was advised that nothing could be done. I subsequently sent an online enquiry direct to Mymillenium via the app - I received an email confirming my enquiry had been received and I would be contacted in the next three days. That was a week ago. Two days ago I replied to the email requesting a response and still nothing. 

There is an obvious glitch in the Mymillenium app when booking outside the US which provides incorrect and misleading cost.

I am writing this review in the hope that a representative of Mymillenium will make contact.

title: Great location for Times Square. Fantastic terrace
text: We enjoyed our family stay at the M Social. Rooms were well appointed and modern. The lobby and bar area were a highlight - the wraparound outdoor terrace gave great views of Times Square and it was lovely to relax over a drink above the bustle below. Staff were helpful but rather transactional. The buffet breakfast looked rather poor and overpriced so we sought meals outside of the hotel - Angelina’s bakery (directly opposite) was a great patisserie

title: Situation idéale
text:
Personnel très sympathique
Terrasse et vue petit déjeuner sur Time Square (la meilleure de la ville certainement)
Chambres spacieuses et confortables avec vue imprenables sur la ville.
Situation idéale juste au dessus de Times Square (donc pas en plein dedans) et à 5 mn de Central Park
Idéal pour un point de chute pour une visite de NYC

title: Great place
text: Great location near midtown, Broadway, and Times Square. The room had a modern vibe, fantastic view, clean and efficient. The rooftop bar has a spectacular view of Times Square. The staff was friendly and reponsive.

title: Room are way too small
text: If it's for one night then it's fine. But if going for multiple nights, you'll be incredibly uncomfortable. The hotel was very clean, staff was great, music was fantastic, but rooms were atrocious and to make it worse it's not a queen bed. So two people barely fit on the beds.

title: Big rooms, clean, friendly, top location
text: Traveled for my daughter's birthday, they had cake and a note in the room upon arrival. Top location for all the sites, friendly doorman and front desk. Room 3109 - King Superior had a Hudson River view, quiet from the street sounds and great AC. Comfortable mattress and pillows. Big rooms, plenty of space for clothes. Never a wait for the elevator.Right next to the MJ show. Didn't take breakfast at hotel. 2 minute walk from Dunkin Donuts and right across from a bakery. Stunning views from lobby bar, good food on the menu, perfect to stay in after a long day of walking.

title: Nice Hotel in a Good location
text: Nice Hotel in a very Good location. Rooms are clean, staff ist very friendly. Sometimes a Little Bit too loud at the Lobby. Rooms are nice, but Need a makeover. Matresses was too old and uncomfy. Anyways, it is worth sleeping there

title: Holidays in NY
text:
Hotel très bien placé. 
Chambre agréable meme si un lit plus grand serait mieux.
Petit déjeuner trop cher pour le contenu. On mange d'excellent petit déjeuner dans le quartier et pour environ le même tarif.
Personnel globalement agréable.

title: Perfect!
text: Très bon séjour dans cet hôtel. Location idéale, proche de Times Square et du métro. Superbe terrasse avec de très bons cocktails. Chambre relativement bien isolée du bruit (Etant à Times Square c’est très bruyant dehors). Le lit est très confortable. Je recommande vivement.

title: Great stay at M Social Times Square
text:
Me and my friends had a great stay at M Social Times Square. We stayed on the 18th floor and had a very lovely lady as our house keeper, Evelina was very sweet and made sure our room was nice and clean whenever we arrived back to our room in the evening. I always looked forward to bumping into her in the hallway, she was so friendly and nice to talk to! Besides that, we loved the atmosphere in the lounge. It was the perfect place to spend your last minutes of the evening drinking a cocktail or a beer on the rooftop balcony with a view over Times Square. 

Thank you Evelina and thank you M Social!

title: Great value for the location
text: The hotel was very nice. Our room viewed Times Square which was a hit with our granddaughter. Rooftop bar was pretty cool. Location is excellent as well. We walked to all the places we wanted to visit and hopped on the R to Staten Island Ferry and walked to WTC. all in all an excellent trip.

title: Disappointing stay at the M Social
text: The city view room I had wasn’t a city view at all. I was looking into apartments! The “rooftop” is not an actual rooftop it’s the 7th floor of a building with over 30 floors. The doorman left food we ordered sitting and when we finally realized it had been delivered it was stone cold. We had to go down to the street to pick up ice cold food because they can’t come to the reception area. There is no room service during lunch hours. When our bedding was changed we didn’t get any top sheets only a comforter. Female Manager was not friendly and appeared disinterested in my concerns. She was dismissive and didn’t seem to want to be bothered. VERY poor lighting! Could hardly see at night. No guide for what’s on tv. Beds kept sliding off making you almost fall outta bed. Early check in costs $100. They charge an additional $100 per day for “incidentals”

title: Great Experience
text: This was my first stay in a My Millennium hotel, and it was a great experience.  Great location, fun decor, clean and spacious rooms, great security measures in place, and friendly staff.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Good location for this Hotel
text: This hotel is very well located. It has a very nice bar with a big and large terrace overlooking times square. The only problem is the reception staff. Some were very friendly and efficient, like the gentleman who spoke perfect French, while others were anything but. Also, if you ask for something like slippers and are told that the hotel doesn't provide them, don't be discouraged and ask another person who will make the necessary arrangements. The bedding is very comfortable, but beware of rooms with two double beds, as the beds are quite small (140 cm). They sell the room for four but you have to be thin to sleep two in their beds. Overall we were very happy and I will go back but I will take two rooms if we are 4.

title: Very good
text: The location is perfect! Double beds not queen size for 4 people is à bit small but overall excellent. The view from the rooftop amazing!!! Parking very simple, you have a discount with the hôtel at checkout

title: The hotel Facilities are not just for guests so expect a crowded place
text:
You have to take a lift from the street to the reception and another to your room. The public areas of the hotel can be used literally for anyone, the bar is full of non guests so good luck finding a table, the area to sit and wait for a relative/partner/family/taxi/etc. is full of people that some are not even guests. It is incredible the amount of people that can enter to the hotel to make selfies, use the hotel facilities and then go out. Because of that the facilities are full and when you need to take the lift to go from reception to the street it is also full and you have to queue - no stairs available. 
The staff is friendly and the rooms are basic but very clean. 
Too expensive for what you receive but you will be paying the location as you will be in the center of everything.
It is not a bad hotel but definitely not what I expected or what I like from a hotel of that price. Would I go back? No.

title: Amazing View & great location
text:
Captivating room view on Times square . It makes you get the NYC vibe right away. Nevertheless, the rooms are quite.You can enjoy the view from the terrace too at any time. 
Lobby is nicely organized and made to hang around with good music. 
Location is perfect, very central. close to Central Park, Broadway, 5th Avenue, Rock on the Top.
Staff on the first level are very helpful and pleasant.
We really did enjoy our stay and will definitively recommend.
Thank you !

title: Great views mediocre everything else.
text:
The location is amazing but the rest was lackluster. 
The employees at the front desk were unpolite. We had issue checking in as our room wasn’t ready until next day so one of us had to sleep on the couch. At Check out they tried to charge us for 2 additional days. When I tried to explain why it was a mistake the person at the front desk told us that what the reservation at Booking  was none of hus business and that he cared only for the communications that were made directly with them lol. After 1 hour of argueing his manager told us that we were right but this person didn’t even apologize with us. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: C'est certain que je vais y retourner !
text:
Magique ! Ça faisait 15 ans que je n'étais pas venue à New York et cette fois je voulais vivre l'expérience d'avoir une hôtel sur Time Square.
C'était abordable, de qualité, propre et le service était à la hauteur !
La chambre était un peu petite, mais parfaite pour un couple pour 3 nuits ! Très confortable. À partir de la 7e et de la 52e tout ce fait à pieds. C'était génial !

title: Great Stay In NYC
text: 5 - a great place to stay either for business or for a family vacation- The hotel staff was very friendly and extremely helpful. will stay at the M again for sure! The food was great, th drinks were great and the aambiancewas great. Thank you, SM!

title: Views of time Square
text: The bell staff on the  first level are very helpful  and  always ready to  assist   my wife and I spend her birthday weekend at this hotel  and it was  nothing  short of being  lovely even in the  room we felt like we were in the  heart of  time square the rooms are  very quiet

title: Super hôtel
text:
Nous avons séjourné 4 nuits à cette hôtel pendant notre voyage à NewYork,  vraiment super! Très propre,  confortable,  belle vue, le personnel est super sympa.  Très belle vue sur la terrasse sur times squares. 
Ils proposent des événements les soirées,  dj, musiciens...
Seule petit bémol le bruit des chasses d'eau des chambres à coter. Mais rien de fou. 
Je conseille cette hôtel .
Si je dois revenir à NewYork je retournerais ici

title: Camera vista times square
text:
Soggiorno di cinque notti in questo moderno hotel adiacente a times square e vicino a molti punti di interesse( 10 minuti a piedi da central park, 10 minuti a oiedi dal moma, 3 minuti alla metro). Sotto l albergo un comodo supermercato. Camera al 18 esimo piano ( su 33), con splendida vista su times square, dotata di tutti i comfort.
Rooftop all’ ottavo piano con vista meravigliosa dove poter sorseggiare un cocktail (20/25 dollari).
Presente anche una palestra e possibilita di colazione a pagamento (30 dollari a testa), servizio di lavanderia con prezzi alti (15 dollari per una maglietta)
Nb: 40 dollari di tassa di soggiorno a camera al giorno

title: Great
text: The only thing we didn't like was it was a lower level so it was a terrible view but the terrace was incredible! Location perfect and inside was really cool. Felt very safe and everyone was very pleasant

title: M Social
text: "Overall, this Times Square hotel impressed with excellent service, a beautiful lobby, and a fantastic terrace boasting stunning views. However, the rooms were average, a bit dusty, and showed signs of age, requiring a refresh."

title: m social
text:
Amazing hotel, best location in town. Time Square view.
Everything is new and clean .Young atmosphere,highly recommend.
Very close to Time Square and Stellar Park.
good bakery across the road. 
It is recommended to visit the balcony.of the hotel

title: I'M COMING BACK!
text: This was a quick overdue family get away. Our stay was extremely pleasant. The location was good and the cleanliness of hotel was great! We enjoyed drinks on the patio, the view was amazing. We’ll definitely stay again.

title: Gorgeous spot but lackluster staff
text: Your hotel is gorgeous. Your location and lobby/rooftop lounge are amazing. Your staff does not know what customer service means. Their attitude may be a NY thing, I am not sure. But being in customer service myself I can say whatever the general hang up is it’s not appreciated by guests.

title: Great location
text: Excellent location, a few steps from Times Square, there are a few close restaurants to have breakfast or dinner, the rooms were clean ans spacious, it has a nice roof top bar with perfect photos view of times square to finish you day.

title: Would definitely stay again!
text:
We enjoyed our stay! (I stayed with my 15-to-niece. The housekeeping staff was great; the rooms were clean and spacious, the beds were comfortable. It was quiet. The front desk staff & room service were very attentive to our needs. We enjoy the extra security of always having the doorman there to greet us and the extra elevator to get up to the main level. I had read reviews saying that the elevators were slow, but we did not have any trouble whatsoever throughout our six night stay. The doormen also stored our bags on the last day so we could roam around a bit more before our flight home and arranged a taxi to the airport for us. Though we did not spend any time in the main floor lounge/recreation area, we noticed a lot of families and people in general relaxing & having fun at all times of day and night. It had a really pleasant vibe. The little store on site was also convenient. We liked the location of the hotel very much-we were doing a lot of things around the theater district-but it was just enough removed from the Times Square chaos. We also liked that there were drugstores, coffee shops, bagel places, restaurants, and several subway stations all with an easy walking distance. 

If I had to nitpick, I would say that some of the electrical outlets in the room didn’t work all the time, and it would be nice to have some USB ports in the room. It would also be nice to have some sort of physical room service/amenities menu in the room or even a table tent with a QR code. We were supposed to be able to access this on our tv but ours was not working properly. Still, when I called down to the front desk for late-night french fries, service was prompt and friendly!

Finally—We loved our Hudson River view room! It was a spectacular view  and quiet! Would def. stay again!

title: New York trip
text: The hotel is located in a perfect spot in the city. Close to everything. Times Square Is about 2 blocks away. Staff was helpful and everything was very clean. The food was delicious at the hotel. We Will definitely be back.

title: Une vue exceptionnelle pour un séjour réussi!
text:
Au cœur de Times Square. Une vue magnifique, une chambre spacieuse, un personnel agréable. Bref des vacances réussies !
Nous reviendrons les yeux fermés. Seul bémol: la Clim trop forte dans les espaces communs…..

title: The Best Hôtel in New York!
text: I’ve stayed in New York several times and this is the best hotel that meets all my requirements: location, comfort, service. The view from the room is incredible. The metro is a two-minute walk away. I'll be back again!

title: Recent visit of NYC
text: Short 3 night stay --- because the location of hotel, I was able to make use of the time well and was able to squeeze in one broad way theatre show as well as a visit to American Museum of Natural History apart from taking a good walk in the Central Park.

title: Séjour Times Square New York
text:
Tout était parfait. Super emplacement. Le personnel très sympathique. Le roof top est très agréable pour prendre un verre.
La climatisation est peut être un peu trop forte pour nous mais dans l'ensemble l'expérience est plus que satisfaisante.

title: Great Hotel, Perfect Location
text: M Social is is a great hotel for a weekend getaway. It’s literally walking distance to Time Square, and is surrounded by several theaters if you plan on catching a broadway show. There’s also a DELICIOUS Cuban restaurant right next door 😋. I’d definitely book this location again!!

title: Localização não poderia ser melhor!!! Dentro da Times Square!!!
text:
Positivos: localização, café da manhã muito bom, quarto com frigobar, espaço para apoiar as malas, chuveiro bom.
Negativos: carpete no quarto, banheira com cortina de plástico ( e não Box em vidro), camas em tamanho menor.

title: Great Location!
text: We have used this location for meetings and to host our out of town guests.  The service is always great!  The staff is very attentive.  The location is perfect if you want to see a show or get dinner.  I recommend this hotel to everyone.

title: Dance Experience
text:
Excellent location
Excellent  attention 
The food at the restaurant is so good 
The rooms are very comfortable and clean 
The rooftop has one of the best views in the city

El pesonal es muy atento y dispuesto a resolver cualquier inconveniente que se presente

title: Absolutely beautiful and perfect 💕
text:
Absolutely beautiful and perfect 💕💕💕
I am a NYC resident and this is the fourth time I recommend M Social to my guests/family/friends. 
I love everything about this hotel; All staff are professional and welcoming; Everything is clean and organized and the Lobby area is absolutely lovely and fun.  By far is the BEST hotel in NYC. I can’t wait to visit again.  
Deepest gratitude🫶🏽🙌🏽💕 to all staff. Especially, Mrs. Ivonne; Mr. Daniel and Reservation Rep Mr. Pedro   
Y’all Rock! 
M Social is Home away from Home 🫶🏽

-Sara Campos

title: Great experience
text:
Great experience.
The location is close to Times Square
The rooms are big enough for 4 persons
Rooms are clean
Had issue with the safe that was fixed asap
Good service from Stella at reception
Great service from Carlos at breakfast

title: Wonderful experience!!
text: The location is perfect...close to everything...subway and Times Square, but far enough away from craziness and noise of the heart of Times Square. Rooms were big by New York standards. Price was not too bad for New York, but it would be nice if it was a little less expensive.

title: Location, location, comfort
text:
Great hotel within walking distance of Times Sq, museums, subway and pretty much everything! 
The staff were great and very friendly. The food area had a great outside space for pictures of times sq and the near by areas. 
The on-site shop was very useful for bottles of water, umbrella and cold drinks.

title: Fun for teens
text: My teens and I took a weekend trip to NYC and we selected this hotel for its hip and fun design and central location. My teens enjoyed the vine here and the views from onsite restaurant and outdoor patio are very fun.  The rooms here are on the small size and the bathroom will be tiny. The bed was comfortable and our Times Square view was also very fun for the teens. The hotel lobby was a good size for the number of guests and the bartenders were attentive and nice.  If you don’t mind a small room, this is a solid option with teens/tweens that want a hip hotel in a central location

title: No cumplen y racistas, pésimo lugar.
text: Bien ubicado y terraza bonita, nada más. Colchones pésimos incluso suenan los resortes, entrada desde la calle por elevador únicamente por lo que a hora pico habrá que esperar varios viajes para subir. Supuestamente dan $10 gratis de bebidas por noche por habitación pero al hacer el check-out las cobraron y la persona de recepción mal educada ni una explicación dió, es mas ni la palabra me dirigió porque supuestamente tenía un problema en la garganta. No hay agua para tomar en la habitación por lo que hay que comprar la botella en el lobby bar en donde ni te atienden para eso sino que casi rogar para que te den agua que al final como ya mencioné nos cobraron. Pésimo lugar, no vuelvo. Si quieres ver las vistas desde la terraza puedes entrar sin problemas pero NO te hospedes ahí.

title: Bday vacay
text: Check in is late 4pm but baggage can be stored by the hotel safely so able to enjoy the whole day hotel location great walking distance to Times Square security always present  cleanliness great good for families with young children will definitely return and highly recommend it you won’t be disappointed also price point was great

title: Not recommended
text: Agressive desk front team and bad faith and over billed invoice. They are charching a late check out by giving the impression that it will be free and finally they charge it without informing the client.

title: Clean, modern, great location for tourist attractions
text: The hotel was very nice and clean. Loved the modern look. No valet but parking was just down the street. They hold bags for you prior to getting your room too. The staff was very nice, accommodating and helpful.

title: My expirience in the Msocial Hotel
text: When we arraived they did not have our room ready and they had already made a charge, the beds were really uncomfortable, the room was not clean, and the worst of all was that my daugter got bit by a tick

title: A pleasant stay
text: I appreciated the hotel's central location but without the inconvenience of noise. The high floor we chose gave us a nice view and the room was spacious. The little attention on our arrival (bottle of water and macaroons)

title: Great location
text:
Great central location between Times Square and Central Park. Close to all the action and really enjoyed the outdoor bar area. Incentivised by the $10/day bar credit. 
Staff were friendly and helpful. Some disappointment that we had to request room service daily in order for it to happen.

title: One thing after another
text: The first night had a leak from the toilet that wasn’t fixed until the next day and wasn’t offered another room. This has a public rooftop bar which allows non hotel guests. One night I encountered people having sex on the rooftop bar deck. Another night a few non hotel guests were sleeping in the rooftop bar deck. Perhaps limiting this space to hotel guests only might eliminate things like this from occurring. Guest room tv’s were out of order for 24 hours. The bedding was too thick and heavy for the summertime and no top sheet or lighter blanket was provided. For the amount of money spent at this hotel these things shouldn’t have happened.

title: Best hotel near Times Square
text: The hotel is at the center of the Western Hemisphere so, is one of the best locations in Manhattan. The rooftop bar has a unique view of Times Square.  You got food and pharmacies even McDonald's in the same block. It's Broadway on 52th, so if you keep walking down Broadway you going all the way to the financial district

title: Mixed Feelings
text: The view was great and the staff was friendly.  However, the noise level in the lounge was too high. The TV in our room didn’t work,  the room was dusty, bathroom very small. The outdoor patio was nice but small.  Also had a scare with a fire alarm at midnight.  Didn’t hear it in our room - very concerning.  Walked down the fire stairs with many other confused guest.  Got to the lobby and was told false alarm the Fire men just gave all ok. Very frightening experience.

title: Great location
text: The hotel is in a great location and you can step out and go north to central park or south to times square.  The terrace view of time square makes staying at the hotel worth it.  Don't expect an overly friendly hotel staff.  I only spoke to them at check in.  The hotel was clean and the rooms were clean.  The AC is very cold, if you raise it the humidity level kicks in and you feel it right away.  The beds were very comfortable.  My son really enjoyed the hotel because he felt in the middle of all the broadway shows!

title: Great 5 days at the M Social Hotel Times Square New York
text: The hotel is at the great position with the great terrace and room view at the Time Square from where you can enjoy the NY in its greatens. The staff and the overall hotel service is great so for sure I would recommend this hotel.

title: Perfect location for exploring the city!
text:
My daughter and I stayed for a few days while we explored NYC. It was the perfect location to walk to Broadway shows, Central Park, the subway, and amazing restaurants!
Staff was prompt to help, friendly and knowledgeable. Loved the rooftop bar for enjoying the sights from above at the end of our long days and the games in the lobby were fun! Clean, quiet and spacious room and comfy bed, felt luxurious and yet at a great price point. Highly recommend this hotel!

title: Great location and wonderful facility!
text: This is a great hotel in a perfect location for theatre and dining.  Great upper lobby and wonderfully clean and well appointed room!  Staff friendly, helpful and profession! Made our stay just wonderful!

title: Great location
text: Location of this hotel is perfect. You would think all the city noise of Time Square would make its way to your room but it doesn’t. Close to multiple su away entrances making it super easy to get around. Staff is very helpful and the bar has a great view of Time Square. Rooms can feel outdated but overall a great stay

title: Best Times Square view!
text: We had a wonderful stay at M Social. The staff was wonderful and accommodating. The room was very clean and well appointed. I can’t say enough about the view we had of Times Square - it was phenomenal!  I would stay here again.

title: Happy Traveler
text:
Fun, funky colorful hotel. Staffs were great and helpful. Love the roof top bar. Great view. Location is perfect. 
Drinks and food were great and well priced. I love the set up for laptops, quiet and spacious.

title: Location location location
text: Exceptional view of time square, but still no noise in the rooms. Spacious enough for the location. Live music in the hall. Near subway stations and tons of restaurant and activities. We were pleased with this hotel

title: Location, Staff, and View
text:
The location of the hotel was ideal. Long days of sightseeing it was nice to get back to a clean room with an amazing view. The bed was comfortable and pillows soft, it was difficult to get up in the morning.
The staff was professional and polite, all my interactions with them were positive. On the last full day of our stay we had an injury while walking back to our hotel. My companion twisted her ankle and it became swollen. We were limited to entertain ourselves with an amazing view from the rooftop bar. A shout out to Manny who was just so nice and genuine who saw my friend hurt and  brought her a bag of ice for her ankle. The ice-machine on our floor was out of service and I just let the front desk know and they were able to arrange to send a bucket of ice to our room. I liked my stay and would stay again.

title: M Social Every Year!!
text: Always a great experience at M Social, we stay here every year for the annual Neurosurgery Softball Tournament for Brain Tumor Research. Room was cleaned everyday by Evalina, she’s so friendly and honored any requests we had.  Our room (1820) was spacious (for NY anyway) and comfortable, that reminds me, I need to update our bedding and pillows.  Anyway, M Social is so close to most things we enjoy NY for!

title: Wonderful Stay
text:
My husband and I stayed for a few nights for his birthday trip to NYC, we had a wonderful stay at M Social! The staff were very professional and pleasant, I wished they were a bit  friendlier however... We paid to check in early, so we were able to start enjoying our short trip quicker! The staff provided additional items we requested for the room very efficiently and that assisted in making our stay more comfortable. The front desk staff also provided advice for our questions on transportation etc.

There is an additional high daily resort fee however, so the resort is not cheap. The beds and pillows are very comfortable, we slept well! The elevators are somewhat an issue however as you need to take 2 elevators to get to your floor.

There is a convenience store nearby to buy water, food etc. We did alot of walking on our trip, even though there are 2 subway stations on nearby streets.

We wished they replenished items a bit more but they did when we asked... It was a great birthday trip!

title: Location is great!
text: The location of the hotel is excellent. The bar area has a great view of Times Square. The bar also has great drinks and music also games. The room is clean and that is comfortable. Check in and check out were very easy and the front desk staff were always nice. The only complaint was housekeeping – we had to ask for towels multiple times a day each day we were there. They also took the soap out of the shower and never replaced it so we had to ask for that and they got quite upset and had an attitude when they came to bring what they took back .

title: Amazing stay at the M Social
text: The location of the Hotel and view of Times Square are fantastic. The nice rooftop bar makes the whole stay perfect. The rooms are very clean and the staff very helpful. I have nothing negative to say about my stay, just wished, I could have stayed longer.

title: 13 Years Traveling and Living Midtown are NYC , Visit this Property Year after Year!
text:
The Team Make the Hotel Such a Great Experience!
Hotel lobby Looks like your Chill, Modern, Fancy Organized Fun Envierment , Biggest and Best View RoofTop In Midtown and is Not on the Roof so no Burning Sensation ( LOL )  Broadway Shows 3-9 Minute Walk Restaurants All Over I would Suggest Teloache (Mexican Food , Elegant Concept, A Must Visit My Favorite!) Or Victors Cafe (Cuban Cuisine , Hidden Gem ,a Must Visit) NYC experience  Rooms Clean and Cozy!  and Staff Super Friend ly Thank you for all you do to Make this Hotel a Great Experience .
Regard
Eddie

title: Celebrating our honeymoon
text:
Me and my wife came & stayed at the mSocial for our honeymoon and John was fantastic, he was extremely welcoming and even put a bottle of bubbly and a little card in the room upon arrival, it was fantastic. 

Room was brilliant with an amazing view of Times Square. Everything we needed to make out stay extra special. 

Thanks again John & mSocial for making our trip so memorable. Much love, the Roses

title: Absolutely great NYC first time experience! Love this hotel! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
text:
This was an amazing top class first time experience in NYC ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I was choosing a hotel a big time since my first and long-waited visit to NYC was top of importance, so I have analyzed many different options and M Social at Times Square was one of the priority options due to price/quality (spacy rooms for this location) and by all means Times Square great location.

I have made my mind set that I shall stay here straight after I had my online communication experience with Lorenzo Mangum - sales and complex manager of the hotel. Lorenzo was so great, friendly and assisting that I have immediately made my mind to stop looking at other options and I did a right choice - everything was great: fresh and good-looking hotel with very modern facilities and very interesting and lively lobby (as the name suggests, very social one). 

When I have arrived - I have experiences a most wonderful hospitality experience from the very beginning with a greeting letter and a gift from the hotel - yellow taxi (see photo) with hotel’s branded logo and some sweets, so I have already received a souvenieer from NYC which my son will most definitelt appreciate! :)

About hotel overall: Rooms are great, views are great, beds pretty comfy - do not understand comments on “rough beds. Staff from both receptions (they have concierge reception and main reception on different floors) were top-notch!

Everything was great, I am sure I will stay again and looking forward to my next visit in NYC - thanks big time Lorenzo and M Social Times Square team for a nice stay! 👌🙏⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Good hotel in an excellent location
text: We really enjoyed our stay in the hotel. It’s location was convenient to a number of subway lines and Times Square and theatres. Hotel was well maintained, staff very helpful and personable, room clean and serviced every day. Would definitely stay here again

title: Great!
text: Great hotel right near Times Square, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, etc. If you're going to Broadway shows, this is a great hotel. Fun lobby with a nice rooftop bar with a view of Times Square. Worked with Lorenzo who was great!

title: Great Times Square Hotel
text: Check in was quick and easy.  Stella at the front desk was great to work with providing a toy for each of my daughters as it was their first time in Times Square.  We were able to upgrade rooms to a Times Square view thanks to Stella looking out for us. Bravo for providing an amazing guest experience by listening and using the tools provided to create lifetime memories. Thanks again!

title: Great hotel for our stay in NYC
text: We had a lot to pack in for a 4day stay. The hotel location was great for us, because it was in walking distance of the places we needed to be. Our room FaceTime Square on the 27th floor. It was a beautiful view both day and night. Which certainly recommend this hotel to any of our family and friends.

title: Remboursement et personnel
text:
Ce sont des voleurs!!! 
Ils m’ont prélevés la somme de 440$ de frais apparement pour tous les clients, somme qu’ils devaient me rembourser à la fin du séjour. 
Nous sommes partis le 28mai et un mois plus tard toujours aucun remboursement. 
Communication très difficile par mail ou ils m’indiquent que le virement est partis mais que ça peut prendre 10jours, puis maintenant 20jours, et au final plus de nouvelles!!!! 
Je leur demande la preuve du virement entre leur service comptabilité et ma banque mais ils ne m’envoient rien! 
Hôtel à fuir!!!!

title: M Social NYC Amazing Stay
text: We stayed at the M Social Millennium hotel over the past weekend for gay pride NYC and had a first time amazing stay. The location is excellent so close to Time Square but far enough apart to make it crowd comfortable also very near Columbus Circle and Central Park. The found out room excellent and the staff overall to include the bar and restaurant excellent as well. I'm sure we will stay there again.

title: It was just Ok
text: It was ok. Tv didn’t work for several hours at night. The service was just Ok not the best place I have stayed in NYC again. Location was good. A couple of things not mentioning I would just be picky if I mention.

title: Great experience, right in times square
text:
Beautiful views of the city or Time Square for a small upgrade charge. Clean rooms and accommodating and friendly staff. Want your own Keurig and coffee pods, simply dial 0 and ask. The restaurant (open from from 7am til 11:30pm) has an  amazing breakfast buffet and offers many menu selections for breakfast, lunch, dinner or in between special treats to accommodate anyone out sightseeing or enjoying the many other activities only NYC offers.
We would definitely stay here again.

title: Absolutely the best location in midtown Manhattan!
text: We stayed at the M Social both last year and this year while visiting New York City, and it's one of the top hotels we've ever stayed at. It has the best of everything: very comfortable beds, great views of the city, wonderful lobby and outdoor terrace, perfect location on Broadway in midtown Manhattan, and very nice staff. We've recommended this hotel to family members who have traveled to NYC, and they've loved it as well! This hotel is perfect for Broadway shows, and is very close to Times Square, 30 Rock, Ed Sullivan Theatre, and Central Park, all of which we walked to easily. Subway stations are nearby for those wanting to venture further, and Metro cards are easy to get at a subway station. A special thank you to Valentina, our wonderful housekeeper, who we loved visiting with!

title: A Marvelous New York Experience
text: The accommodations were excellent; the breakfast buffet was fantastic! We could not have chosen a better location because an excellent restaurant and the theater were within walking distance!  I look forward to a return trip! Thanks to all who assisted us at the hotel-wonderful staff!

title: Greatest experience ever
text: I absolutely adore this hotel and will always stay here when needing a midtown hotel. The customer service, the room, the rooftop bar and lobby all top tier for families, friends and couples. My only complaint is for all 4 elevators to work at once, due to the hotel popularity its really busy. Other than that i love it here.

title: Amazing
text:
Very good experience. Valentina was very nice and cleaned the room so good. She is amazing. 
Clean, nice amenities, wonderful and respectful stuff . This is the hotel i will be staying again when i visit the magical city of new york again 
See you soon

title: Generally Pleasant Stay Marred By A I Surly Condescending Checkout Person…
text:
I just completed two nights at the M Social in Times Square, and save for a couple minor quibbles (the ice machine was non-functional and the fabric on one piece of furniture in the room was heavily frayed on the back corner) I would have said I had a pleasant stay and would recommend the hotel.  The room was comfortable, stylish and for Times Square larger than average.  The location of the hotel can’t be beat, very close to many restaurants and the theater district (Gershwin Theater in particular). 

Check-in is at 4 PM (very late by most standards) and I arrived super-early at 10 AM.  I figured no room would be available, and it wasn’t…. There was the ability to check your bags downstairs and I did just that while waiting for a room to open up.  Fast forward to Noon, and I checked again, with the helpful staff member telling me yes they now had a room available…. I was happy to hear it until I was informed it would be an additional $75 for early check-in.  I took it, but didn’t like it as if the room was available it cost the hotel next to nothing to allow me to check-in early.  At $300 a night one would think they would just let you check-in, not get a free $75 off of the customer just because they can.  That said, while annoyed, I agreed to it, so won’t hold the hotel responsible.

No, the 3 star rating has to do with the absolutely horrific customer service I received by the sole person at the registration/checkout terminal this morning as I was checking out of the hotel around 6:45 AM.  The man was oddly wearing what looked like a jean jacket or vest…. Something I would not have expected the hotel staff to be wearing (and indeed no one else was dressed like that the entire time of my stay save this “gentleman.”). Odd dress aside, he greeted me nonchalantly, only asking directly “checking out?”  No inquiry was made as to how my stay was, or even a good morning for that matter…. He then asked for my room number and after looking up my bill, he printed out my room charges…. I asked if I could quickly look them over and he appeared really put-out by that request, though did not stop me.  I saw everything looked in order save one minor item that I politely pointed out…. I mentioned the “Destination Fee” (like a daily resort fee without any of the benefits of a resort) included a $10 bar/restaurant credit *daily*.  I used the bar/restaurant Beast & Butterflies 2 times on separate days, and was only credited one $10 charge.  I inquired why I didn’t receive the second $10 credit…. This is where things went south.  He put on the most condescending, insulting look on his face (obviously intentional) and informed me with great glee that I did not order a drink on the second bill.  I mentioned I didn’t because the drinks were included with my meal and I didn’t need a separate drink when they were included in the cost of the second meal.  He just grinned with that same face and said “no one has ever said that one before.”  Needless to say I told him, then let me be the first!  Of course he didn’t care and just shined the same condescending cynical smile and said nothing else.  No credit given, no apathy, no care at all for the customer.  He turned over a $10 charge a great stay into one I am writing this review (4 stars for the hotel and zero stars for his unprofessional behavior - which I will average to a 3, but will never return or recommend the M Social due to it).

The bottom line is even if the policy was as he said, he could have handled the situation any number of different ways, all would have better than how he *did* handle it.  For example, he could have apologized, but informed me the policy was you had to order a drink in order to get the credit, but as a one time courtesy, he would credit me the $10 since he could see how I might have misunderstood…. On a $700+ bill one would think getting a $10 credit would not feel like pulling teeth.  So, no credit, and instead I write this review.  I hope the “gentleman” at the checkout counter this morning is happy he got one over on the customer!

title: Excellent hotel in a fantastic location
text: Very young feeling swish hotel magnificent views of Times Square and New York in general . Food very good and roof bar is a delight to behold with views to die for ! Very clean hotel with either city views or Hudson views recommend it very highly !

title: Excellent location, cool hotel, unfriendly front desk
text: Very centrally located, cool rooftop bar with incredible view. Nice rooms, quite for being in the middle of Manhattan. Very arrogant front desk and very loud reception area. Good value for being close to Times Square

title: Great Stay!!
text: Had a great stay this past weekend. Visited the city with some old friends for the weekend and we stayed at the M Social. The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and modern. Also, the location was very convenient for traveling around the city. Will definitely be back!

title: Shuaib Lakhany
text: Excellent hotel, they really cater to your needs and have exceptionally clean facilities, will be staying here again. The hotel staff were all very polite, professional, and listened well. Breakfast and hotel restaurant were fantastic as well. Stay at M Social, you won’t be disappointed!

title: My stay
text: It was a little hard to find the building the lady wasn't really good with directions, the room was amazing and clean a little tricky with the lights but lovely & my only main problem is I didn't receive my deposit back, & I would like it back.

title: Extraordinaria Vista a Time Square.
text: Excelente vista y chek out muy rápido. Excelente. Toda la habitación impecable. Hotel limpio. Bar muy variado. Y la atención de todo el personal excelente. Volveríamos encantados otra vez a visitarlos.

title: Business Trip
text: Was there for business so did not get to experience anything that i would want to as a tourist. Next time i'm in the city maybe ill check it out if the price is right, i wouldnt know what the going rate is for this place otherwise.

title: Excellent Location
text: Hotel was in a brilliant location and the rooms were well maintained. The views from the rooftop bar were great, however drinks in the bar are quite expensive. We never ate in the hotel, as it was also quite expensive, but it looked decent. For the location alone, this hotel is for sure worth it.

title: Amazing Stay!
text: The hotel was great. I was there with my daughter to check out some colleges and it was great coming back to the hotel after a day of walking around. It was very relaxing to get back to the room. The hotel was so conveniently located.

title: Great place to experience Manhattan
text: Good place for families, especially first time visiting Manhattan. Great location near Times Square and many other landmarks in midtown. Lots of places to eat nearby too. Would recommend this hotel for families and first time visitors to Manhattan

title: Won’t be stayed again.
text:
Bathroom is not fully cleaned during our stay. Used/waste tissue paper is not picking up / throwaway after daily cleaning. Beds are too small and too short.  Not comfortable.
Only location is great!  Very convenience.

title: Excelente experiência
text: Localização excelente, vista para a Times Square, rooftop espetacular com vários ambientes. Perto do metro e dos teatros da Broadway. Restaurantes, supermercados e serviços tudo próximo e tranquilo para descansar.

title: Great Housekeeping!
text: Room service lady Valentina was amazing and provided excellent service to my room that I’ve never seen before (and I travel a lot). Made stay even more enjoyable. Wish I was able to stream Netflix etc but that was only complaint.

title: Overnight stay
text:
It took house keeping 40 minutes to deliver a towel. Contacted the desk 3 times after the first call to check on the status. UNACCEPTABLE for a so called 4 Star hotel.

The first hotel that I have had issues with early check-in. The hotel has rooms set aside for an additional $100!!!!

Utterly disappointing experience to say the least.

title: Family trip
text: This hotel is in a great location. The rooms and beds were clean and comfortable. Staff was friendly and accommodating with our group, from front desk baggage, hospitality.  Would definitely stay and recommend this hotel again!

title: An excellent hotel in Times Square
text: Had an enjoyable stay at the M Social in June 2023. The rooms were spacious and quiet, the beds comfy and the housekeeping services were excellent. The only downside is it is in Times Square but that was what made it affordable for us. Would definitely return and recommend!

title: Fun, cool decor and great location
text: We had a great time at this hotel. It has cool decor, lovely staff and a great location- right near Times Square. But best if all is the super comfy bed and bed linens. We just felt so relaxed and slept so well. Had a blast in NYC staying at this great hotel.

title: great central location, average no frills hotel
text: I expected WOW, it was meh. Was wishing for better customer service. If you are headed to the bar, bring a drink for your wait.  No preference to residence, you can stay anywhere and come into enjoy the deck views, they are great.  The location is very good, easy access to subway, Hells Kitchen and not far from the Park.

title: Great Stay in Times Square
text: Stayed at most every hotel in NYC Times Square.  M Social is a great choice.  The beds are great and the rooms are spacious for Times Square standards.  The outdoor patio is awesome. The only complaint is the breakfast is not good.

title: Central to exciting Time Square, Theatres, and shopping! Family friendly, comfy beds, clean & quiet!!
text: This was the first time that I visited M Social Hotel Time Square N.Y. It used to be the Novotel and for 10 yrs. my sister, mother and I had gone to N.Y. on the first Friday in June to have a special holiday together. I was surprised, and thrilled that the new M Social was equally as good as the Novotel was. The lobby and interior is much brighter and attractive. Some of the staff was the same as we had known for 10 yrs. Yvonne made it possible for my sister and me to have the same room as we had had when my mother was alive. It was extremely important to us and we are so appreciative of her help! Thank you to Edward, the Manager for making our visit a memorable one. Thank you to Alvin for greeting us as family and remembering us as 10 yr. friends!! I love the M Social and would recommend it to anyone who wants a friendly, comfortable, exciting stay in New York!!

title: Amazing,amazing M Social Hotel Times Square
text: This hotel was previously Novotel Times Square which I had stayed in for 10-15 years.  My file had not been transferred to the newly owned M Social Hotel Time Square but I was welcomed like a long lost friend and client by the ever present front desk gentleman,Alvin! What a wonderful surprise to see him. As usual check in was flawless- our high level room overlooking Times Square was cleaned a little earlier to accommodate our early arrival. The location is exceptional ( easy walking distance to Time Square, Broadway the diner Cosmic), the room amazing and the staff ( although overwhelmed occasionally) is accommodating and professional. I will always stay here when I visit NYC. Fantastic rooftop bar !!!

title: I will hladly come back again
text: Great location,polite and friendly stuff,the cleaning lady polite ,did her best to keep the room clean(room no.2617. ).Such a nice view on the river.I didn't have breakfast or other meals therefore I don't have an opinion.

title: M Social is a fantastic choice to stay!
text: The hotel lobby/bar area is spacious and smells amazing. The rooms are perfect and clean as ever and super quiet! I loved all the spaces to store things it was efficiently planned. The staff was top notch! It was shocking that we were just off broadway! I felt close to everything yet far from it all. There are so many amenities for the guests, the outdoor spaces, lobby, media room, convenience shop, dinning all of it!

title: Another wonderful stay for Fleet Week at M Social
text: This is our 3rd stay at M Social in the last 3 years.  We keep coming back because the value, location and fabulous amenities/service cannot be beat. The location is perfect  as it is just above Times Square ( avoiding the noise/ crowds) and walkable to great restaurants, Central Park, MOMA and the Broadway theatres.  The front desk staff are always helpful and friendly. The housekeeping staff is so quiet - you just never know they are there while you are sleeping in from a late night out in the city that never sleeps.  They even left us a thank you note for the daily room service tip and always greeted us with a hello or good morning. The rooftop bar cannot be beat with the incredible view and fire pits. The bartenders were creative and service was great! We enjoyed the daily breakfast buffet - well stocked with traditional American Breakfast ( eggs, bacon, toast, potatoes. Pancakes/ french toast as well as various pastries and fresh fruit. The coffee was excellent ( so no need to run to Starbucks!. We got the bed and breakfast special with a larger room with view of the Hudson and included breakfast plus daily bar credit. Really a very good value a d all with an  excellent t view.  This is our new go- to hotel for our annual New York City trips/ adventures.

title: Very good hotel in the middle of Manhattan
text: If you want to enjoy your days in New York in the heart of Manhattan, this hotel is just perfect. The rooms are bigger than in a lot of other hotels, the lobby, the bar and the restaurant are light and spacious and the rooftop terrace with a view over Times Square is fantastic. All service was perfect and I also enjoyed using a very well equipped gym.

title: Fabulous Times Square staycation
text: My family stayed at M social for a Memorial Day staycation. We had a joining rooms that looked out over Times Square. It was great! The kids loved it and the rooms were clean, comfortable and chic.my kids loved the breakfast over Times Square too.

title: Great Location
text: The hotel itself was spectacular. Very well kept. The staff was very nice and attentive. Breakfast buffet food was good just hope for more variety. The view was amazing. You can look at Time Square from your room or roof top which was amazing view.

title: Très bien situé au cœur de l’action
text:
Très belle expérience 
Bien situé en plein times square
Près de tout 
Stationnement accessible 55$ par jour
Buffet déjeuner très bon et complet 
Pas de menu enfant par contre
La vue pour le resto incroyable 
Les lits très confortables
Bon service

title: Great View of Times Square from room
text: We were on the 20th floor and had a GREAT VIEW of Times Square. We could see the Hudson River from the window near the elevator. It's at walking distance to many attractions, buildings, parks, theater

title: Excellent choice
text: All was well no complaints. Our upgrade was well worth the money, great views to Times Square. Did not test the roof terrace due to rain but that also looked great. Room was tidy and beds comfy. I can recommend this hotel!

title: 4 Days NYC
text:
Perfectly situated. Gives you opportunity to take brakes between activities. 
Price / Value for NYC perfect. We felt very comfortable. Enjoyed the view, quietness and the cleanness of the room. Thank you to the whole team for making our stay memorable.

title: May stay
text: Always our favorite place to stay! We always recommend M Social to friends and family. Location is great and staff is always wonderful. Rooms are the perfect size and the rooms always have a great view!!

title: Super bien placé et une vue manifique.
text:
L hôtel est vraiment très bien, tres bien placé, roof top avec une vue au top, le seul reproche c est l isolation, on entend les voisins aller au wc, les gens passer devant la porte la sonnerie de l ascenseur etc etc.
Pour le bruit de la rue c est moins grave car cela fait partie de l expérience New York, mais le reste c est dommage.

title: Wonderful atmosphere
text: Comfortable bed, great atmosphere, excellent location.Sleek design so much so took four days to figure out how to turn lights on. Never did understand how to work the TV. A very nice gentlemen came to help us but his English was so broken we didn't have a clue what he said.

title: Just book it, you won’t be sorry.
text:
Fantastic location less than two blocks from the red stairs. 
The lobby was bustling, lots going on, great bar… but the rooms were SOUNDPROOFED! Completely quite. Water pressure is fine, I don’t love a rain shower head but the hand held was amazing.    
The view from our room was spectacular. 10/10. Most definitely recommend for tourists.

title: Recomendo! Limpo, animado e organizado. Bom custo benefício.
text: O hotel no geral é muito bom. Organizado, animado durante a tarde e a noite e os quartos bons com móveis bem conservados e bem limpos. Ficamos no 14° andar e nosso quarto era arrumado pela camareira Luzia. Além de muito educada e respeitosa, o serviço dela era excelente! Sem falar na localização do hotel...na Times Square. Da varanda do bar do hotel é possivel acompanhar o movimento da Times Square enquanto toma um drink. Enfim, recomendo!

title: It's ok
text: My review is titled as ok as sadly that is all it was was ok. Location is great but rest was just ok. Wouldn't stay there again, would book a different hotel. When this was Novotel we stayed eight times and loved everything about it. Sadly this is now not the case. With cleanliness in room not great. Housekeeping not great. Service in some areas of hotel is really good, but other areas it's poor.  Music in the evening was far too loud, so you could hardly have a conversation due to the loud music, and some nights there were private events on in the bar area so the noise was ridiculous.

title: Good to stay
text: It is a good experience to stay here if you think you want to enjoy musicals or sightseeing around Broadway.  It sometimes makes you wait long for elevators to come, between lobby and your room floor and between street level and lobby.  Nice overall in general.

title: MSocial walking distance to everything & close to subway
text: My husband chose to visit New York as a birthday gift to self on 5/24. It’s our 1st time to New York and we are creating beautiful memories. We chose to stay at the MSocial Times Square, the room is modern clean and a decent size for both of us but our view to Times Square is amazing. It’s close to many attractions we have walked to Radio City, MoMa, Rockafella Plaza, St Patrick’s Cathedral, The rock and more. Our biggest fear was the subway & it was easy to arrive literally just a turn at the corner stressed for no reason. The E train heading to World Trade Center get off on 7th Avenue and you’re here. Oh by the way the elevator works and you use 2 to get to your room the view from the bar is the same as our room amazing but outside. You won’t regret your stay.

title: Doelgroep is duidelijk de jong volwassene met een dikke portemonnaie
text: M Social bleek niet 4 sterren waardig. De pluspunten van dit hotel zijn de ligging en de goede concierge-service;dit werkt via whatsapp. De minpunten zijn er echter teveel. Sobere kamer, veel te kleine badkamer zonder toebehoren zoals bodylotion, douchekapje enz. Geen badjas, geen slippers, geen pen en papier, geen standaard koffie of thee apparatuur, minibar niet gevuld. Ontvangst op de begane grond door ongeinteresseerde portiers, met de lift paar verdiepingen hoger voor receptie. Inchecken kan pas vanaf 16.00 uur, eerder kan wel maar kost $100. Ontbijtruimte heeft veel te weinig capaciteit waardoor lange wachtrijen ontstaan. De hotelgasten zijn voornamelijk jong volwassenen, al dan niet gesponsord door papa en mama. Getuigt ook de voetbaltafel en Playstation in de gezamelijke ruimte en de zichzelf aanstellende influencers die zich voor hun mobiel hysterisch vermaken in hun eentje zolang de camera loopt. De vier liften waarvan er een de hele week kapot was zijn een ramp. Duurt soms vijf minuten voor er een komt. Maar het grootste minpunt van dit hotel zijn de (voornamelijk vrouwelijke) medewerkers van de receptie, de bar en bij het ontbijt. Met de attitude en arrogante uitstraling die zij hebben geven ze je een niet welkom gevoel en heb je constant het gevoel dat je op je donder krijgt. Klantvriendelijkheid een dikke onvoldoende. En dat voor bijna $ 500 per nacht excl. ontbijt. Dat ontbijt is overigens karig. Helemaal voor de prijs van $ 27. Tijdens ons verblijf bleek er midden in de nacht een brandalarm op de 11e etage. Je zit stijf in je bed als door de speaker ineens een brandweercommandant roept kalm te blijven en te wachten op verdere instructies. Na een kwartier blijkt het loos alarm. Je zou van een viersterrenhotel verwachten dat zij eea terug koppelen de dag erna naar hun gasten middels een briefje, appje of beter nog een gratis drankje voor het ongemak. We hebben echter niets vernomen vanuit het hotel. Gemiste kans in mijn ogen. Conclusie: te duur voor hetgeen zij te bieden hebben. Niet geschikt voor mensen die Europese viersterren gewend zijn.

title: Near Times Square
text: MSocial is a great location.  The hotel is clean and staff are kind.  Get to breakfast early or you won’t get a seat.  They have entertainment in the lounge area on Friday nights.  That’s all I have to say.

title: tres appréciable, hotel bien située, roof top sympa
text:
Nous sommes rendu à cet hotel debut mai 2023, parents et deux enfants de 15 et 8 ans.

L'hotel est bien située et proche de times square, proche de métro, il y a aussi des taxis a proximité.
Le roof top est un élément assez appréciable et fait tout le charme de l'hotel, de pouvoir avoir la vue sur times square et prendre un verre en meme temps. apres une journéée bien remplie, cela est tres appréciable
Il y a tous les soirs des activités sur le roof top et est gratuit pour les résidents.

Chambre spacieuse, literie confortable surtout apres avoir bien marche toute la journée.
Chambre bien insonorisé et ménage effectué tous les jours, chambre propre.
si vous etes bien situé vous avez encore la vue sur times square de votre chambre,
Le personnel est agréable et répond à  vos questions.

La salle de bain est fonctionnel mais un peu petite, c'est a dire que quand vous etes a deux dedans c'est un peu etroit mais elle est fonctionnel.
La salle de bain etait propre, essuie main en suffisance et pas d'avis négatif.

il faut juste faire attention , c'est surtout au niveau de la caution, pratique courante au usa, mais il faut en tenir compte et des taxes de séjours a ajouter chaque jour.
Ce n'est pas un point négatif mais toujours bon à savoir.

Conclusion : tres bon hotel, bien situé, roof top appréciable, chambre propre, personnel agréable et souriant

title: Nice hotel
text:
the service in the hotel was very good. the rooms are very neat and cleaned every day, beds made and new towels.
the prices in the hotel are on the high side but that's NY anyway.
We had a very nice stay!

title: You just pay for the location... not the quality of service and the friendliness of staff...
text: They overbook the rooms with a nice view and a highest price and then just give you what they have left... without telling you that the room category is not what you paid for. You spend hours waiting for and elevator: you have to take two (one to the lobby and one to get outside) and there is almost always a line... The mastresses have a weird shape and are not comfortable.

title: Try it
text:
this hotel was a pleasure.  A great location right in the middle of the City. If you want to dine/drink in the hotel  t
 here is a great  outdoor bar area.  The rooms were clean and the staff were very helpful.

title: Great Times Square Hotel
text: The place checks all the boxes and is somewhat affordable for it’s location. Great second floor outdoor bar overlooking Times Square for a nightly night cap. The staff is very nice and helpful. I’ll stay here again.

title: Excelente servicio
text: El hotel en general esta muy bien. El personal de recepcion fue super amable. Nosotras llegamos de un vuelo de 14 horas e hicieron todo lo posible para consegurinos un early check-in. Las habitaciones no son muy grandes pero las camas son comodas. La localizacion muy buena, a 5 cuadras de Time Square y 2 del subte. Muy limpio y ordenado. El area del lobby es amplia y comoda. Tienen mesas para llevar tu comida y cenar ahi en caso de no utilizar el servicio de comedor. La relacion precio beneficio me parecio un poco alta pero sacando esto, es recomendable.

title: Great hotel
text:
This place is great. Perfect location at a good price. 
Breakfast was literally everything you could want. Eggs, bread, bacon, fruit, toast, yoghurt, cereal. 
All the staff I spoke to were super friendly and helpful. 
I went to the gym whilst I was there and although it’s small has everything you could want. 
The rooms are cool with iPad controlled lights etc. 
The only downside is the room was a bit small. I was on my own and it was fine but I think a couple would struggle. Also the road is loud. However, you don’t come to NY to sleep!

title: The best experience
text:
Best location, excellent service. Attractions of interest very close to the location, and very close at hand with transportation. One of the best views of Time Square from its terrace. 
Nada más que agregar.

title: Incorrect bill!!!!
text: Not responsive when you inquire about inaccuracies related to you bill!! Check it twice, three times! Ask for a room higher than the 9th floor. If you end up above the terrace, it gets loud and you can hear people’s conversation.

title: Great location but very basic  expensive hotel
text: Hotel was in a fantastic location. Everywhere was so easy to get too from this hotel. The rooftop bar also had a fantastic view of Times Square, however the drinks were extremely expensive.  We chose not to have breakfast as at $30 each was for a hotel of this standard very pricey and with so many wonderful diners nearby it was an easy decision. The room was very very basic, no coffee or water provided.  The bathroom a very dull, brown colour which showed up all the stains the cleaners missed. This Hotel was the standard of a Travel Lodge and the price of The Hilton ( if you're from the UK you will understand!) Two of the 4 elevators were broken down for 3 days meaning wait times were ridiculous. 2 mornings we ended up walking down the stairs as 3 times it stopped on our floor and was packed with people. And then this ridiculous ",resort fee" what on earth is that for?? We weren't offered any discount on that when they couldn't provide 4 elevators. Overall a tired feel to the whole hotel whose location seemed to mean they didn't need to try

title: Horrible unsafe un clean hotel
text:
Theft in the room. In your absence be prepared to lock your things in the suitcases. Always keep your purchases under lock and key. Even when you go out for sometime make sure donot leave any of your stuffs in the room open.
And on repeated requests also the hotel does not take responsibility for that. They donot bother for your safety.
The day we arrived from Orlando it was 2:30 PM. We had booked for two rooms but they said only one is ready. The other will be ready at 4 :30 PM. So we could use the bathroom and go out for sightseeing. As soon as we opened the hand held shower water started gushing out from both the showers overhead aswell. We tried all settings but in vain.  After repeated reminders they sent a plumber who took an hour to repair it with washers and bolts. He wetted the whole of bathroom and outside carpets. He was wearing shoes through out. Nobody bothered to come and cleanup the mess! He also told us not to turn the tap the other side since the problem could happen again but the next day when we came back after a tired hectic day the housekeeping staff had turned it the other side and it had to be done all again!
The Air Con was way so cold that it left us shivering. The heat mode does not work. Again a Technican came with all the pliers and drivers and ladder. Took another hour. And guess what next day when we went and came back again the same things had to be repeated with AC and the Bath area shower also since the house keeping staff changed it back!!
Very poor guest service. My daughters stationary stuff worth 100 $ were burgled right under my nose. We had purchased it from Michaels and opened it that night on our mattress. Next day went out and came back in the evening just to find our things had gone out of our sight.
Never go here guys. A simple and best advice you will get better hotels. Your peace of mind is gone once you enter this M Social hotel in Times Square.

title: Excellent time
text: Excellent stay, overall clean space, great view, amazing time, amazing location near everything we needed to go to for the trip, near transportation entry, great food and ambiance. Nice modern design.

title: Family stay in NYC
text:
Average hotel with great location during our stay 3 out of 4 elevators were out of order making going to and coming from the room long and stressful. 
Staff were generally friendly but on departure even though it was quite at the front desk we weren't asked about our stay, just asked for payment.

title: Excellent Hotel, Excellent Location
text: I would highly recommend this hotel. We stayed for 4 nights and the staff were excellent, the bar and terrace area are a highlight and the breakfast was really good and kept us going for a good part of the day. I will be returning to this hotel and have already recommended it to family.

title: MAGIQUE
text: Bel hôtel situé  côté de times square, chambre hyper confortable et propre avec vue sur times square. Petit déjeuner très copieux mais cher on est à New York 😀. Je recommande. Idéal pour les visites.

title: Great view but horrible hotel
text: The staff were extremely rude and need to be trained on etiquette! I would not recommend this hotel. The beds were full size instead of queen size. Only two elevators were working our entire stay😡 we had to use the service elevators one day because the elevators were taking too long! The hotel had a great view of time square and the housekeepers did a really great job! Otherwise the hotel is truly overrated.

title: Excellent hotel but disappointing City View from my room
text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the  M Social Times Square NYC for 4 nights with my friend. Overall, this is a lovely hotel. The hotel boasted cleanliness, modern rooms and trendy decor. The lobby was very spacious, trendy and overall had great entertainment. The patio (terrace actually) was also nice and offered views of Times Square. 
However, there was one aspect of my stay that left me feeling disappointed - the lack of the promised city view.
Let's start with the positives. The hotel's cleanliness was impeccable. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted by a spotless and well-maintained environment. The modern rooms were another highlight of my experience. The decor was stylish and contemporary, and the amenities provided were top-notch. The room itself was spacious (for NYC), well-deisgned, and equipped with everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The attention to detail in terms of room features and furnishings was commendable, and I truly enjoyed the modern and sleek ambiance.

However, the disappointment came when I discovered that my reserved "city view" room did not live up to expectations. Instead of the promised city view of NYC, the window overlooked an air conditioning unit and a clutter of other equipment. I had specifically chosen the city view room to soak in the vibrant energy of NYC, but sadly, that is not what I received.
While this disappointment dampened my enthusiasm, it did not overshadow the hotel's other positive attributes. The cleanliness, modernity, and location were still instrumental in creating a pleasant stay. Nonetheless, I hope the hotel management takes note of this discrepancy in room allocation, as a false promise of a city view can lead to unmet expectations and disappointment for future guests.
Overall, my experience at this hotel was enjoyable and I would still recommend this hotel to others, but with the caveat that they confirm the room's view in advance to avoid any letdowns.

title: Used to love it, won't stay again.
text: What they charge for breakfast $30/person for bag eggs and frozen mini pancakes is absurd! Only 1 elevator worked. We used to love staying here but this last trip made it impossible for us to want to go back. Beware!

title: Awesome stay! Far exceed expectations!
text:
Fantastic hotel. Excellent location. Friendly staff. High energy. Great views. 
Far exceeded our expectations. 
Awesome Fitness center. 
Definitely worth the money & will return. 
Close to Time Square, Central Park and Broadway shows. 
Thank you for delivering a wonderful experience.

title: Times Square fantastic stay!
text: M Social hotel has a great vibe, modern, clean and the great location. Staff are very friendly and feels very safe. Definitely recommend this place as you’re steps away from Times Square and accessible to everywhere. Rooftop bars have amazing views as well and great cocktails

title: Geen 4 sterren niveau waardig!
text:
We hadden dit hotel geboekt op basis van de 4 sterren en op basis van de reviews. Omdat we rond 13.00 uur aankwamen en je eigenlijk pas om 16.00 uur kunt inchecken hebben we gevraagd of het mogelijk was om eerder in te checken. Dit bleek mogelijk te zijn, maar daar moesten we 100 USD extra voor betalen. We hebben dat niet gedaan omdat het ons vreemd lijkt dat als je inderdaad al kamers klaar hebt dat je daar dan extra voor moet betalen als je eerder wil inchecken. Dus de koffers achter gelaten en om 16.00 uur ingecheckt, waarbij het zoals verwacht aardig druk was en we dus lang moesten wachten. Uiteindelijk bleek er om 16.00 uur maar 1 van de 2 kamers klaar te zijn wat op zich vreemd is omdat je standaard om 11.00 uur moet uitchecken. Na veel overleg en op en neerlopen naar waarschijnlijk een leidinggevende kregen we te horen dat het nog even zou duren voor de 2e kamer klaar zou zijn. Als troost kregen we 2 drankjes aangeboden en geen 4 ondanks dat we met zijn 4-en waren. De reden hiervoor was dat die ene kamer al klaar was en dat 1 van de 2 stellen gewoon naar de kamer kon gaan. Dat we met 2 stellen waren en dus op elkaar wilden wachten maakte hen blijkbaar niets uit. Daarom 2 drankjes van het hotel gekregen en 2 zelf betaald, zodat we op elkaar konden wachten voor we naar de hotelkamers gingen. In de hotelkamer aangekomen bleek dit enigszins tegen te vallen. De geboekte kamers kostten 500 USD per nqcht maar zijn zo basic als mogelijk. Een bed, een lege minibar, een bakje met onbeduidende vlekken erin en bedenkelijke vloerbedekking. Helaas geen slippertjes waarmee je kon voorkomen dat je met blote voeten op de vloerbedekking moest lopen. Geen warmwater koker of dergelijke, maar alleen 2 glazen die je uiteindelijk beter kon gebruiken om je tandenborstel in te zetten in de badkamer omdat deze daar niet aanwezig waren. Verder bleek de houder van de handdouche helemaal los te zitten en sloot de glazendeur van de douche niet goed met alle gevolgen van dien. Wat ook misleidend is zijn de foto’s op bijvoorbeeld Booking.com. De zeepjes en shampoo’s die je op de foto van de badkamers ziet staan zijn er helemaal niet. De ruimte aan 1 zijde van het bed is slechts 30 cm wat het lastig maakt om in en uit bed te komen. Om het maar niet te hebben over de entree van het hotel.
Je komt op straatniveau binnen in een niet  erg welkome entree waar je te horen krijgt dat de receptie op de 1e verdieping is waar je met de lift naar toe moet. Dit laten ze op de foto’s niet zien omdat het niet 4-sterren waardig is. Kortom op de ligging na, die prima is lijkt het in niets op een 4 sterren hotel.

title: Good hotel close to times square
text:
Good find for times square, close to everything and reasonably outfitted.  

Ask for a coffee maker.

Rooms are small, but its times square and to be expected.

Rooftop bar is pricey but worth the view.

Glad we went here, would recommend

title: Very good!
text: Great location!! Literally so convenient. Everything was great! Quiet room, great service, and fantastic views of time square. We very much enjoyed our stay. The only things I would count as negative are the beds aren’t the comfiest if you love a plush memory foam mattress, you have to take two elevators to get to your room, and the TV says you can hook up your phone to it to play your apps but that isn’t the case. We would definitely stay here again!

title: M Social Stay
text: M Social Stay was fantastic. From location, to a great atmosphere, it was everything we needed. Housekeeping was complimented perfectly with the most comfortable nights sleep I’ve had in a very long time!!

title: NYC
text: Excelente estadia em Nova Yorque. Ótima localização, café da manhã completo, quarto limpo, funcionários simpáticos, excelente atendimento. Apenas o custo um pouco elevado e necessidade de pagar para deixar bagagens (check-in após 15 h).

title: Egypt Cairo New Cairo
text:
Very good hotel Very good location cleaning very good team helping. Near to time square 
but the chick in its very late time 4 o clock late because the guest they make long trip so they very tired
some trips take 36 hours.so they need early chick in

title: wonderful stay at M Social
text: Great Location for a great hotel. I would recommend M Social for its great atmosphere, the incredible view in every room available. The manager William was very welcoming and kind. One of my best hotel experience in NYC among the 20 times I visited the city during the last 20 years.

title: Less than Novotel times….
text: Size of the bed reduced, breakfast reduced, size of the ding room reduced, staff reduced. Only the price is not reduced… Staff is nice anyway. And the location of the hotel is just perfect, and so is the roof top ! 👍

title: Great Location for Broadway Shows!
text: Great location and clean rooms. If you like broadway shows the location is excellent! Lots of restaurants and bars nearby, and a Duane Reade/Walgreens is on the first level of the building. Check in/out was a breeze. Also Louisa (cleaning staff) was super friendly and helpful

title: Average, you could get better hotels at this price point
text: This hotel is not big, and the mat and hallway are very old. A/C does not work properly in the guest room. The lobby is not big or nice as expected, and is pretty dim. But the location is okay. You could definitely find a better hotel to choose at this price point. It does not worth the four star

title: Simply and work well
text: Muito caro pelo o que oferece. A localização é ótima a vista é ótima. O entorno é cheio de oportunidades para comer e de teatros. Mas o preço é bem caro para a simplicidade do serviço, já havia ficado neste hotel quando era Novo hotel e era bem melhor em tudo preço é serviço.

title: Times Square Views
text: The location, staff and service are great. However, cleanliness could use some improvement. The best thing about this property is Beast & Butterflies, their bar and lounge area. Attentive, friendly bartenders and servers. By far, the best view of Times Square. I also had the opportunity to attend their New Year's Eve event, a few months ago. Highly recommend! I will definitely be back, can't beat the location and views.

title: Hôtel très bien situé et calme. Breakfast et restaurant avec vue sur Times Square
text:
Hôtel très bien situé aussi bien pour les sorties à pied qu'en transport en commun.
Chambre vue sur ville calme (22e étage / 33 étages). Personnel disponible, souriant et très aimable.
Le restaurant de l'hôtel est bon avec une superbe vue sur Times Square. Tables suffisamment éloignées les unes des autres pour se sentir à l'aise. Salle identique pour le petit déjeuner, donc très agréable. Animation musicale live les jeudi, vendredi et samedi soir, type jazzy/lounge très bien. Pas de bruit dans notre chambre.
Petit déjeuner buffet copieux et varié. L'arrivée des clients est régulée par le personnel pour ne pas avoir à se presser.
Semaine en famille, tout le monde est ravi ; nous reviendrons volontiers pour un prochain séjour à NY

title: Good overall stay
text:
Overall good experience
Great location
Lobby lounge view is fabulous
Got to free upgrade
Friendly stuff 
Beds were not comfortable enough
No water bottles in room
No water heater coffee machine, or tea

title: very good hotel with nice view
text: very nice hotel with super roof top direct view of Times Square, friendly common area with bar restaurant lounges games area.  clean and comfortable room, good quality bedding.  good place to visit New York

title: great value great location!
text: this place is a hidden gem, would definitely recommend for anyone who wants to stay in a clean hotel with nice amenities right on broadway. the location is close to times square and central park and a bunch of great restaurants. everyone at the hotel was professional and polite and the rooms were a good size and clean

title: Calorosa permanenza
text:
Hotel in cui si respira un’atmosfera rilassante e accogliente. Stanza pulita e spaziosa. Personale cordiale. Hotel centrale e vicino alla metro. L’unica pecca: ascensore sempre occupato attese anche più di 10 minuti per scendere nella hall o risalire in stanza, poiché uno era anche guasto!!! 
Spero provvedano al più presto 🙂

title: Très bon hôtel
text: Très bon hôtel,  tarif des petit dej élevés. Chambre spacieuse et nettoyé tous les jours. Roof top Très agréable avec vu sur time square. Je recommande cet Hôtel. Possibilité de laisser les bagages en consigne le jour du départ.

title: Good
text:
Excellent location. Reasonable breakfast - lacks vegetables. Rooms are enough for a couple. Includes enough space for 4 suitcases - 2 large and 2 small.
You should check the prices of the taxi that is ordered by the staff on the way back to the airport

title: Not worth the money
text: The location is the best of this hotel. Checking was terrible with a long queue and only one person at the desk. The breakfast was terrible, no good food, all seemed frozen food.
