Not a 4 star hotel and barely a 3 star - but the location is outstanding and the bar was great - cocktails are fantastic and the view of time square is quite lovely.

title: Excellent Hotel & Location
text: Stayed 2nd January 2023 for 4 nights, location is perfect, just at times square but not right in the biz, great lounge for drinks and can take food in to the lounge and eat !  Roof terrace was a bonus, great view of times square, room was clean and comfortable !  would defo stay again !

title: Great location!
text: The location is great! Great views and it is 10 minutes away from Time Square. The staff is very helpful. The hotel is nice, brake fast is good, the bed was comfortable. My only but is that the restrooms need some deep cleaning. I probably would book again.

title: No I don't want a smoke filled room
text:
Typically previous stays at M Social have been excellent.  First week of January, not so good.  Hotel is in need of a little face lift in lobby furniture that has seen it's days.  
This is a great location and hotel is just the right size for a comfortable stay from the crowds.  It just needs a little TLC now.

title: Excellent Location, Clean & Modern
text: This was our first time in NYC. The hotel is very convenient to the subway, Times Square, Broadway, and all the shops and dining you could ask for. The rooms were modern and average size. Very clean and the bed was comfy. It was very quiet in our room, even being right in town. We appreciated having a mini fridge to store drinks and leftovers. We also had a great view of Times Square from our city view room. Would definitely stay at MSocial again when visiting NYC!

title: Ottima soluzione nel cuore di Manhattan
text:
Camere eleganti, abbastanza spaziose e pulite, con vista panoramica. Rumorosità variabile ma buona qualità del sonno. Buon ristorante e roofgarden con spettacolare affaccio su Time Square. Consiglio.
Suggerisco di dotarsi di più carte di credito per possibili problemi con alcune. Non è accettato il contante.

title: Great place near Times Square
text:
Stayed here with the family in spring 2022. Location is great, near times square. Staff was friendly and check in smooth. We had a great room overlooking times square. Room was average size, beds were good and the bathroom as expected. 
We enjoyed our stay.

title: Location Only Thing Great about this Property!
text: Only recommend this for location.... for New Years and Christmas celebrations it was a perfect situation!! Good for walking around! Bar Terrace & Restaurant so lovely! Staff left alot to be desired....

title: New Years Trip
text: This hotel provides an amazing experience for New Year's Eve if you request a ball drop room on a high floor. Definitely an amazing way to ring in the new year. If you are interested in being in Times Square or by broadway it is a great hotel to stay at. You are a close walk to subway to be able to explore the city. Staff was friendly and room was quiet at night. Only compliant was that we asked for a box of tissues to be brought up to room as we ran out, and that never came and the house keeper did not replace. Not a major issue, but would have been nice to have some tissues. Overall a nice hotel in Times Square. If you want to ring in the New Year right stay at this hotel.

title: Great hotel with Great views
text: Everything was great except the bathroom in the room was not properly cleaned. I had to clean the bathroom myself. There was urine stains still on the toliet seat and underneath. Other than that the view and location was great.

title: Total waste of money
text: New year eve was a waste. Although you can view time square, you CANNOT hear anything. The bed was most uncomfortable and old. The staff were not friendly or helpful. Everything is about money. There is zero hospitality towards guest. The restaurant was a total waste as they gave our table to someone else. They passed us straight as though we were no one. Basically, once you look like you have $$$, they attend to you. If you have packages sent to the hotel, you have to pay them to collect it for you. All in all, it was a waste of money.

title: Great hotel, but ask questions!
text: Excellent room and service, but on New Years Eve I paid $3,000 for a two night stay, and I was not allowed to use the famous balcony / deck with a full view of Times Square. Nor was I allowed in the restaurant. Nor was I allowed to pay $1,200 to get in the party so that I could use the balcony that I already paid for. Very disappointing and I would not recommend a holiday stay here. They don’t communicate that you will lose amenities. There suddenly was just a black curtain like a classist society.

title: New years stay
text: Overall the rooms and location were really nice and convenient, the rooms were relatively clean but there were some spots that looked like blood on our bedding. Our experience with the restaurant was terrible with the host, the actual staff were really nice especially the cooks but the host was really disrespectful and ruined our stay and experience

title: UNFORGETTABLE
text: Hotel enjoying an extraordinary location. An equally fantastic terrace.To recommend.Welcoming and caring staff.  Impeccable rooms. Quality environment..A hotel designed for a family stay. The children loved it and we also. Amazing place

title: Good location.
text:
The hotel is nice.   The rooms could use some improvement.  I felt that the price of the room was too high for what it was.
The room temperature was set to high.
When you say a city view.. why bother?  The hotel is in the city.  My view was a building.

title: hotel da 3 stelle
text: circa 15 minuti per scendere o salire in camera, bisogna prendere due ascensori in quanto la reception è al quinto piano, il personale di un hotel internazionale non può parlare solo lingua inglese, una notte è scattato l'allarme l'annuncio continuava a ripetere cose incomprensibili anche per mia figlia che parla benissimo l'inglese, ci siamo spaventati moltissimo, pulizia voto 1 la moquette sempre sporca sia in camera che nel corridoio, bagno anni 80 siamo ancora con la vasca con la tendina di plastica, letto matrimoniale mini io sono alto 1,85 avevo i piedi fuori, buona solo la posizione ma non basta per giustificare il prezzo pagato.

title: parfait pour decouvrir new york
text:
excellent hotel , bien situé , pres de Times square , a 10 m de Gallagher's !
chambre assez petite mais on ne va pas a NYC pour rester dans la chambre !
reserver une chambre etage elevé si possible .
pas de petit dej , il'y' a tout ce qu'il faut dans le quartier ( je recommande junior's)

Sinon a l'hotel accueil sympa , pour info Yann parle français !!
j'y retournerai sans hesiter

title: Private trip
text: Breakfast is for a hotel with 4 * not acceptable. The breakfast room is really to small. The opening hours from the hotel bar currently until 11 p.m. is to short and has to be at minimum until 2 a.m. so that sufficient time to relax.

title: Overpriced for what we received
text:
I REALLY wanted to LOVE this place but our vacation was pretty much a bust because of this place, the only reason it wasn't ruined was because we tried to make the best of the situation.
First the pros: 
-You are located right off of broadway and in the mix of it all. GREAT location, we could walk almost anywhere in the city! 
-The lobby was absolute beautiful, it was a scene out of a Christmas movie. 
-SOME of the staff was very accommodating and courteous, others not so much. 
-Beautiful views from the rooftop terrace of Times Square, this will be where you can get the best pics. 

Now the CONS: 
-I can't really count the price we paid as a con because everything in NYC was overpriced for the week of NYE, but for what we got, it DEFINITELY was overpriced for the quality of room we got. 
-We booked a room for a "partial ball view", when I checked it, I was advised by the front desk agent and manager, Vita that that room did not exist. I showed them my receipt which showed the type of room and I also tried booking that same room online  right in front of them and it showed it was available. She told me she didn't know why it was saying that but that room was not available and did not exist. And since it was the day after Christmas, all rooms were full that had a Times Square view, so they said they could move us the next day to a "Full Times Square View". For that night they put us in a "city view" which is just looking at some buildings, not much of a view. The next day we were moved to a "full Times Square View" room which was really only half a view since there are buildings in the way so just know its no a full Times Square View it is obstructed.
-When you visit a hotel in the winter in NYC, call ahead to see if their hotel rooms are individually able to heat/cool or if it is controlled by hotel. We did not call ahead and this hotel was in Heat Mode therefore you could not use the AC in your own room. Our room did not go above 79-82 degrees the whole time we were there until the last night when they were finally able to turn the AC back on, I am sure because plenty of people were complaining. I asked for a fan for the room, and of course they said they do not allow fans in the rooms and they did not have any. Not sure how much of that I believe that they don't have a fan in the building. So clearly,  we were not able to sleep even after opening the window, which was their solution for us. 
Theres so much more, but theres limited space here. Good luck:)

title: Exceptional !
text:
We had a great time at the M Social Hotel! Perfect for families with children and pets. Centrally located, short walking distance to landmarks and attractions. 
We will definitely recommend this hotel and we will be returning back in the future. 
Flora at the Front Desk was AMAZING, great customer service and friendly staff.

title: Finger weg
text:
Tolle Lage, aber nie wieder! Wir hatten ein Familienzimmer mit Blick auf TQ, das ist wirklich großartig - aber Spiegel/Fenster/Türen waren voller Abdrücke der Vormieter, die Wände im Bad völlig fleckig, einen Abend lag nach dem Saubermachen eine Christbaumkugel auf dem Boden?! Auch im öffentlichen Bereich alles sehr fleckig, die Toiletten nicht betretbar. Highlight ist der besondere Frühstücks-Ansteh-Service: Man wartet, bis andere aufgestanden sind, auf einen Tisch und das bis zu 45 Minuten. Der doppelte Espresso kostet 11€, auf jeden Fall draußen essen und nicht inkl. Frühstück buchen!!
Es gibt so viele Hotels am TQ, wir haben leider völlig daneben gegriffen - und dass für ca. 800€/Nacht:((

title: Well situated
text:
One of the best hotel in Manhattan  to be in the heart of Time square , you don’t hear any noice from the street , the office is well organized. You have everything you want around the hotel. 
The metro is right next to the hotel, you have everything to get your brakefast and go!!!

title: Excellent Hotel, excellent location, excellent service.!
text: Wonderful Christmas trip with Family.! Location was just perfect to walk to different locations of Manhattan area. Restaurant food and service was wonderful and the view from dining area is just perfect. Thank you

title: Great experience
text: This hotel has a perfect location on Time Square. The lobby is spacious, vibrant and modern. The whole staff is benevolent and efficient. The guest room is clean and spacious. The bedding is of high quality.

title: Great Location! Great Room
text: This hotel has a great modern feel with a great sized room in NYC. We have stayed at a number of hotels in NYC and this has been one of our favorites. We traveled with our teenage daughter and this room was a good size for the 3 of us. Many hotels in this area are tight for 3 people and this was perfect. We had a Time Square View and it was great. We enjoyed it being close enough to the shows we were seeing to not need a taxi. It is also nice not being in the middle of time square, you are close enough but you can get to everything without going through the middle of it.

title: Great hotel with an awesome view
text: We had an awesome stay at M social. All the employees were so friendly, our room was clean, and the restaurant on site was amazing.  The breakfast was really convenient and good along with the dinner. The view from the restaurant was amazing of Times Square as well.

title: Excellent location, decent room, subpar service
text: Great location.  Room small but adequate.  Breakfast buffet had almost the same thing everyday. You have to wait in line to be seated which take 10-20 mins.  We didn’t know that the first day, walked right in and was yelled at multiple times by a rude lady.

title: Ok, but not great
text:
Reservation did not provide adjacent rooms. The bathroom door was broken. Hotel staff was unavailable when I needed them.
The main thing we liked about the hotel was the foosball table and it was slightly broken missing goalies and other defenders.

title: Good location for tourists
text:
Stayed here for my first time in NYC and I can’t complain about my stay. The location is right off Times Square and all of the other touristy spots are close by too. I also felt safe with the amount of people walking by, and because the hotel lobby/entrance is located on the 2nd floor (or 1st floor, if you consider the actual 1st floor the “ground” floor)!

The room itself is clean and a good size. Although there were people going in and out of the hotel at all times, you can’t hear it through the walls. We didn’t get to stop by the bar but the gym is pretty big and has a lot of basics you’d need to do a simple workout. Nice stay and we were able to check in early!

title: Central location
text: Central Location- friendly and helpful staff. Nice lounge area w games and drink area- - blackout curtains are very nice in keeping light out and complimentary shampoo, conditioner and body soap was a nice addition!

title: Handy location but not much space
text: Great location and very friendly staff but the room is not really big enough for two if you have any luggage.  If you can get a good a price and are planning on being out of the room most of the time, it does the trick but there's barely enough room for one person and a suitcase.

title: M Social
text: Our overall experience based on similar hotels was good.  The cleanliness of our room was satisfactory but not perfect.  We did have maid service everyday like having clean towels and making the bed.  Unfortunately the maid service never removed the empty dirty glasses that piled up nor did we ever get a bath floor mat for our shower after the first day.  Also the lights keep flickering which was annoying.  The view from our room was nice that we enjoyed.  The bar service was ok, not very friendly staff at the restaurant or bar.  My biggest issue was being over charged for my room.  I have a conformation with a total but I was charged more.  So this is my biggest issue right now that needs to be corrected.  I would consider staying at the MSocial again as long as this gets resolved.

title: Christmas in the City
text: M Social Times Square is an excellent location in the city! I’ve stayed there for years and have always loved it’s convenience and cleanliness. The staff is kind and the service swift. The view from the roof balcony is incredible! It was be a perfect spot for NYE!

title: Great hotel in great location!
text: We stayed for 4 nights and had a great stay! We were able to check in early, our room was clean and they came to clean it every day. Staff was great and friendly, location was amazing, and there was a bar with great food/drink options! Plus a rooftop area with an amazing view of Times Square!

title: Family Gettaway
text: Perfectly located and well kept hotel between Times Square and Central Park.  Clean, modern rooms and  great service - Jalel at the front desk was wonderful.  Highly recommend this hotel as a real value for NYC.

title: Great place for a pre-show drink
text: We had an hour to kill before a show and decided to explore this hotel and try out the bar.  It was noon on a Wednesday and the place was practically empty.   I'm not a drinker, so my sister conspired with the bartender to come up with something I might like.  Since it was a cold day, it was suggested I try a Baily's coffee.  Oh my!  It was perfect!  The bartender was patient and enthusiastic working with me to figure out what I might like.  The place was beautiful, and the scenery overlooking Times Square was just icing on the cake!

title: Hotel staff were great!  Bar service was rude and flippant. Told me they wouldn’t make coffee
text: Staff at hotel were great but bar/restaurant service was terrible. Asked for coffee and they refused to make any. Could not buy breakfast ala carte had to spend $27.00 per person.  Told them at front desk and they listened but did not offer apologies

title: Excellent hotel on Times Square
text: MSocial is now my go-to NYC hotel.  Rooms were expensive because of Christmas but the location is ideal, the rooms are large, many have views over Times Square, the breakfast is very good and the staff is friendly and helpful.

title: Great experience in NY
text:
This was a very happy surprise because it was our first visit we choose via Booking app.
Perfect location, fancy style with clean and comfortable rooms.
Excellent breakfast buffet.
Very satisfying experience .

title: Anniversaire de mariage à New york
text: Nous venons régulièrement dans cet hôtel (depuis novembre 2013) et particulièrement en décembre car nous aimons célébrer notre anniversaire de mariage à New York. L'ambiance y est particulière. Tout le personnel est très serviable, professionnel.

title: Location isn’t everything
text: Hotel is perfectly located however horrendous obnoxious restaurant and luggage hold staff and their attitudes creates an unwelcoming atmosphere. House keeping staff are a credit and we’re great. There’s better hotels out there would not recommend m social and will not be returning.

title: Perfect stay
text: Amazing location, friendly staff, very comfortable beds, very quiet being on the strip of Times Square! Couldn’t be a more perfect place to be during Christmas. It is very accessible with multiple train stops nearby and you are right on the Times Square strip!

title: Great location, modern rooms
text: Girls’ trip with my two teenage daughters. Never been to NYC before until this trip. Staff welcomed us upon arrival immediately. No lines for check in. Waited for our room to be ready for about an hour in the well lit, modern style, casual lobby. It was extremely dusty on all surfaces, needed a good cleaning everywhere. Got to room with a welcome surprise of our view from the 26th floor. Times Square, the ball, Winter Garden just below. Room was overall clean! Bedding a little strange in that there’s no top sheet-just the duvet with a cover on it? No blanket, no extra sheet. Bathroom was acceptable. Loved having a wand for shower! Nice having a frig for leftovers or drinks. One more bench or seat in the room would have been nice for each of us to hang out in room or to put suitcases on. No suitcase stands in room. Room is small, as expected for NY. Air conditioning worked very well. Nice to have control over the room temp as most hotels have heat on without a separate control. Cost was insanity for the space in early December. We couldn’t hear any traffic or street noise at all.

title: 4 DAYS IN NEW YORK
text: excellent location, breakfast with a fantastic view of Time square, perfectly clean room, beautiful bar with terrace, friendly and kind staff, if I go back to New York my choice will certainly fall on this hotel.

title: Perfect New York location and style
text: I stayed here years ago when it was the Novotel. Love the style and you can beat the bat and restaurant area. Typical New York modern style with a good vibe. Staff were incredibly polite and helpful. We’ll be back that’s for sure!

title: too much noice to sleep
text: The first night we could not sleep as there was music running all night till 4.30 am on the terrace of the Hotel. Then we got a rooms change and they offered us a breakfast. On top of it, on the 5th night, there was a false fire alarm at 6.40 am and we had to run down in the lobby. Not only we got awake with a fire alarm, but on top of it, the staff told us in a rude way and not even excusing them self about the problem. Really never back to this Hotel. Toilets always dirty and bad maintenance

title: Stupendo
text:
Tutto particolarmente perfetto 
Posizione ottima 
Ristorante da provare uno spettacolo 

Colazione da urlo 
Letto comodissimo 
Vista indimenticabile 
Servizi funzionali 
Staff simpatico e disponibile e competente

title: Eppure sono tornata qui
text: È andata un po' meglio dell'anno scorso,  eppure ci sono tornata. Mi piace l'atmosfera della hall molto vivace e la vista su Times Square. Ma la poca cortesia in reception non è cambiata molto.  E questa volta per non avere sorprese sul conto al rientro a casa  ho richiesto una ricevuta di check out. Se correggessero l'aspetto accoglienza potrebbero fare veramente il top.

title: Time Square Hotel Spot
text:
Love this hotel and it was a great location, if you are looking for a very hotel in the Time Square area the M Social is your spot.  I was here overnight for a business trip and I really loved the resort and location.  The front staff was very friendly and I was able to check in early due to our arrival time.  The rooms were very nice and clean, the nice size of the restroom was for it to be in NYC and this hotel ambiance was on point.  I'm a professional travel agent and sometimes my opinion is much harder on hotels and resorts, but I would highly recommend this one. 
If you are thinking about staying bring in New Year's Eve, please think about staying at the M Social because this hotel is right there with a great view of the ball drop and all of Time Square highlights.

title: Great first experience
text: First time but not last good location and a warm ambiance not to big with consideration by the team the restaurant is ok and the breakfast good too I will recommend this hotel if you want to have a good location in Manhattan

title: Close to everything, but…
text: Close to everything. Great staff! Rooms had a lot of dust that caused congestion. Particles found in ice from ice machine. 2 elevators were having issues with the doors closing in main lobby to rooms.

title: Great location
text: Myself and two daughters stayed here for 6 nights in November,lovely comfortable hotel,staff were friendly,room was ideal,even had an iron and ironing board,small fridge,beds were comfortable and plenty fresh clean towels,great view from room and in an ideal location you can see Times square from the roof top bar,can't comment on the food as we never ate here,you are allocated 10 dollar allowance per room per day for the bar,we only used it once as drinks were expensive,we ordered 2 cups of tea room service and it cost 18 dollars,needless to say we didn't order again.however if I was to return to New York I would definitely stay here again.

title: Excellent stay!
text: The hotel had the friendliest front desk workers and cleaning staff! The location can’t be beat! We will definitely be back! We asked for directions to get back to JFK using the subway and the desk was so friendly and patient with me as I asked a million questions! What a great find for our family!

title: Great location and value
text: Very decent hotel. Not the very nicest we have ever stayed in but very good for the price point. Staff is outstanding especially the housekeepers. Beds were very good. Room thermostats actually worked which is seldom the case in my experience. We will definitely stay there on our next Broadway trip. My fault for not asking for an ADA room but I do wish there had been at least one grab bar to assist in stepping into the tub to take a shower. I did not ask because the room I saw pictured on the hotel's website showed a walk --in shower with assistance bars. I by no means intend this as criticism but just a heads up to anyone else with whom this might be a problem.

title: December/Christmas Getaway
text: we stayed there for my two granddaughters' birthdays, ages 7 and 3, to see the Christmas Spectacular at Radio City, to visit American Doll Store and to experience all New York City has to offer at Christmas time.  Everything about the hotel was great, from the staff to the location.  So conveniently located to everything we were there to see and do.  Staff was very accommodating.  Will definitely be back.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone.  Close to Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall and the Theatre District.  Just a small skip to Times Square.

title: Great hotel- perfect location
text:
First time in New York and we’re extremely happy with our hotel pick.  Nice sized room, AC was great especially when the outdoors were scorching. 
Their roof too patio is the perfect place for morning coffee or glass of wine in the evening. Close to theatres and subway station if you need to see other New York highlights.

title: Great location
text: Great location for Times Square attractions. Clean rooms and updated. However, I feel for the price, there should at least be coffee makers in the rooms. Also, the elevators were very slow because they were always full so it was challenging to use. We did have an issue with our room key, but the staff was friendly and quick to respond to all issues.

title: Location location location!
text:
Me and my husband have just got back from a 4 night stay here and fantastic location in the heart of Times Square! We stayed on the 28th floor and the views were magnificent! The staff super friendly and they couldn’t do enough for us to make our stay special. We didn’t eat here. We just had coffee in the mornings and if you want to have a kettle or anything in the room and just ask and they will accommodate this for you. The room is very clean, very spacious and the bed was super comfy. We want one back at home! 

The only thing I would say is to go to reception you have to go up 5 floors in the lift and then you check into reception and then obviously depending on what room you’re going to depends how far you would go up in the lift, so we were on the 28th floor and I found myself feeling dizzy most of the time with all the motion of the lifts and obviously being so high up. Next time we won’t stay so high up but it was worth it for the views. 

Couldn’t fault this hotel, very trendy, very clean and a location to die for. When you first arrive downstairs, they will tell you that you need to go up to the 5th floor to check in, and the guys downstairs and the reception on the 5th floor were absolutely amazing and couldn’t do enough for us.  Highly recommend! 

Debs

title: Weekend trip to New York
text: The location of this hotel for a weekend tourist trip is hard to beat! It is on the doorstep of all of Manhattan's major attractions. The breakfast - with an iconic view - is also very good and the staff are very friendly.

title: Thanksgiving in NYC
text: Location, location, location was fantastic.  We were mins from everything including the Macy's day parade.  That was key when our 9 year old wanted to use the restroom.  Great staff and great service.  Thank you.

title: M social
text: Lovely hotel.  Very friendly staff.  Great view of time square when eating breakfast or dinner.  Very central foe everything. 10 minutes from Central Park and 2 minutes from time square.  Breakfast was plenty with lots of choice.   Beds very comfortable

title: Una experiencia soñada
text:
Pasamos fin de año en familia. Del. 29 al. 4. En un principio nos dieron una habitación mirando a la parte posterior. Reclame y amablemente nos pusieron mirando a Time Square. Eras 4 en la habitación. Es cómoda y agradable. Genial situado para ver el comienzo del año. Increíble. Fue mi 4 vez en new York y ha sido el mejor.
Gracias por todo

title: Great Stay While Visiting New York
text: While visiting New York for our anniversary we received great service from every aspect of the hotel. They accommodated us with everything question we had and even set up a nice surprise for my wife on my behalf when we arrived.  10/10 recommend. Pricing was a steal as well even for a holiday week.

title: Excellent
text: Great location. Close to Broadway, times square and central park. Super view from the room, would recommend the Hudson River View. Room size is big for new york. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend.

title: Quick trip to take in a show
text: The staff was exceptional and extremely friendly. Accommodations were very clean and comfortable. I traveled with my niece and nephew, first NYC trip for both of them and they absolutely loved it! They will cherish the memories of this trip for years to come! My favorite place to stay in NYC!

title: Best location
text:
Best location, walking distance from many atractions.
Nice restaurant, good drinks and good food with good views.
The towels were super soft and the bed super  comfty. 
The staff was helpfull.
We would come back.

title: Poor Customer Service/ Relations
text: We had a wonderful time, but that was no thanks to the M social. We arrived well beyond our check-in time only to be given keys to a dirty room that had not been serviced. We paid extra for a Times-square view and we were moved from that room as the M Social did not have any staff “available “ to clean our room. We were met with attitude, resistance, and hostility by your manager, Kristin. She offered to cancel our stay all together as we pleaded for her to figure out another solution to a huge inconvenience that was The M Social’s Fault!!! This was not how we wanted to start our trip and I find the chances of me staying with the M Social again to be very low. The 150$ credit and room swap was a blatant insult to our time and willingness to let The M Social be our home for the weekend.

title: Great hotel/great location
text: The M Social hotel was amazing!  Great atmosphere, amazing customer service & location couldn’t have been better!  The view from the balcony was insane!  Wish we could have stayed longer.  Already making plans to come back!!

title: New York - New York
text: We had a pleasant stay here. We had a nice, quiet room, which one was overall clean. Nice staff and nice breakfast. Would fully recommend this hotel. Great location and nice view over the roofs during breakfast!

title: Best place to stay in NYC!
text: From our arrival to our departure everything went great. Staff is friendly and helpful. Overall experience was awesome! Can't wait to come back. The only thing I would like is if they had microwaves in the room, but we called and asked for one and they brought it right up.

title: Wonderful Experience
text: Perfect location, stunning terrace, friendly staff of exceptional quality. Good food, great drinks. Well maintained, highly recommended hotel. The hotel is perfect for both private and business travel/events.

title: Great location
text:
Overall, great hotel. Internet keeps cutting out but besides that, will definitely come back. The location is what sold us and we were not disappointed.
Hotel staff was great.
There was an extra tax of $40 a night that I was not aware of. Guess it was in the small print.

title: Unbelievable hotel with an unbelievable view!
text: An amazing hotel only a few minutes walk from Times Square. I was able to see where the ball drops from my room and you get the same view from the restaurant. I highly recommend this hotel for everyone!

title: Nice Stay
text: The hotel was very clean, staff was friendly, and the location was close to the theater we were attending for the MJ Musical. The food was good, but they need to expand the choices on the menu.  Overall we had a nice experience.

title: Outstanding Experience
text: It was a nice time at New York. The hotel was a very good part of our stay. To be better, the hotel could provide better discount in the parking garage for the guests. The room is very comfortable and have a nice city overlook.

title: Magnifique hôtel au cœur de Times Square
text: Nous avons adoré notre chambre , au 32 étages avec vue sur Times Square. Le petit déjeuner comme les repas étaient un vrai délice. Cadre super. Personnel à l’écoute et bienveillant. Nous avons adoré ce premier séjour. Merci à tous

title: Too old, too crowded for the price
text:
Old bathroom, old hotel, staff does not care about the client.
Breakfast is ok but espresso are additional fee and expensive.
We asked for a 2 hour additional for late check -out and they announced it would be 50 dollars / hour. 
But location was great.

title: Super séjour nous y retournerons
text:
Hôtel super bien placé, roof top avec bar à Spritz et babyfoot vue sur Times Square et hall qui est un lieu de vie chaleureux avec bar jeux musique …
Très bon accueil
Chambre pas très grande mais calme avec vue sur l’Hudson river
Bon restaurant 
Bar bien fourni

title: Great Stay and View
text: Look no further!  I will always return to Hotel M while visiting New York.  The location was perfect!  The bar area looked like so much fun and relaxing, but I needed more time.  I will definitely be back and visit the bar area.  This will definitely be my go to hotel while visiting New York.  Oh, did I mention my view.  Wow!

title: presented a dirty, uncleaned room upon  arrival
text: We arrived here from 13 hrs drive, we line up for a long time since it took time to accomodate people in the front desk. After the long wait, they gave us a dirty, uncleaned room. Dirty with all the trashbags at the room, sheets are all messed up. We felt like invading someone else’s room.

title: Central well priced hotel
text: We stayed here for a week whilst visiting New York for the marathon. The hotel is really centrally located with times square 4 blocks down and central park 4 blocks up. Lovely room with views towards Hudson River. I booked a year in advance at a really reasonabpe rate but because of the exchange rate we ended up paying alot more when it came to paying at the hotel, they did not give any option to pay upon booking. Most staff were really nice apart from one very rude and unhelpful man on reception but we did not let his attitude ruin pur stay .

title: Anniversary Theater Get-Away
text: Our stay at the M Social was a fantastic experience. Hotel is in a perfect location and very clean with a beautiful spacious room.  Staff was professional and personable and did everything to ensure a wonderful stay.

title: Beautiful hotel, perfect location
text: Beautiful, well appointed hotel, gorgeous interior, lovely outside terrace overlooking Times Square. In the perfect location right in the action, safe, well lit area & walk-able to all the best things NYC has to offer, Broadway shows (1 block), Central Park South entrance, famous Rosie O'Grady's steak house/Irish pub (wonderful meal), Rockefeller Center, Empire State Building, shopping, etc. Highly recommend.

title: Have a goog stay !!!
text: Hotel well located, near bus and metro, spacious room.  The decoration of the hotel and the rooms is aging and too dark, lack of light.  Depending on the time, there is a bit of a wait for breakfast, but the staff is efficient.  The breakfast is varied and very good.

title: Gorgeous ♥️
text: We will never forget these vacations! From reception to departure everything worked out perfectly. The hotel is located near Central Park and Times Square. - additionally there is a Subway just around the corner!

title: A week in NYC
text: Great hotel with best location to Time Square and Broadway.  Spacious room with excellent Time Square view. We live at the 28th floor. Good staff,  especially Stella from the help desk. So nice and get good tips for our stay and trips. We love it!  We will go back.

title: Great location
text: The Hotel has a perfect location.subways are 2 minutes away. Very close to Times Square and the musicals. Lots of restaurants around. The room had a great view. You can see the Times Square there and from the bar in 9th floor..

title: 4 day visit in October
text: We stayed here for 4 nights while in NYC.  We didn’t choose this hotel we were moved here as there was a problem with our first choice.  Hotel was great, we have separate room for the kids on the 32 floor.  Cleaninless of the hotel was great, the roof top bar was fanatastic, service was good.

title: Amazing location
text: Location was great and close to subway which was really helpful for us as first time visitors. Hotel is nice, Beautiful interiors in the lobby. The lobby is on the second second floor and you would need to take an additional elevator to the rooms, we didn’t mind but sometimes they can get really backed up.

title: Halloween Holiday 2022
text: Good hotel in a great location. Stayed here twice now - hotel beginning to look tired. Watch the bar staff as they are overly keen for their tip. Also - hotel takes a holding fee of $500 which is refundable when leaving (though $240 are used for local taxes).

title: Emplacement stratégique
text:
Les tops :
- très bon emplacement 
- métro à 2 minutes
- vue spectaculaire sur Times square 
-- Ambiance soirée musicale et agreable dans le lobby
-- literie de bonne qualité 
- vue des chambres "new yorkaise" (demander de préfērence un étage élevé)
- personnel sympa 
- wifi gratuit

Les flops :
- petit-déjeuner peu diversifié  et peu qualitatif
- pas de service au bar le matin
- pas de café espresso le matin 

Bon ce n'est plus un Novotel mais cela reste un hôtel de bon rapport qualifié/prix avec un emplacement stratégique.

title: Great stay!!
text: Fantastic stay. Staff super helpful with early baggage drop-off and relatively early check-in. Room (social, two double beds, Hudson view) was exactly like online pic. Staff had k-cup machine waiting in room as requested. Bartender made fantastic drinks. ($10 coupon offsets about half a drink…but appreciate the gesture.) Terrace overlooking Times Square offers fun views. Definitely recommend.

title: Great experience
text: Great time lovely clean room very friendly service all costings explained at checkout great decor fabulous location to explore manhattan and surrounding areas reasonable bar and restaurant prices for time square will be back

title: Tres tres bel hotel
text:
Hotel avec un cadre magnifique vue sur times square magique.
Buffet le matin tres varié, repas tres bon.
Chambre tres confortable litterie top.
Le plus pour nous les jeux (a coté du coin detente) avec 2 ados top on a passé un super sejour. Nous conseillons cet hotel.

title: Family escape
text: We stayed 2 nights… excellent service and great staff!!! It was a quick weekend scape to visit family! We arrived esrly and they accepted us and also we wanted to change bed from twins to a queen, also no problem! The reception staff was very helpful and the hotel ambiance was great! Highly recomended

title: Location for Broadway wins over other niggles
text:
This hotel has a young and lovely vibe when you arrive at the reception. Loud music can make the check-in experience a worse experience than it could be, especially with the staff behind Perspex screens. 

The slow elevators up from the street are often packed with guests coming and going, squeezing themselves and their luggage in with you. 

Our room was a good size, 27th floor had good views of the city and was quiet, clean and a good temperature.

The resort fee is what it is, everyone hates it, just leaves a bad taste in the mouth. The $30 fee (plus tax!) includes a $10 rebate for the bar but isn’t accumulative and no drink is less than $10 so it’s just another way to extract more cash from the guests. 

Wi-Fi was good in all areas of the hotel.

title: Wonderful !
text: Well, not the first time I’m staying in New York but first time in this hotel and wow, very beautiful. The lobby is very big, the rooftop terrace looks good, the view is amazing ! The room was quite small but we spent mostly our time outside, so that’s not something we were afraid of. Thank you so much to all of you guys, especially Stella who went above our expectations, she handled everything flawlessly. I’ve experienced some rude staff during my past stays in NYC before, but Stella was everything that customer service should be. Kind, warm, friendly and also very helpful. Thanks to the manager as well who helped us making our stay better. I’ll never forget these two ladies for their kindness and help and I’ll return to this hotel hopefully soon. See ya 👋

title: Msocial
text: Nice location, receptionist was not at all consumer friendly but was at least quick. Good bar area and selection of drinks and food. Rooms were acceptable, could do with a modern upgrade but great for a few days

title: Another great stay at the M Social
text:
Great place to stay and see New York, as you get big rooms.
This is my second stay and i would always come back to this hotel, without hesitation.

You are so close to the subway and all the great attractions.

title: Birthday Visit
text: Went for sons 18th birthday treat. Everything was fantastic. Location is right in the middle of nightlife, rooms were excellent, staff friendly and couldnt do enough for us. The bar balcony looking out to Times Square was spectacular. Cant wait to visit again and will definitely be this hotel.

title: Room with a view
text: We had a delightful stay at the M Social. Rooms aren’t huge, but comfortable. We had a fantastic view of Times Square, overlooking the New Years Eve ball from the 28th floor. Overall, the hotel has a really nice, contemporary vibe, and all the staff we met were friendly and welcoming.

title: Comfortable stay in a nice and clean hotel that is well located
text: Overall, I had a good experience in the hotel. The rooms are rather pricy but that’s normal in NY, especially if you have a room overlooking Times Square. The staff is (mostly) friendly and courteous. There is a 10$ voucher that you can use every day in the bar. They hotel has room service which is not a given in NY after the COVID related down scaling of services in hotels due to lack of guests and staff. The food is OK, though the quality and quantity varies from day to day. Be careful with your laundry service. I overlooked that the day I was handing in my laundry was a holiday and I was charged a hefty $140 for a few underwear, T Shirts and socks due to an additional holiday/Sunday fee. However, after raising the matter with the hotel manager - who handled the matter in a very friendly and professional manner unlike the operator I spoke to first - a discount was added to my bill that compensated for the additional holiday laundry fee. Since it was me that had overlooked the holiday, this was a nice and welcome gesture that I much appreciated. Overall, the hotel can be recommended though the rooms are a little too small for the price. They are, however, modern, clean and comfortable.

title: Worthy of staying if you get a good deal!
text: Picked this hotel because it was priced well compared to other hotels nearby. It’s located in the heart of the theatre district, and right off Times Square. It’s a family friendly hotel. Hip little spot. Rooms are decently sized compared to most NYC hotels. Service and staff here is amazing. Only complaint I have is that my room was a tad dusty. Might just be because it’s an older building, but overall I would stay here again for their service and location.

title: Excellent service and location
text: Accomodations were great. Staff in dining room and bar attentive. Mr John Rothermal at front desk was very helpful in making our stay pleasant and giving orientation when needed. Definitely will stay again. If your interest is going to theaters location is within walking distance and very safe.

title: Perfect in every way. Recommend!
text: Clean and fresh hotel in a perfect location right by Times Square. Friendly and serviceminded staff with a solution on everything. The housekeeping staff is amazing and the bathrooms is always clean. We had dinner at the hotel the first night and the pasta Alfredo was brilliant. We actually had an all positive experience. Recommends!

title: Great Location
text: Excellent quiet location near the hussle and bussle of Times Square without being in it.  Not the best rooms. Friendly front desk staff. Rates a bit pricy for the type of room.  Should have an in house coffee counter similar to a Starbucks.

title: Central location
text:
Pros:
Great base for sightseeing 
Hotel is generally fine 
Bar terrace overlooks Times Square 
Pretty good sleep

Cons:
Could do with a bit of a touch up, things starting to date ( air con broke the last night) 
Not great sound proofing when in a room with an adjoining door (they had a dog)
Unnecessary daily destination fee (approx $40) this is just a money making add on to already high NY hotel fees and the taxes 

You could do worse than stay here, but no doubt  you could also do better. 

I would avoid staying near Times Square if I came to NY again, much nicer and cooler areas,  just travel in if you want to visit. 

And if you could avoid the additional destination fee I would, use the extra $40 on something else like cheesecake or beer.

title: Good experience
text: Great location. Professionally run. Bar and outside area particularly nice with great view and atmosphere.  House keeping very obliging and flexible. Check out particularly supportive,  organising taxi to the airport. Room practical and clean, but bed a bit narrow for two people. Bathroom far too tight.

title: First trip to NYC
text:
Great location for first trip, close to Times Square, Central Park, Empire State, Rockerfeller and Broadway theatre’s.
Busy bar with a great rooftop area to enjoy views to Times Square.
New York extremely expensive but a great place to visit.

title: Disappointed
text:
We had high anticipations for our stay in this hotel but unfortunately we were disappointed by the overall experience. Positive : good location, rooms ok. But ...

1) At check-in both rooms were reserved to my wife's credit card based on prices including taxes received at booking time. But it turned out a lot of extra charges came on top of it which lead that my wife's credit card limit was reached far more quicker than we thought so she could not use her credit card anymore during the week. The next day we asked to change this reservation for 1 room from her credit card to my credit card to release part of the reservation on her credit card so she could use again for payments. This was done but the receptionist clearly expressed she did not like that request. And then a few days later it turned out the room was reserved twice both to my and my wife's credit card. It was a mistake that had an important impact on our stay in NY.

2) After check-in and settled in the rooms we wanted to enjoy the rooftop bar with spectacular view. This was one of the reasons we choose this hotel. We wanted to order drinks at the bar to take outside but the bar tender refused to serve us as we were not planning to sit at the bar. We were told to go outside and wait for a waitress to serve us. Clearly this was going to take a lot of time as she was alone so my wife tried again to be served at the bar but was completely ignored by the bar tender. We decided to go elsewhere and never used the bar and rooftop bar again because of this bad service. I mentioned this to the staff at the reception without any further follow-up done.

3) After we checked out, we left our luggage downstairs with the bellboy as we had still some time before needing to leave to the airport. The bellboy was very rude when answering my questions like if our luggage was being kept safe or when we wanted to take something out of that luggage later in the day.

I will not recommend this hotel to anyone planning to stay in NY mainly because of the bad service we received. And with a next trip to NY, I will definitely choose another hotel.

title: Nice lobby, small rooms, high daily fee
text:
Pros: Near many attractions, great lobby, clean, amazing lobby 
Cons: no coffee or water in the rooms, small rooms, daily fee. Located in very busy neighborhood
I stayed here with my brother for four nights. For the price you pay you can find better place. Overall okay.

title: Millennium Social in New York on West 42nd Street
text:
Good value for a hotel in the heart of New York's hustle and bustle.  Friendly, helpful and efficient staff.
The room was serviced daily which I was not expecting and kept very clean.  Nothing was too much trouble for the receptiom staff.

title: Pleasure
text: Hotel was easy to get to.  View of Times Square was wonderful.  Very quiet.  Loved roof top bar and entertainment area.  Website was easy to book rooms, staff was very friendly , clean and comfortable rooms.

title: Sep 22
text:
Room was dated and didn't match our  expations of 4 star hotel.
Location was perfect and quess this is the reason for high price. 
Breakfast was same every day, with 6 nights staying, we would like to see a bit variation about the dishes. Breakfast area was untidy on several days

title: Pre cruise stay
text:
Modern hotel in heart the of Times Square.
Nice room.. Clean.. Good size.. Friendly check in staff..Great rooftop bar. PLEASE PLEASE coffee in room.. especially waking at 3am due to jet lag!.. 
Expensive though  with added resort fee.. Plus £ vs $ doesn't help! Drinks expensive.. Didn't try food.
OK stay for one night

title: Definitely first choice when coming again
text:
Excellent experience, especially the location and the view is awesome, absolutely nothing to complain.
Starting the day with such a view and a good breakfast and closing the day with a nice cocktail on the rooftop terrace can hardly be topped. Other than that good hotel in good condition with friendly staff.
Really recommendable.

title: OK
text:
Average hotel, felt more like a modern hostel. Good location for area. 
Checkin process ok. 
Room clean but not worth rates, upgraded to deluxe but still basic, average shower, annoying shower curtain, No hospitality tray. Limited view of Hudson. 
Snacks at bar ok. 
Slow service on drinks. 
Wouldn’t stay again.

title: M Social a great hotel in a great location
text: great place to stay in a great location and great ambiance in the lobby amazing views from the balcony outside easy to get in and out always clean and friendly staff great breakfast and comfortable lobby and overall a great place to stay

title: Poor customer service but great location
text: Rooms are decent. Service is hit and miss and security is questionable since we found a man in our room taking a nap because housekeeping left the door open and left. While security removed him from the building their shirt answer to us was "its New York", as if this was acceptable.

title: Bien placé mais hors de prix pour les prestations
text:
Proche Times Square et Central Park on peut facilement visiter à pieds. Un peu bruyant mais la musique de la rue a s arrête après minuit. Grosse déception sur les prestations par rapport au tarif. Nous avions pris cet hôtel pour son offre avec 2 lits et petits déjeuners et nous pensions avoir un hôtel de gamme supérieur. 
La chambre est nettoyée partiellement, nous avons trouvé une chaussette des précédents hôtes sur le sol à côté du lit à notre arrivée, le frigo n est pas très propre et les murs, miroir, et portes de salle de bain ont des traces de calcaire et savon. Nous avons nous meme nettoyé. Les équipements sont un peu vieux l’interrupteur unique de la chambre fonctionne quand il veut ou jamais, le mitigeur de la douche n’est pas stable. Chambre nettoyée à la va vite sur le séjour, les draps étaient troués par exemple. Lit confortable et chambre spacieuse. Pas de cafetière pour nous forcer à acheter en bas ni de bouteille d’eau de courtoisie. Ce n’était pas indiqué donc pas une surprise mais c’est un point négatif par rapport a d’autres hôtels.
Petit déjeuner continental de 7h à 11h qui varie peu (œufs, bagel, toast, crêpe/gaufre/pain perdu, muffin, croissant, fruit et yaourt. Pour le confort du matin c’est une bonne option sinon le quartier a des dîners et café - Angelina qui est en face est pas mal. 
Le gros plus de l’hôtel est la vue sur Times Square on ne s’en lasse pas. Le personnel est adorable également. Quelques animations en fonction de l’actualité, un baby foot et des jeux vidéo pour moderniser le hall et patienter. 
Forcément Times Square ajoute les Resort Fee de 40$ par nuit par chambre. Supplément obligatoire qui vous donne le droit à 10$ de boisson par jour (en gros sodas ou bières mais attention aux taxes et pourboires), le super wifi (sachant que le normal gratuit fonctionne très bien), réduction sur une visite en bus, les appels internationaux (avec le wifi ça perd de son intérêt) et 1 pass vélo par jour. Pour 1 personne et non pour la chambre donc il faut choisir qui aura les avantages. Avoir un supplément car c est Times Square admettons mais au moins en faire profiter la chambre au complet. 
Bilan plutôt négatif et à éviter si c’était à refaire pour un autre quartier mais pour une première fois l’emplacement est pratique qu on aime ou pas Times Square.

title: Great position
text: Near Time Square, in the centre of New York. Good room with a great view. The rooms are cleaning and large. The service are good and the gym have a lot of machine. No problem for check in and check out.

title: Outstanding hotel in Times Square, NYC
text:
A fantastic hotel to stay in that would highly recommend and would definitely stay in again if we visit NYC in the future. Hotel was located right on the edge of times square, 2 mins walk from centre of TS, with McDonald's and corner store with food, drink and pharmaceutical supplies directly below. 

The lobby being a few floors up from street level has a fantastic lounging space with a bar and dining area. A few games and TVs are about to help keep you entertained. The roof top bar and terrace, which is actually about 5 floors up from ground level (same floor as main lobby) rather than the top of the building, has fantastic views of times square and the street below, with a good selection of drinks on offer.

Room was very nice and spacious, very clean and nice and quiet at night. We had a room facing the Hudson River 20 floors up, so that probably helped it being a bit quieter than facing times square, but we didn't notice any outside noise. 

Only feedback I'd give is to provide bottled water and a kettle with tea / coffee making facilities in the room, as there was none. Other than that though, everything else was top notch. We had some friends come back to our hotel one evening and said it was way better than where they were staying. With the hotel being so clean, staff very friendly and the perfect location to walk to key landmarks, stores, restaurants and the subway nearby, would definitely recommend and stay again!

title: Amazing
text: We visited this rooftop bar a few times during our stay in New York.  Rooftop is open to non residents, fantastic views over Times Square.  Very modern bar and excellent rooftop bar, reasonably priced and good selection of drinks. Excellent service.

title: Family Trip
text: Trendy hotel in ideal location! Comfortable lounge with great views equipped with game tables if you need to spend time before or after checkout. Staff friendly and efficient. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Repetiría sin dudar!
text:
Excelente ubicación, personal muy atento y muy buenas áreas sociales. 
Al reservar con tiempo, conseguimos muy buena relación calidad precio. 
Teníamos habitación con vistas a Times Square y era un lujo tener esas vistas al anochecer y al despertar. 
La ubicación es ideal porque se puede llegar caminando a muchos puntos de interés, tiene parada de metro al lado y muchos sitios alrededor para comer. 
Lo recomendamos sin duda!

title: Stylish and comfortable
text: I'm not sure why another TA member advised me to "spend more money on a hotel if you can".  This place was dope: modern decor, comfy lounge areas, comfortable beds, views, great staff.  Received a text asking about nature of trip and any special requests before arrival.  Replied and got an early check-in!

title: A perfect stay at a perfect location in NYC
text: The entrance at ground level does not reveal the real potential of the hotel above. The location is perfect to discover the Cities highlights almost all in a walking distance. Coming back to a hotel and restaurant worthwhile spending a couple of days in leisure/relaxation of the business around it.

title: Basic room
text: We stayed here with our two children (5&8 yrs old), the hotel lobby and terrace was fantastic, however the bedroom was so basic. Had to call housekeeping for more towels and glasses due to it not being set up for 4 guests. No tea & coffee facilities in the room which would have been nice to be able to make in the morning. Bathroom decoration could do with freshening up. Great having a fridge in the room. For the money we paid I thought the room really let the place down.

title: No high expectation
text: The online version of this hotel is great! To actual get there and see in person is a different story. Hallways need vacuumed for sure and elevators. The guys that hold your bags in street lobby very nice and helpful. Although with several standing around someone could be cleaning the glass on the doors. Music is enjoyable and loud to make you think it’s a party. Sets a good vibe. Patio area is nice.

title: Expensive but good location near Times Square
text: Overall this hotel was ok except for when we had to ask for our room to be cleaned at 6pm after being out all day.  When the housekeeping arrived we were asked to sit in the lobby while she cleaned our room.

title: Post Covid Celebration
text: My husband and I visited NYC the week before the Covid shutdown. My daughter and I came for a week to enjoy all the city offers and celebrate a return to normalcy. The MSocial provided a comfortable and well-located place from which to attend the USTA Tournament, Hudson Yards, The Battery, Brooklyn’s DUMBO, and soooooo many good restaurants.

title: Very good hotel for New York City trip
text:
Excellent location at Times Square.
Great view from terrace, bar and breakfast room.
Good variety of breakfast offers.
Rooms are calm and clean.
One of the best hotel bars in NYC.
Sometimes free concerts on terrace offered.

title: Sehr gute Lage und schöne Zimmer
text:
Wir waren im August hier und hatten ein Familienzimmer für 4 Personen.  Der Ausblick aus den Zimmer war nach hinten raus, aber dafür war das Zimmer günstiger, als die Zimmer mit Aussicht auf den Hudson River oder den Times Square. Uns war der Blick aus dem Zimmer auch nicht so wichtig, da wir die meiste Zeit unterwegs waren. Außerdem war der Blick von der Bar auf den Times Square unbezahlbar. Die Klimaanlage hat man schon gehört, aber das hat unseren Schlaf nicht gestört. Da wir den ganzen Tag unterwegs waren sind wir fix und alle ins Bett gefallen. Das Zimmer und das  Bad waren  sauber. Die Mitarbeitenden waren ausgesprochen freundlich. 
Wir waren rundum zufrieden und würden jederzeit wieder kommen.

title: Great stay!
text: Our stay was fantastic, clean rooms, awesome lobby with bar and can’t forgot the deck with stunning views of the city. Walking distance to all of Broadway but quiet enough to sleep. Wish the bed was queen sized and the breakfast was a tad less pricey but overall highly recommended.

title: Sehr schöne Unterkunft
text:
Wir waren Ende August hier und hatten ein Zimmer mit Stadtblick über der Rooftopbar im 10Stock. 
Das Zimmer war groß und sauber und die Betten sehr bequem. Lediglich die Klimaanlage war nicht ganz leise. Durch die Kage des Zimmers war auch die Lautstärke der Bar und der Straße teils störend bei offenem Fenster.

title: Best hotel stay so far!
text: I’ve been to NYC many times and this has been my favourite hotel experience so far! I went with a group of friends and I think this hotel caters exactly to our age range (mid-20’s) with bars and entertainment from video games to a selfie mirror you can scan a QR code for. The views of Times Square are unbelievable from their rooftop and a great place for friends and families to hang out!

title: Wonderful Hotel and Views, Disastrous Breakfast
text: While the hotel offers wonderful facilities and views, the breakfast is subpar. The food was overcooked, tasted old, and there was no variety from day to day. Yet again, the rooms were comfortable and the staff very helpful.

title: Excellent location, small rooms.
text: Location near Times Square and close to subway. Rooms for a family of four a bit too small, especially for the luggage. Free Wi-Fi. 10$ per day free at bar. Clean rooms. Enough power plugs. Shower a little bit complicated to handle when used to german standard.

title: Exceptional Hotel to Stay in NYC
text: Located centrally in the Times Square Area, MSocial is a good place to stay. It is near basically on all the touristy areas in NYC. Hotel rooms are clean and staff is generally very good. Will stay here again if i visit NYC again soon. Tip. join the Millennium Loyalty Program as they offer discounted rates for Loyalty members :)

title: Cool, relaxed, clean and very nice!
text: Very relaxed hotel! Location is perfect for visiting New York. The roof top bar with a great view and cool music. Service was very nice! We can really recommened it! We stayed in a room with Hudson view.

title: Extra charge after chec out
text:
I was asked to pay cash for early checking in
and then I was charged once again after checking out. But for it they charged my credit card for dinning, after I left the hotel. The room was not clean and poor lightning

title: Great Location
text: Enjoyed our stay.  The rooftop lounge was a plus which had a excellent view of Times Square.  Note that the hotel lobby and rooftop lounge are on the second floor of the building.   I would definitely stay here again.

title: Amazing stay
text: Last minute booking after staying a couple of weeks prior for a work trip. Lovely comfortable rooms and a great view of Times Square. Staff were all very helpful. Love the rooftop bar also. Would definitely recommend to my clients that travel to New York.

title: Very good
text:
Very good 

الموقع قريب من كل شيء 
الفندق جيد جدا 
اللوبي واسع 
تسجيل الدخول والمغادرة سريع
موظفي الاستقبال رائعين
يوجد تراس فيها جلسات جميلة وتصل على تايمز سكوير 
ما يعيب الفندق الازدحام عند المصعد وكذلك خدمة الامتعة

title: Hotel qui fait ce qu'il promet
text:
Bon accueil personnalisé et staff sympathique. Nous avions une chambre au dernier étage avec une belle vue sur Time Square. Bon point de chute pour une première fois à NY ce qui n'était pas notre cas. Cet hôtel est l'ancien Novotel.
Je regrette de ne mettre que 3/5 mais compte tenu du prix élevé et du confort correct mais limité le rapport qualité/prix est défavorable. Cet hôtel de flux est comparable en terme de confort à un Ibis Style en France.
Nous avons ensuite séjourné downtown dans un autre hôtel pour un prix tout à fait comparable mais avec un confort et un niveau de prestation bien supérieur, d'où ma note relative et malgré la gentillesse du staff du M Social.

title: Overall great experience
text: The location of the hotel is very good. It's right next to Times Square!  There are many game facilities for children in the hotel lobby. There is a convenience store downstairs. It is easy to buy souvenirs and eat. Overall great experience, keep it up!

title: Family Vaca
text: The Hotel was very nice and security person Montana was very helpful and polite at all times. Hotel was clean.  Beds are a little on the small size if you are a bigger person and sharing the bed with someone else.

title: New York stay
text:
A wonderful hotel in premium location. This hotel was above and beyond everything we could have expected. So many food outlets options from formal restaurants to bodegas and street food. So close to times Square, Broadway and central park.  
The roof terraced was amazing. It really made our wedding anniversary a night to remember.

title: THE WORST!!!!
text:
Had to wait forever.  Room was not ready.  When we got to the room, it was not what I paid for, ie needed King Size bed.

Had to go back in line at the front desk, they were so confused.  Gave me a new room, had to move luggage again.

I needed working space, but the TV was on the desk.  What hotel has a TV on a working desk,    

The room was old and drab.  The smell of smoke was in the air,  The bathroom was so old and cracking.  

The carpet in the room was so bad.  Furniture was pathetic.  

The WORST hotel experience I have ever had.  Motel 6 is far better....
For the amount of money paid, I should get a full refund.

If I could give a negative number of this dump, I would.

title: Great
text: Great location. Clean facilities. On the corner of Broadway. 2 blocks from Times Square. Close to subway stations and bus routes. Noise was not an issue. My two kids and I had a great stay. The view of Times Square is great.

title: Loved it!
text: We spent the whole day in NYC and I expected us to be super tired so I wanted to book something inthe city with an amazing view to really get the tourist a NYC experience. Everything g was super comfy and clean. Loved it. I was able to sleep the whole night even though it was right in the city.

title: Great view and hotel stay
text: Vacation away from home. It was great , the views are amazing if you upgrade your room. Short walk to time squares and all the Broadway plays. Roof top is beautiful and also has amazing views. The lobby area is a cool sitting place.

title: 3 Nights in NYC
text: Nice stay, except for Ice Machine not working on floor and price too high compare to same quality hotels. Nice room and nice confortable hotel hall. Sometimes a queque to get elevator to road level. Perfect area close to times square.

title: Perfect family vacation spot
text: As a travel agent I explore new options when I come to the city. We loved this hotel and it’s location is phenomenal for exploring. We had a Times Square Premier room and the view was fabulous. The rooms are smaller than usual so our family of 4 were a bit cramped but overall I would highly recommend this hotel to other family clients.

title: Great Stay
text:
M Social Hotel is ideally located in New York, Times Square and Subway is really nearby.
The hotel is very well soundproofed, very clean, the whole staff is very friendly, bedding is very comfortable
The Rooftop is amazing, cocktails and food very good, a litllte expensive but what is not expensive in New York. The 10$ of gift consumption day is a very appreciable little extra.
We would definitely recommend this hotel to friends.

title: M Social has everything.
text:
Excellent location. Staff were friendly, welcoming and quick to help at all times. 
Located at the heart of the action for broadway and sightseeing. Rooms are clean and I even had a view to Times Square at no extra charge.

title: Hôtel parfaitement situé à Manhattan
text:
Points forts :
- Situation centrale à Manhattan, beaucoup d’option de restauration et de transport
- Tres belle vue sur Times Square dans certaines chambres
- Rooftop superbe avec vue sur Times Square
- Tres bonne insonorisation 
- Climatisation moderne
- Chambre spacieuse pour Manhattan
- Chambre très bien équipée 
- Personnel sympathique

Points faibles :
- Petit déjeuner

title: Deuxième séjour au M Social Hotel Times square New York
text: Nous avons été déçus par le niveau de cet hôtel qui avant était Novotel. Nous avons trouvé qu'il était mal fréquenté surtout en soirée. Cet hôtel a moins de classe qu'avant. Les gens sont installés par exemple au niveau du hall d'entrée, n'importe comment, parfois même couchés sur les fauteuils.

title: Music Man
text: Excellent hotel and perfect location. Outdoor terrace has wonderful view of Times Square. Rooms very nice and comfy beds. Staff are friendly and helpful. Restaurant is excellent and the location is absolutely perfect!

title: Top
text: Un hôtel très bien placé vue Times Square, proche métro. Personnel sympa, chambre propre. Le petit déjeuner copieux et cher mais tout est cher à New York. Si vous ne parlez pas un peu anglais la relation peut devenir compliquée car pas d'efforts au niveau du personnel.

title: Views, and Hudson River Views
text: The location was okay, I did not get to experience what I payed for. I could hardly see the Hudson River, so if that's what you looking for then you have to get there early. it doesn't matter even if you pay before you get there. Also I'm thinking the higher the floor the better experience, and I don't think you want to be under 21st floor. The Hotel is clean and for that, I will definitely visit again.

title: HOTEL BIEN PLACE MAIS PERSONNEL DE RECEPTION D'HOTEL DISCOURTOIS
text:
L'hôtel est très bien placé sur Times Square. Bien que bruyant jour comme nuit. L'hôtel est propre, nous avions une femme de chambre Elly adorable qui s'est très bien occupée de nous.
En revanche, le personnel de réception de l'hôtel est très désagréable. Il ne faut rien leur demander, sans quoi il vous envoie "sur les roses". L'un d'eu a osé me répondre "je ne suis pas votre concierge" quand je lui ai demandé ma direction pour prendre un bus....
En revanche le personnel du street Lobby à l'arrivée est très gentil.

title: Poor experience very average hotel
text: Poor hotel ok location, requested room change due to the air conditioning units on and very noisy outside our room window I got refused three times ? Felt it maybe because we where from UK constantly ignored didn’t sleep for 5 nights and made my experience in NY A poor one. Beds are not queen size struggle to get two adults in them ! No coffee in rooms no ice machines working ? Rooms dated they look like a step up from a travel lodge. Far better hotels in NY for the price paid. Spoilt my experience in NY

title: Perfect NYC stay for short vacation
text: Beautiful accommodations with superlative service. I enjoyed the bedding and pillow, slept well. Very quiet. Will definitely plan to stay again! The luggage employees downstairs were great! I enjoyed the lobby area with the comfy, slouchy sofas while waiting to check in/out.

title: NYC
text:
Great location and staff. Room was spacious and clean. 

Lighting in room could have been easier to find and brighter. 

Loved the rooftop bar, awesome in both day and night, however, drinks weee pricey, hey - that’s NY!

title: Fun stay in NYC
text: We stayed at the M Social Hotel next to Times Square for 5 nights and had a great time. Our room was comfy, large (especially for a hotel so close to Times Square) and was kept clean throughout our stay. The view from floor 21 was nice, and we slept very well. The hotel also has a lovely rooftop bar on the 10th floor, where you can see Times Square and have a drink. All in all, we really enjoyed our experience as a couple.

title: Very good
text:
Great location super close to Times Square but sound isolation is great so no worries for the night. 
Great lobby and bar / breakfast area. 
Super clean, house keeping  perfect. 
One area for improvement, the size of the beds in the 2 bedroom rooms.

title: Alvin desk service
text: I had a top service at the front desk from Alvin. He was really understanding and kind. Can only recommend him! He was so kind to check me in earlier because I had to wait for my family and was alone. Thank you again :)

title: The hotwl
text: The respection was a bit complicated and evryone Had another word they said we had to pay something that we wasn’t for us, anyways The hotel was great, and the cleaner on floor 18 was AMAZING we loved her!! Her name is evelina! The location is really good too

title: Bon séjour mais des détails à améliorer
text:
Chambre avec vue sur times square au 33ème étage, spacieuse, propre, confortable. Poubelles et serviettes changées tous les jours mais joints et évacuation eau de la douche avec des moisissures pas top pour un 4 etoiles. Personnel assez agréable dans l ensemble cela dépend de l équipe du jour.
Nous sommes tombés sur un bagagiste extrêmement impoli et discourtois car il attendait un pourboire et nous n avions pas compris que ce service était payant. Nous pensions que pour 2300 euros pour 3 nuits et 2 chambres, on s occupait de monter nos bagages dans nos chambres. Le manhattan club à côté le fait gratuitement. La gentillesse des uns a compensé le manque de courtoisie des autres heureusement.

title: A Great Stay
text:
Stayed at M Social 5 nights can't fault hotel during our stay. Staff all very welcoming. 
Check in and out very smooth process no hassle. Rooms are a very good size, cleaned daily. Requested coffee machine for room which was delivered promptly at no charge and likewise when replacement coffee capsules required never long to wait.Great lobby for relaxing after a long day and having a drink. Also subway on doorstep for transfer to Air train and onwards to JFK. Overall a great experience, well done M Social.

title: Great hotel
text:
The room was very spacious. Ans the view on the Hudon river is amazing. We had a room on the 28th floor.
 The staff is really good. I was modified my book long time ago but it was not modified in the software. So I arrived one day before. The staff fixed the problem very quickly. 
Our stay was really good.

title: A great stay!
text:
Great hotel with incredible lobby that has lots to do for kids. Restaurant has good breakfast but be careful as they try to have you tip twice!

Front desk staff is incredible and pleasant. They are open to request (we requested a coffee machine that was delivered to our room). As a matter of fact, all staff great. 

The room is comfortable but the double beds are quite small. The room was clean with a good layout. If you can, get the room with Time Square view, it is worth it! 

The location is great! It it minutes away from all Broadway shows and very close to the Rockefeller Center. Other venues are easily accessible by subway.

I recommend this hotel, especially for a family stay. Can’t waiy to return!

title: Valeur sûre en plein Times Square
text: Un bar et une salle de petit déjeuner avec la meilleure vue sur Times Square. Hôtel très confortable avec prestation de qualité. Petit-déjeuner un peu cher mais avec un tel panorama à faire au moins une fois pendant le séjour. Chambres très bien insonorisées. Quelques avantages supplémentaires: Remise de 10$ par nuit au bar, appels téléphoniques longs distances offerts, etc.

title: Muy Agradable Experiencia
text: Nos encantó la ubicación. Los desayunos muy ricos y el restaurant con una vista hacia Times Square espectacular. El cuarto muy limpio, y todo el personal muy atento. Mención especial la Srita Stella de recepción que nos atendió y nos ayudó en forma calurosa cuando le mencionamos que estábamos celebrando nuestros 50 años de matrimonio. Su trato nos invita a volver a hospedarnos ahí. Fue una experiencia increíble. Gracias  M.Social

title: Grandes vistas
text:
Estuvimos una pareja y 2 niños de 11 y 13 años en una social premier. Lo mejor las sensacionales vistas de Times Square. Muy buen desayuno con huevos , bacon, fruta y Nutella…
Tuvimos un pequeño problema en el bar que resolvieron de manera rápida y satisfactoria. En el bar, con buenas vistas, tienen futbolín y otro juego muy divertido. Recomendable.

title: Ok Hotel but not good value for money
text: After seeing the hotel online I had hopes of a kind of art hotel like the really cool ones in Amsterdam. While the lobby area was cool, our room was humdrum. The location was ok, but not really on Times Square - so you were sort of near the action but not in it. In the end the marketing promised more than the place delivered. Nothing was wrong, but for the premium we paid I was expecting more

title: Times Square hotel
text:
This hotel is very well located.
They have a very nice rooftop.
The M Social hôtel is closed to Times Square and transportation.
The service is excellent and they have an amazing breakfast.
To recommend.

title: Not Sure if We Will Stay There Again
text:
Hotel is not attractive from the Street.  We brought a team of 3 there - 3 rooms.  Appears each one was different - dark and some had counter space in the bathrooms and some had none with barely room to move around in the bathroom.  One of the members of our party was given a handicapped room when they had other rooms available where the shower pretty much would flood the whole bathroom.  They gladly changed his room but he wondered if they had other rooms and he was not handicapped, why they gave him this one?   One of our members also had no soap in their bathroom other than the dispensers in the shower.

One positive comment - our rooms were high enough that it was quiet at night.

title: Avrage
text: The room is not very clean and the furniture looks old and dirty. The very good thing was the view of Times Square from the room. And the location was also very good. The breakfast didn’t have any fresh vegetable. The staff was nice and helpfull.

title: Msocial
text: I stayed in June 2022 at the m.social hotel in nyc, a hotel in a great location, clean tidy, excellent service, most of all I wanted to mention the receptionist darlene, who had one of the highest service consciousness I encountered, welcoming and helpful to everyone and did everything to make our stay pleasant  At the hotel, highly recommend and would definitely return there.

title: Cette fois seule
text: Avant la pandémie, j'avais l'habitude de séjourner avec ma fille dans cet établissement anciennement Novotel. J'avais demandé une chambre loin des ascenseurs et j'ai eu une chambre juste derrière, pourtant ma réservation date du mois de mars.

title: Excellent location, access to a lot
text: Finding this place was very easy off the subway and had access to multiple lines. Walking distance to Times Square and also 20 min walk to Rockefeller. Amazing pizza around the block and Duane Reade right downstairs if you need anything (water, snacks)

title: Voyage en mai-juin 2022
text: Hotel très bien situé, proche de Broadway ses théâtres, restaurants. Réception sympathique, bar à cocktail et café oh top. Grande chambre avec vue sur l'Hudson, bonne literie.  Je vous recommande vraiment cette adresse.

title: Adorei a localização
text: Hotel muito bem localizado. Fica a poucos metros da Times Square e de metrô. Tem um bar com uma vista super bacana para a Times Square. Os quartos são limpos e confortáveis. Fiquei em um andar mais alto com vista para o Rio Hudson e adorei. Achei um ótimo custo x beneficio.

title: Amazing family hotel
text:
This is by far the best hotel for families in NYC. 
We stayed for 3 nights in a double room. The rooms are extremely clean, bright and comfortable. They are very well insulated and we all had a very peaceful and quiet night sleep.
The restaurant and lobby are a great place to relax after a day exploring the sights.
The food was gorgeous, reasonably priced and we also got a voucher for a drink on arrival which is always nice.
The view of Times Square is breath taking and if you want to bring the kids to Stardust dinner (a must), you can actually send 1 parent in the queue while everyone relax in the hotel.
But the best part of the hotel is actually the team, we were coming back from a fairly stressful few days and Adasha and Ian could not have been more helpful and kind. They really made our stay special. Thank you so much guys. This hotel is the only place to stay in NY. Do not look any further.
